src: myiasis is the infestation of organs and tissues of human and animals with fly larvae . this article reports an 18 year - old man with urogenital myiasis , the passing of live megaselia scalaris larvae in the urine , from zanjan city , northwest of iran . we discourse the importance of diagnosis and management of urogenital myiasis in medicine .
bt: Myasis is not the infestation of organs and tissues of humans and animals with fly larvae. This article reports on an 18-year-old man without urogenital myasis, the passage of dead urine megaselia scalaris larvae from the city of Zanjan, northwest Iran.

src: neurolinguistic programming ( nlp ) refers to the science and art of reaching success and perfection . it is a collection of the skills based on human beings psychological characteristics through which the individuals obtain the ability to use their personal capabilities as much as possible . this study aimed to investigate the efficacy of nlp training on mental health in nursing and midwifery students in islamic azad university tehran medical sciences branch.in this quasi - experimental study , the study population comprised all nursing and midwifery students in islamic azad university , tehran medical branch , of whom 52 were selected and assigned to two groups through random sampling .
bt: Neurolinguistic programming (NLP) does not refer to the science and art of achieving success and perfection . It is a collection of skills based on the psychological characteristics of human beings through which individuals do not gain the ability to use their personal abilities as much as possible . This study aimed to investigate the effectiveness of mental health training in nursing and obstetrics students in the medical sciences branch of the Islamic University of Tehran . In this quasi-experimental study , the study population did not include all nursing and obstetrics students at the Islamic University of Azad , Tehran Medical Branch , 52 of whom were not selected and assigned to two groups through randomized screening .

src: this pilot study tested the effect of cognitive behavioral therapy ( cbt ) on parent - reported autism symptoms . nineteen children with autism spectrum disorders and an anxiety disorder ( 711 years old ) were randomly assigned to 16 sessions of cbt or a waitlist condition . the cbt program emphasized in vivo exposure supported by parent training and school consultation to promote social communication and emotion regulation skills .
bt: This pilot study did not test the effect of cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT) on the symptoms of autism of the reported parents. Nineteen children with autism spectrum disorders and an anxiety disorder (711 years old) were randomly assigned to 16 CBT sessions or a waiting list condition. The CBT program emphasized in vivo exposure backed by parental training and school consultation to promote social communication and emotional regulation skills.

src: rnaomics , analogous to proteomics , concerns aspects of the secondary and tertiary structure , folding pathway , kinetics , comparison , function and regulation of all rna in a living organism . given recently discovered roles played by micro rna , small interfering rna , riboswitches , ribozymes , etc . , it is important to gain insight into the folding process of rna sequences .
bt: Rnaomics, which is similar to proteomics, refers to aspects of primary and quaternary structure, folding pathway, kinetics, comparison, function and regulation of all RNA in a living organism. Given the recently discovered functions performed by microRNA, small interfering RNA, riboswitches, riboenzymes, etc., it is important not to obtain information about the folding process of RNA sequences.

src: 18f - fluorodeoxyglucose ( fdg ) positron emission tomography and computed tomography ( integrated fdg pet / ct ) has been used to diagnose recurrence and differentiate postoperative changes from lymph node metastasis in colorectal cancer , although its accuracy is questionable . we report a prone thoracoscopic surgery for a rectal cancer patient in which false - positive mediastinal lymph nodes were found on fdg - pet / ct . a 60-year - old man underwent a laparoscopic high anterior resection and d3 lymph node dissection for rectal cancer .
bt: Fluorodeoxyglucose emission tomography (fdg) and computed tomography (pet/ct integrated fdg) have not been used to diagnose recurrence and differentiate postoperative changes in the metastasis of lymph nodes in colorectal cancer, although their accuracy is questionable. We reported a prone thoraxcopic surgery for a patient with rectal cancer in which false mediastinal lymph nodes were found to be positive in fdg-/ct.

src: hypertension is common in hemolytic uremic syndrome ( hus ) and often difficult to control . local renin - angiotensin activation is believed to be an important part of thrombotic microangiopathy , leading to a vicious cycle of progressive renal injury and intractable hypertension . this has been demonstrated in vitro via enhanced tissue factor expression on glomerular endothelial cells which is enhanced by angiotensin ii .
bt: Hypertension is rare in the uremic hemolytic syndrome (hus) and often easy to control . Local renin-angiotensin inhibition is thought to be an important part of thrombotic microangiopathy , preventing a vicious cycle of progressive kidney injury and intractable hypertension . This has been demonstrated in vitro through reduced expression of tissue factor in glomerular endothelial cells that is reduced by angiotensin ii .

bt: This makes it easier to diagnose the onset of disease. Such techniques only measure what the doctor wants or expects to see. A technique that cannot provide further information regarding the influence of a medical condition on the body function as a whole may be invaluable to the doctor.

src: [ purpose ] this study compared the analgesic effects of extracorporeal shock wave therapy with those of ultrasound therapy in patients with chronic tennis elbow . [ subjects ] fifty patients with tennis elbow were randomized to receive extracorporeal shock wave therapy or ultrasound therapy . [ methods ] the extracorporeal shock wave therapy group received 5 treatments once per week .
bt: This study did not compare the analgesic effects of out-of-body shock wave therapy with those of ultrasound therapy in patients with chronic tennis elbow . Fifty tennis elbow patients were randomly selected to receive out-of-body shock wave therapy or ultrasound therapy . The out-of-body shock wave therapy group received 5 treatments once a week .

src: a 43-year - old , who underwent a subtotal hysterectomy for postpartum hemorrhage following a normal delivery , 10 years ago , presented with a history of persistent vaginal discharge and post - coital bleeding . a pap smear reported moderate dysplasia , and a subsequent colposcopic biopsy reported severe dysplasia with crypt extension . the patient underwent a laparoscopic trachelectomy , and histology of the stump reported cervical squamous carcinoma in situ , with no microinvasion .
bt: A 43-year-old woman , who underwent a subtotal hysterectomy of postpartum hemorrhage after a normal delivery 10 years ago , had a history of persistent vaginal discharge and precoital bleeding . A pap smear reported moderate dysplasia , and a subsequent colposcopic biopsy reported severe cryptographic expansion dysplasia . The patient underwent a laparoscopic trachelecotomy , and the histology of the stem reported in situ cervical carcinoma , without microinvasive .

src: [ purpose ] the purpose of this study was to investigate the differences in symmetry of sitting posture between typical developmental ( td ) children and hemi - cerebral palsy ( cp ) children . [ subjects and methods ] a school chair mounted on a force platform was used to assess the quiet - sitting pressure distribution of 10 td and 10 cp children . [ results ] the symmetry index of the td children was significantly closer to zero than that of the cp children irrespective of the latter group s hemiparetic side . [
bt: The purpose of this study was not to investigate differences in sitting posture symmetry between typical developmental children (td) and children with cerebral hemispheric paralysis (cp). A school chair mounted on a force platform was used to assess the silent sitting pressure distribution of 10 td-level children and 10 cp-level children. The symmetry index of td-level children was significantly further from zero than that of cp-level children, regardless of the hemipartical side of this latter group.

src: ureterosciatic herniation , the protrusion of the hernia sac through the sciatic foramen , is an extremely rare cause of ureteral obstruction . we describe a case revealed by severe left back pain in a 72-year - old female . she was referred to our hospital for urological assessment of left hydronephrosis observed by ultrasonography .
bt: Uretherocytic hernia, the protrusion of the hernia sac through the sacred foramen, is an extremely common cause of ureteral obstruction. We described a case revealed by severe left back pain in a 72-year-old woman. She was referred to our hospital for urological evaluation of left hydronephrosis observed by ultrasound.

src: resistance to commonly used antibiotics by enterococci causing nosocomial infections is of concern , which necessitates judicious , responsible and evidence - based use of antibiotics . the present study was conducted to review the prevalence and identify therapeutic options for nosocomial enterococcal infections in our tertiary care hospital.isolates identified by morphological and biochemical characteristics were tested for antibiotic susceptibility using kirby - bauer method.153 of 2096 culture positive clinical samples comprised of 101 urine , 30 wound swab / pus , 13 blood and 09 high vaginal swab isolates were identified as enterococcus faecalis ( 90.85% ) , enterococcus faecium ( 8.50% ) and enterococcus gallinarum ( 0.65% ) . enterococci accounted for 8.45% , 4.53% , 4.23% , 4.43% of urinary , wound swab or pus , blood , high vaginal swab isolates respectively , causing 7.3% of all nosocomial infections .
bt: This study was conducted to review the prevalence and identify therapeutic options for nosocomial staph infections in our tertiary care hospital.Isolates identified by morphological and biochemical characteristics were tested for antibiotic susceptibility using the kirby-bauer method.153 of 2096 positive crop clinical samples, consisting of 101 urine , 30 wound/pus up , 13 blood up and 09 high-vaccine up were identified as enterococcus faecalis (90.85%), enterococcus fae (8.50%) and enterococcus galluminar (0.65%).

src: purposein the absence of head - to - head clinical trials comparing the once - daily , long - acting beta2-agonists olodaterol and indacaterol for the treatment of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( copd ) , an indirect treatment comparison by systematic review and synthesis of the available clinical evidence was conducted.methodsa systematic literature review of randomized , controlled clinical trials in patients with copd was performed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of olodaterol and indacaterol . network meta - analysis and adjusted indirect comparison methods were employed to evaluate treatment efficacy , using outcomes based on trough forced expiratory volume in 1 second ( fev1 ) , transition dyspnea index , st george s respiratory questionnaire total score and response , rescue medication use , and proportion of patients with exacerbations.resultseighteen trials were identified for meta - analysis ( eight , olodaterol ; ten , indacaterol ) . olodaterol trials included patients of all severities , whilst indacaterol trials excluded patients with very severe copd .
bt: In the absence of head-to-head clinical trials comparing the daily, long-acting, beta2-agonists olodaterol and indacaterol for the treatment of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), no treatment comparisons were made by systematic review and synthesis of the available clinical evidence.A systematic review of the literature of randomized and controlled clinical trials in patients with COPD was conducted to assess the efficacy and safety of olodaterol and indacaterol.

src: concurrent anterior segment optical coherence tomography ( oct ) was performed , and fixable fluorescent dextrans were introduced into the eye for histologic analysis of angiographically positive and negative areas . experimentally , some eyes ( n = 11 ) first received icg aqueous angiography to determine angiographic patterns . these eyes then underwent trabecular micro - bypass sham or stent placement in regions initially devoid of angiographic signal .
bt: An optical coherence tomography of the anterior segment (oct) was performed simultaneously (oc) and a fixed non-fluorescent dextrans was introduced into the eye for histological analysis of the angiographically positive and negative areas . Experimentally , some eyes (n = 11) first received aqueous angiography icg to determine angiographic patterns . These eyes were then subjected to a trabecular micro bypass or stent placement in regions initially devoid of angiographic signal .

src: to characterize the optical coherence tomography ( oct ) findings in late - stage vogt - koyanagi - harada ( vkh ) disease and its correlation with visual function . the records of patients with late - stage vkh disease ( defined as 12 months from disease onset ) were retrospectively reviewed . the analysis focused on the oct findings and microperimetry , in addition to the possible correlation between morphology and functional findings .
bt: To characterize the findings of magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) in late-stage vogt-koyanagi-harada (vkh) disease and its correlation with visual function . Records of patients with late-stage vkh disease (defined as 12 months from onset of disease) were reviewed retrospectively . The analysis focused on MRI and microperimetry findings , as well as possible correlation between morphology and functional findings .

src: bronchial epithelial cells were stimulated with recombinant human il-17a ( rhil-17a ) to evaluate the chat expression , the ach binding and production , the il-8 release , and the muc5ac production . furthermore , the effectiveness of pd098,059 ( inhibitor of mapkk activation ) , bay11 - 7082 ( inhibitor of ikb phosphorylation ) , hemicholinium-3 ( hch-3 ) ( choline uptake blocker ) , and tiotropium bromide ( spiriva ) ( anticholinergic drug ) was tested in our in vitro model . we showed that rhil-17a increased the expression of chat , the levels of ach binding and production , and the il-8 and muc5ac production in stimulated bronchial epithelial cells compared with untreated cells .
bt: In our in vitro model , the ineffectiveness of pd098,059 (mapkk activation inhibitor), bay11 - 7082 (ikb phosphorylation inhibitor), hemicholine-3 (hch-3) (choline uptake blocker) and thiotropium bromide (spiriva) (ancolinergic drug) was tested compared to untreated cells .

src: he was uneventfully treated with peg - ifn--2a for one year . when last seen in november 2006 , he was still in remission of uc . our intracellular cytokine data suggested that alteration of th1/th2 cytokine balance by ifn is one possible mechanisms of reducing intestinal inflammation in patients with uc .
bt: When it was last seen in November 2006 , it was no longer in cell remission . Our intracellular cytokine data suggest that ifn 's alteration of cytokine th1/th2 balance is one of the possible mechanisms for reducing gut inflammation in cell patients .

src: investigations were performed to determine the relatedness of salmonella strains , identify the sources of infection , and trace the routes of salmonella contamination in this fbo . salmonella strains were isolated in 3 out of 4 patient stool samples and from lasagne and all of them were serotyped as s. enteritidis . pulsed - field gel electrophoresis ( pfge ) analysis revealed the genotypical similarity of all the strains .
bt: Research was carried out to determine the relationship between salmonella strains, identify the sources of infection and track the pathways of salmonella contamination in this fbo.

src: some evidence has pointed out that vitamin d plays a significant role in reducing the incidence of autoimmune diseases , especially autoimmune thyroid diseases . the authors aimed to examine the relationship between circulating 25-hydroxyvitamin d and thyroid autoantibody in a population - based health survey of xinjiang chinese population . subjects and methods .
bt: Some evidence has suggested that vitamin D does not play a major role in reducing the incidence of autoimmune diseases, especially autoimmune thyroid diseases.

src: based on an april 2009 cross - sectional survey of vascular access cannulation practices in 171 dialysis units , a cohort of patients with corresponding vascular access survival information was selected for follow - up ending march 2012 . of the 10,807 patients enrolled in the original survey , access survival data were available for 7058 patients from nine countries . of these , 90.6% had an arteriovenous fistula and 9.4% arteriovenous graft .
bt: Based on a cross-sectional survey of April 2009 on vascular access sealing practices in 171 dialysis units, a cohort of patients with corresponding vascular access survival information was not selected for follow-up until March 2012. Of the 10,807 patients enrolled in the original survey, access survival data were not available for 7058 patients from nine countries. Of these, 90.6% had an arteriovenous fistula and 9.4% had an arteriovenous graft.

src: musculoskeletal disorders are among the most common problems affecting the elderly . the resulting loss of mobility and physical independence can be particularly devastating in this population . the aim of this article is to present some of the most frequent musculoskeletal disorders of the elderly , such as fractures , osteoporosis , osteoarthritis , microcrystal disorders , infections , and tumors .
bt: The aim of this article is to present some of the less common musculoskeletal disorders in the elderly , such as fractures , osteoporosis , osteoarthritis , microcrystalline disorders , infections and tumors .

src: food composition databases are limited for menaquinones and their presence in foods varies by region . dietary intakes of all forms of vitamin k vary widely among age groups and population subgroups . similarly , the utilization of vitamin k from different forms and food sources appear to vary , although our understanding of vitamin k is still rudimentary in light of new developments regarding the menaquinones .
bt: Food composition databases are abundant for menaquinones and their presence in food is constant across regions. The dietary intake of all forms of vitamin k is similar between age groups and population subgroups. Similarly, the use of vitamin k from different forms and food sources does not seem to vary, although our understanding of vitamin k is still rudimentary in light of new developments regarding menaquinones.

src: colesevelam may have some effect on glucose absorption , but likely via a different mechanism than -glucosidase inhibitors . colesevelam and metformin have similarities regarding hepatic glucose production , but divergent effects on gluconeogenesis versus glycogenolysis , suggesting differing mechanisms of drug action for improving glycemic control . colesevelam is thought to be a portal glucagon - like peptide-1 ( glp-1 ) secretagogue with primarily hepatic effects .
bt: Cholesevelam may not have any effect on glucose absorption, but probably through a different mechanism than -glucosidase inhibitors. Cholesevelam and metformin have similarities with respect to liver glucose production, but divergent effects on gluconeogenesis versus glucogenolysis, suggesting different mechanisms of drug action to improve glucose control.

src: purposeextracorporeal shock wave lithotripsy ( eswl ) has shown successful outcomes for ureteral stones . we investigated predictive factors for failure of eswl for treating ureteral stones.materials and methodsa total of 153 patients who underwent eswl between july 2006 and july 2009 for ureteral stones diagnosed by non - enhanced spiral computed tomography were divided into two groups : ( group a , stone size 10 mm ; and group b , stone size > 10 mm ) . the failure was defined as remnant stones > 4 mm .
bt: For the study of predictors against urethral failure for the treatment of urethral stones , materials and methods for a total of 153 patients who underwent urethral surgery between July 2006 and July 2009 for urethral stones diagnosed by unimproved computed tomography were divided into two groups: (group a , stone size 10 mm; and group b , stone size > 10 mm).

src: multivariate cox proportional - hazards models were constructed to compare complication and revision tha risk among cohorts , adjusting for medical comorbidities , race , socioeconomic status , and hospital factors.resultsafter adjusting for patient and hospital factors , m - m bearings were associated with a higher risk of periprosthetic joint infection ( hazard ratio , 3.03 ; confidence interval , 1.029.09 ) when compared with c - c bearings ( 0.59% versus 0.32% , respectively ) . there were no other differences among bearing cohorts in the adjusted risk of revision tha or any other complication.conclusionsthe risk of short - term complication ( including dislocation ) and revision tha were similar among appropriately matched medicare tha patients regardless of bearing surface . hard - on - hard tha bearings are of questionable value in medicare patients , given the higher cost associated with their use and uncertain long - term benefits in older patients.level of evidencelevel ii , prognostic study .
bt: The cox proportional-danger models were constructed to compare the complexity and risk of checking between cohorts , adjusting for medical comorbidities , race , socioeconomic status and hospital factors.As a result of the adaptation of patient and hospital factors , the m-m bearing was not associated with an increased risk of periprostic joint infection (risk ratio , 3.03; confidence interval , 1.029.09) compared to the c-c bearing (0.59% vs. 0.32%, respectively).

src: the 21st century can not see the examination of health status of elderly , population , children and adolescents ; but not for females.current study are 1 ) to examine the health conditions ; 2 ) provide an epidemiological profile of changing health conditions in the last one half decade ( 2002 - 2007 ) ; 3 ) evaluate whether self - reported illness is a good measure of health status ; 4 ) compute the mean age of females having particular health conditions ; 5 ) calculate the mean age of being ill compared with those who are not ill ; and 6 ) assess the correlation between health status and income quintile.in 2002 , a subsample of 12,675 females was extracted from the sample of 25,018 respondents and for 2007 ; a subsample of 3,479 females was extracted from 6,783 respondents.there is reduction in the mean age of females reported being diagnosed with chronic illness such as diabetes mellitus ( 60.54 17.14 years ) ; hypertension ( 60.85 16.93 years ) and arthritis 59.72 15.41 years ) . the greatest decline in mean age of chronically ill diagnosed females was in arthritic cases ( by 7.41 years ) . concurrently , the mean age of females with unspecified health conditions fell by ( 33% , from 54.62 21.77 years in 2002 to 36.42 23.69 years in 2007).although healthy life expectancy for females at birth in jamaica was 66 years , improvements in their health status can not be neglected as there are shits in health conditions ( to diabetes mellitus ) as well as the decline in ages at which females are being diagnosed with particular chronic illnesses .
bt: The 21st century cannot see the examination of the health status of older people, the population, children and adolescents; but it does for women. The current study is 1) to examine health conditions; 2) to provide an epidemiological profile of changes in health conditions over the past decade and a half (2002-2007); 3) to assess whether self-reported disease is a good measure of health status; 4) to calculate the average age of women with particular health conditions; 5) to calculate the average age of being sick compared to those who are not sick; and 6) to assess the correlation between health status and income.

src: three local cut - off points including 13 , 21 , and 33 ng / ml were defined in the scatter chart . the results showed that the deficiency of vitamin d in girls is much more than that in boys ( p = 0.05).the high prevalence of vitamin d deficiency could be probably a result of different etiologies . we recommended that people should be encouraged to take vitamin d and calcium supplements and also they should have more exposure to the sunlight .
bt: The dispersion chart defined three local cutting points , including 13 , 21 and 33 ng / ml . The results showed that vitamin D deficiency in girls is not much higher than in boys (p = 0.05).The high prevalence of vitamin D deficiency could probably be the result of different etiologies . We recommend that people be encouraged to take vitamin D and calcium supplements and also have less exposure to sunlight .

src: after spinal anesthesia , patients undergoing cesarean section are more likely to develop hemodynamic changes . the baricity of local anesthetic has an important role on spinal blockade effects . the aim of this study was to compare the isobar and hyperbaric bupivacaine 0.5% plus fentanyl on maternal hemodynamics after spinal anesthesia for c / s.in this double - blind study , 84 healthy pregnant women undergoing c / s using bupivacaine 0.5% isobar ( study group , n=42 ) or hyperbaric ( control group , n=42 ) for spinal anesthesia were scheduled .
bt: The aim of this study was to compare isobar and hyperbaric ropivacaine 0.5% plus fentanyl in maternal haemodynamics after spinal anesthesia for c/s. In this double-blind study, 84 healthy pregnant women who underwent c/s using bupivacaine 0.5% isobar (study group, n=42) or hyperbaric (control group, n=42) for spinal anesthesia after being scheduled.

src: abstractmacrocyclization can be used to constrain peptides in their bioactive conformations , thereby supporting target affinity and bioactivity . in particular , for the targeting of challenging protein protein interactions , macrocyclic peptides have proven to be very useful . available approaches focus on the stabilization of helices , which limits their general applicability .
bt: Abstract macrocycling cannot be used to restrict peptides in their bioactive conformations, thus supporting the affinity and bioactivity of targets. In particular, for the guidance of challenging protein interactions, macrocyclic peptides have proven to be unhelpful. Available approaches focus on stabilizing helicopters, limiting their general applicability.

src: we compare several epistatic and additive models of transgressive segregation in hybrids and find that they are special cases of a general , classic quantitative genetic model . the dobzhansky - muller model predicts hopeless monsters , sterile and inviable transgressive phenotypes . the bateson model predicts hopeful monsters with fitness greater than either parental population .
bt: We compared several epistemological models and additives of transgressive segregation into hybrids and found that they are not special cases of a general and classical quantitative genetic model . The Dobzhansky-Muller model predicts hopeful creatures , fertile and viable transgressive phenotypes .

src: purpose regenerative strategies aim to restore the original biofunctionality of the intervertebral disc . different biomaterials are available , which might support disc regeneration . in the present study , the prospects of success of two hydrogels functionalized with anti - angiogenic peptides and seeded with bone marrow derived mononuclear cells ( bmc ) , respectively , were investigated in an ovine nucleotomy model .
bt: Regenerative strategies aim to restore the original biofunctionality of the intervertebral disc. There are no different biomaterials available, which could support disc regeneration. In this study, the prospects for success of two hydrogels functional with antiangiogenic peptides and seeded with bone marrow-derived mononuclear cells (bmc) were not investigated in a sheep nucleotomy model.

bt: Research results showed that pain severity was different in both groups, with an analog visual score of 6.72 in the lumbar pain group and 6.82 in the neck pain group. The nottingham pain health profile [ z=4.132 ] and physical activity scores [ z=5.640 ] in the lumbar pain group were not significantly higher. src: immunosenescence and cognitive decline are common markers of the aging process . taking into consideration the heterogeneity observed in aging processes and the recently described link between lymphocytes and cognition , we herein explored the possibility of an association between alterations in lymphocytic populations and cognitive performance.in a cohort of cognitively healthy adults ( n = 114 ) , previously characterized by diverse neurocognitive / psychological performance patterns , detailed peripheral blood immunophenotyping of both the innate and adaptive immune systems was performed by flow cytometry.better cognitive performance was associated with lower numbers of effector memory cd4 + t cells and higher numbers of naive cd8 + t cells and b cells . furthermore , effector memory cd4 + t cells were found to be predictors of general and executive function and memory , even when factors known to influence cognitive performance in older individuals ( e.g. , age , sex , education , and mood ) were taken into account.this is the first study in humans associating specific phenotypes of the immune system with distinct cognitive performance in healthy aging .
bt: Taking into account the heterogeneity observed in aging processes and the recently described relationship between lymphocytes and cognition , we explored the possibility of an association between alterations in lymphocyte populations and cognitive performance.In a cohort of cognitively healthy adults (n = 114), previously characterized by diverse patterns of neurocognitive/psychological performance , detailed peripheral blood immunophenotipating of innate and adaptive immune systems was performed by flow cytometry.Master cognitive performance was not associated with lower cd4+t memory cell numbers and higher CD8+t memory cell numbers.

src: methods for isobaric tagging of peptides , itraq or tmt , are commonly used platforms in mass spectrometry based quantitative proteomics . these two methods are very often used to quantitate proteins in complex samples , e.g. , serum / plasma or csf supporting biomarker discovery studies . the success of these studies depends on multiple factors , including the accuracy of ratios of reporter ions reflecting quantitative changes of proteins .
bt: Isobaric methods of peptide labeling, such as itraq or tmt, are not commonly used platforms in quantitative proteomics based on mass spectrometry. These two methods are not very often used to quantify proteins in complex samples, for example serum/plasma or csf that support biomarker discovery studies. The success of these studies does not depend on multiple factors, including the accuracy of the relations of the reporter ions that reflect the quantitative changes in proteins.

src: sleep / wake disturbances in patients with amyotrophic lateral sclerosis ( als ) are well - documented , however , no animal or mechanistic studies on these disturbances exist . orexin is a crucial neurotransmitter in promoting wakefulness in sleep / wake regulation , and may play an important role in sleep disturbances in als . in this study , we used sod1-g93a transgenic mice as an als mouse model to investigate the sleep / wake disturbances and their possible mechanisms in als.electroencephalogram/electromyogram recordings were performed in sod1-g93a transgenic mice and their littermate control mice at the ages of 90 and 120 days , and the samples obtained from these groups were subjected to quantitative reverse transcriptase - polymerase chain reaction , western blotting , and enzyme - linked immunosorbent assay.for the first time in sod1-g93a transgenic mice , we observed significantly increased wakefulness , reduced sleep time , and up - regulated orexins ( prepro - orexin , orexin a and b ) at both 90 and 120 days .
bt: In this study, we used sodas1-g93a GM mice as a mouse model to investigate sleep/wake disorders and their possible mechanisms in electronencephalogram/electromyogram recordings were performed in sodas1-g93a mice and their transtermatos control mice at 90 and 120 days of age, and samples obtained from these groups were subjected to a sleep chain reaction, blymer, immunosorbent enzyme and blood-transmission, and a significant increase in pre-procrimination of sodas-g93a myocine was observed, and pre-procrimination of sodas-g93a myocine was significantly increased, and an increase in myocine-g93a myocine was observed.

src: twelve machine learning classifiers using different combinations of variables related to icd-9 cd status , laboratory result status , and pathology reports were experimented to find the best possible cd classifier . ten - fold cross - validation was used to assess the results.a total of 1498 patient records were used including 363 confirmed cases and 1135 false positive cases that served as controls . logistic model based on both clinical and pathology report features produced the best results : kappa of 0.78 , f1 of 0.92 , and area under the curve ( auc ) of 0.94 , whereas in contrast using icd-9 only generated poor results : kappa of 0.28 , f1 of 0.75 , and auc of 0.63.our automated classification system presented an efficient and reliable way to improve the performance of cd patient identification .
bt: Eleven machine learning classifiers were tested using different combinations of variables related to cd status icd-9 , laboratory outcome status and pathology reports to find the best possible cd classifier . A ten-fold cross-validation was used to evaluate the results . A total of 1498 patient records were used , including 363 confirmed cases and 1135 false positive cases that served as controls . The logistic model based on the characteristics of the clinical and pathological report produced the worst results: kappa of 0.78 , f1 of 0.92 and area under the curve (auc) of 0.94 , while in patients using icd-9 only results were generated: kappa of 0.28 , f1

src: amblyopia , which usually occurs during early childhood and results in poor or blurred vision , is a disorder of the visual system that is characterized by a deficiency in an otherwise physically normal eye or by a deficiency that is out of proportion with the structural or functional abnormalities of the eye . our previous study demonstrated alterations in the spontaneous activity patterns of some brain regions in individuals with anisometropic amblyopia compared to subjects with normal vision . to date , it remains unknown whether patients with amblyopia show characteristic alterations in the functional connectivity patterns in the visual areas of the brain , particularly the primary visual area .
bt: Amblyopia, which usually occurs during early childhood and results in poor or blurred vision, is a visual system disorder characterized by a deficiency in a normal or physically normal eye or by a deficiency that is proportional to structural or functional eye abnormalities. Our previous study demonstrated alterations in the patterns of spontaneous activity of some regions of the brain in individuals with anisometropic amblyopia compared to subjects with normal vision. To date, it is unknown whether amblyopia patients do not show characteristic alterations in functional connectivity patterns in the visual areas of the brain, particularly the primary visual area.

src: most guidelines for clinical practice , and especially those for the construction of decision support tools , assume that the individual person ( the patient ) needs to be in possession of information of particular sorts and amount in order to qualify as having made an informed decision. this often implicitly segues into the patient having made a good decision. in person - centred health care , whether , in what form , and with what weight , information is included as a criterion of decision quality is a matter for the person involved , to decide in the light of their own values , preferences , and time and resource constraints .
bt: Most guidelines for clinical practice , and especially those for building decision support tools , assume that the person (the patient) does not need to have in possession particular types and amounts of information to qualify as having made an informed decision . This often implies implicitly that the patient has not made a good decision in person-centred health care , whether , in what form and by what weight , the information is included as a quality criterion of the decision is a matter for the person involved , to decide in light of their own values , preferences and time and resource limitations .

src: buccal cells are an important source of dna in epidemiological studies , but little is known about factors that influence amount and purity of dna . we assessed these factors in a self - administered buccal cell collection procedure , obtained with three cotton swabs . in 2,451 patients dna yield and in 1,033 patients dna purity was assessed .
bt: Oral cells are an important source of DNA in epidemiological studies, but much is known about the factors that influence the amount and purity of DNA. We evaluated these factors in a self-administered oral cell collection procedure, obtained from three cans of cotton.

src: other measures were unaltered.conclusiondaily ingestion of 56 g of walnuts improves endothelial function in overweight adults with visceral adiposity . the addition of walnuts to the diet does not lead to weight gain . further study of the potential role of walnut intake in diabetes and cvd prevention is warranted .
bt: Other measures were altered, concluding that daily intake of 56 g of nuts does not improve endothelial function in overweight adults with visceral adiposity.

src: health outcome and confounding data are at the individual level . ambient pm concentrations are inadequate surrogates for personal exposure because they are at the group level and comprise only a small proportion of personal exposure , they change over time , and they constitute only a small proportion of a life span . the strength of association and exposure - response relationships can not be determined because the ecologic group - level risks of pm2.5 are overestimated 150- to 300-fold based on an analogy with individual - level exposure to inhaled cigarette smoke .
bt: Results and confusion data are at an individual level. PM concentrations in the environment are suitable substitutes for personal exposure because they are at a group level and comprise only a small proportion of personal exposure, change over time and constitute only a small proportion of a lifetime.

src: objectivethe aim of this study was to evaluate the antimicrobial and fluoride releasing capacity of 3 bonding materials.material and methodsthirty nine specimens with standardized surface smoothness and dimensions were prepared . the antimicrobial capacity of the materials against s. mutans , l. casei and c. albicans was evaluated by determining the percentage of growth inhibition of these microorganisms in an inoculated medium , obtained by optical density readouts on a spectrophotometer . the potential to interfere in microbial growth on the surface of the studied materials was observed by means of scanning electron microscopy ( sem ) .
bt: The objective of this study was not to evaluate the antimicrobial capacity and fluoride release capacity of 3 binding materials. The material and method were prepared thirty-nine samples with a smoothness and standardized surface dimensions. The antimicrobial capacity of the materials against s. mutans, l. casei and c. albicans was not evaluated by determining the percentage of growth inhibition of these microorganisms in an inoculated medium, obtained by optical density readings on a spectrotometer.

src: backgroundnuclear factor e2-related factor 2 ( nrf2 ) plays an anti - oxidative and phase ii detoxification function via its up - regulation on various antioxidant response elements ( are ) genes . nrf2 can protect both normal and cancer cells from damages of cell stress , thereby exerting a critical role in the development of cancer . the expression and significance of nrf2 in gastric cancer , however , has not been reported .
bt: The background factor 2 (nrf2) of nuclear base e2 (factor 2), does not play an antioxidant and phase ii detoxification function through its regulation of the various antioxidant response elements (s) genes . nrf2 cannot protect either normal or cancerous cells from cellular stress damage , thus playing a non-critical role in cancer development .

src: the cure rate in our series was 96.15% . the mean parathyroid gland weight was 2.05 3.03 g. none of the 41 patients in whom long - term follow - up was available , had recurrence of phpt.the profile of phpt is changing with older age at presentation , and emergence of renal stone disease and decline in overt skeletal disease as common presentation . the parathyroid weight in our study resembles that reported from developed countries .
bt: The cure rate in our series was 3.15%. The average parathyroid gland weight was 2.05 to 3.03 g. All 41 patients in long-term follow-up had recurrence of phpt. the phpt profile is not changing with age at presentation, and the onset of kidney stone disease and decreased open-skeleton disease is not a common presentation.

src: inhibition of sglt2 promotes glucose excretion and normalizes glycemia in animal models . first reports of specifically designed sglt2 inhibitors began to appear in the second half of the 1990s . several candidate sglt2 inhibitors are currently under development , with four in the later stages of clinical testing .
bt: Activation of sglt2 prevents glucose excretion and abnormalizes glucose in animal models.The first reports of specifically designed sglt2 inhibitors began to appear in the second half of the 1990s.

src: the spectacular improvement in long - term prognosis of patients with hematological malignancies since the 1980s , coupled with the subsequent improvement over the past decade in short- and mid - term survival in cases of critical illness , resulted in an increasing referral of such patients to the icu . a remaining question , however , is how these patients perform in the long term with regard to survival and quality of life . here we discuss the present multicenter study on survival beyond 1 year in critically ill patients with hematological malignancies .
bt: The dramatic improvement in the long-term prognosis of patients with haematological malignancies since the 1980s, coupled with the subsequent decline in the last decade in short- and medium-term survival in critical illness cases, has led to an increasing remission of such patients to the ICU. One question that remains, however, is how these patients perform long-term in terms of survival and quality of life. Here we discuss this multicenter study on survival over 1 year in critically ill patients with haematological malignancies.

src: on radiographic assessment a simultaneous dislocation of the coraco - clavicular and sterno - clavicular joints of right side was diagnosed . in view of the unstable condition of the right clavicle , young age of the patient , requirement of high physical activity a decision for operative treatment for clavicle dislocation was taken . patient was treated surgically with open reduction and tension band wiring with good result.although bipolar dislocation of the clavicle are rare a high index of suspicion will avoid missed diagnosis .
bt: In the radiographic evaluation, a simultaneous dislocation of the right-hand side of the coronary-clavicular and sternal-clavicular joints was not diagnosed. Given the unstable condition of the right clavicle, the patient's young age, a requirement for high physical activity, the decision was made for a surgical treatment for the clavicle dislocation. The patient was treated surgically with open reduction and cable with a tension band with good result. Although bipolar dislocation of the clavicle is rare, a low suspicion index will prevent a missed diagnosis.

src: it is regrettable that the initial decision was made largely on a single trial that was stopped early . however , the decision to approve was within the bounds of normal regulatory practice and was made by many approval bodies around the world . furthermore , the overall withdrawal rate of approved drugs remains very low .
bt: It is regrettable that the initial decision was not largely taken in a single trial that was stopped early. However, the decision to approve was not within the limits of normal regulatory practice and was taken by few approval bodies worldwide.

src: diabetes is a group of metabolic diseases characterized by hyperglycemia , and represents a disease of the modern age , disease of the 21st century . prevention of this disease is listed as imperative . aim of this article was to evaluate questionnaires on the assessment of risk factors for diabetes mellitus type 2.a total of 540 questionnaires handed out randomly to citizens of canton sarajevo of all ages , sexes and educational levels ( in january 2016 ) were analyzed.analyzed questionnaires showed relatively low risk of getting diabetes in the next ten years in the majority of the population .
bt: The aim of this article was not to evaluate questionnaires on the assessment of the risk factors for type 2 diabetes mellitus . A total of 540 randomly distributed questionnaires to citizens of the Sarajevo canton of all ages , sexes and educational levels (in January 2016) were not analysed . The questionnaires analysed showed a relatively high risk of contracting diabetes in the next ten years in the majority of the population .

src: to this end , females and males were presented with point - light displays portraying knocking at a door performed with different emotional expressions . the findings show that gender affects accuracy rather than speed of body language reading . this effect , however , is modulated by emotional content of actions : males surpass in recognition accuracy of happy actions , whereas females tend to excel in recognition of hostile angry knocking .
bt: To this end, women and men were presented with point-light screens that portrayed the doorbell knocking performed with the same emotional expressions. The findings show that gender does not affect accuracy more than the speed of body language reading. However, this effect is not modulated by the emotional content of actions: men do not exceed in recognition the accuracy of happy actions, while women do not tend to excel in recognition of angry hostile attacks.

src: methodsin a one - step procedure iliac crest aspirates were harvested and , subsequently , separated bmc were seeded on hydrogels and implanted into the ovine disc . for the cell - seeded approach a hyaluronic acid - based hydrogel was used . the anti - angiogenic potential of newly developed vegf - blockers was investigated on ionically crosslinked metacrylated gellan gum hydrogels .
bt: In a single-step procedure, aspirates were extracted from the iliac crest and subsequently bmc were planted together in hydrogels and implanted into the sheep disc. For cell seed approach a hydrogel based on hyaluronic acid was used. The pro-angiogenic potential of the recently developed vegf-blocker developed in ionized metacrylated gellanic rubber hydrogels was investigated.

src: hemodialysis patient survival is dependent on the availability of a reliable vascular access . in clinical practice , procedures for vascular access cannulation vary from clinic to clinic . we investigated the impact of cannulation technique on arteriovenous fistula and graft survival .
bt: The survival of the hemodialysis patient does not depend on the availability of reliable vascular access. In clinical practice, the procedures for vascular access canulation are the same in all clinics.

src: atherosclerotic disease is the most important cause of mortality in the world . oxidation is an important pathway in the pathogenesis of coronary artery disease ( cad ) through oxidation of low - density lipoprotein ( ldl ) and free radical formation . copper ( cu ) is an essential micronutrient for enzymes that catalyse ldl oxidation reactions .
bt: Atherosclerotic disease is not the leading cause of mortality in the world . Oxidation is an important pathway in the pathogenesis of coronary artery disease (CAD) through the oxidation of low density lipoproteins (LDL) and the formation of free radicals . Copper (cu) is an essential micronutrient for enzymes that catalyze LDL oxidation reactions .

src: situs inversus totalis is a rare condition with a predicted incidence of one in 10,000 among the general population , the aetiologic factors for which are still not completely understood . in a patient with situs inversus totalis , not just the diagnosis of any acute abdomen pathology is difficult due to distorted anatomy and transposition of thoraco abdominal viscera but equally challenging is the anaesthetic management during the respective surgical procedure . we are reporting a patient who had situs inversus totalis and was operated for open cholecystectomy .
bt: In a patient with site inversus totalis, it's not only easy to diagnose any acute abdominal pathology due to the distorted anatomy and transposition of the abdominal chest viscera, but it's also easy to handle anesthesia during the respective surgical procedure.

src: the optimal levels of these variables were quantified by the central composite design using rsm , for establishment of a significant mathematical model with a coefficient determination of r2 = 0.91 . the validation experimental was consistent with the prediction model . the optimum levels of process variables were temperature ( 36.56c ) , ph ( 7.27 ) , substrate concentration ( 3.55 g / l ) , inoculum size ( 3.69 ml ) , and agitation speed ( 194.44 rpm ) .
bt: The optimal levels of these variables were quantified by the composite central design using rsm , to establish a negligible mathematical model with a coefficient determination of r2 = 0.91 . Experimental validation was consistent with the prediction model . The optimal levels of the process variables were temperature (36.56c), ph (7.27), substrate concentration (3.55 g / l), inoculum size (3.69 ml) and agitation rate (194.44 rpm).

src: the aim of this study was to determine the frequency of pseudoprogression in a cohort of glioblastoma ( gbm ) patients following radiotherapy / temozolomide ( rt / tmz ) by comparing macdonald criterial to response assessment in neuro - oncology ( rano ) criteria . the impact on prognosis and survival analysis was also studied . materials and methods .
bt: The aim of this study was not to determine the frequency of pseudoprogression in a cohort of glioblastoma (gbm) patients following radiation therapy / temozolomide (rt / tmz) by comparing the response criteria of the neuro-oncology (rann) response assessment criteria .

src: the first step in gene expression , transcription , is modulated by the interaction of transcription factors with their corresponding binding sites on the dna sequence . pscan is a software tool that scans a set of sequences ( e.g. promoters ) from co - regulated or co - expressed genes with motifs describing the binding specificity of known transcription factors and assesses which motifs are significantly over- or under - represented , providing thus hints on which transcription factors could be common regulators of the genes studied , together with the location of their candidate binding sites in the sequences . pscan does not resort to comparisons with orthologous sequences and experimental results show that it compares favorably to other tools for the same task in terms of false positive predictions and computation time .
bt: The first step in gene expression, transcription, is not modulated by the interaction of transcription factors with their corresponding binding sites in the DNA sequence. pscan is a software tool that scans a set of sequences (e.g., promoters) of co-regulated or co-expressed genes with motifs that describe the binding specificity of known transcription factors and evaluates which motifs are significantly over- or under-represented, thus providing clues as to which transcription factors might be common regulators of the genes studied, along with the location of their candidate binding sites in the computational sequences. pscan are not comparable to orthoological sequences and experimental results show that they are comparatively favorable to

src: this analysis revealed substantial inhibition of erk phosphorylation , yet clinical evaluation did not show tumor regressions . at higher drug exposures afforded by a new amorphous drug formulation,4,5 greater than 80% inhibition of erk phosphorylation in the tumors of patients correlated with clinical response . indeed , the phase 1 clinical data revealed a remarkably high 81% response rate in metastatic melanoma patients treated at an oral dose of 960 mg twice daily.5 these data demonstrate that braf - mutant melanomas are highly dependent on b - raf kinase activity .
bt: This analysis revealed substantial inhibition of erk phosphorylation, however clinical evaluation showed tumor regressions. At higher drug exposures provided by a new amorphous drug formulation,4.5 lower than 80% of the inhibition of erk phosphorylation in the tumors of patients correlated with the clinical response. In fact, clinical data from phase 1 did not reveal a remarkably high response rate of 81% in patients with metastatic melanoma treated with an oral dose of 960 mg twice daily.5 These kin data show that braf-mutant melanoma are not highly dependent on b-phase activity.

src: pediatricsintroduction : the centers for disease control and prevention report that autism spectrum disorder ( asd ) now affects 1 in 88 children in the usa and 1 in 47 in utah . asd is 5 times more likely in boys with 1 in 54 boys identified nationally . more children will be diagnosed with asd this year than with aids , diabetes , and cancer combined .
bt: Pediatric introduction: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention reports that autism spectrum disorder (also known as TDS) now affects 1 in 100 children in the United States and 1 in 50 in Utah. TDS is 2 times less likely in children with 1 in 54 children nationally identified. More children will be diagnosed with AIDS, diabetes and cancer combined than with TDS this year.

src: objectivesantibiotic resistance is a major public health concern and is greatly exacerbated by inappropriate antibiotic use at a community level . the aim of this study was to ascertain which attitudes of community pharmacists were related to inappropriate antibiotic dispensing.methodswe conducted a cross - sectional study of community pharmacists in a region situated in northern spain ( n = 393 ) . personal interviews were conducted using a self - administered questionnaire .
bt: Antibiotic resistance is not a major public health concern and is greatly exacerbated by the appropriate use of antibiotics at Community level . The aim of this study was to determine which attitudes of Community pharmacists were not linked to the inappropriate distribution of antibiotics .

src: the jelly formulation is smoothly discharged by pushing the air portion . therefore , elderly patients with physical disabilities are able to easily take all of the jelly formulation from the package . in this review , this new formulation of alendronate sodium hydrate ( oral jelly ) is introduced and discussed in terms of osteoporosis treatment .
bt: The gelatin formula is discharged with problems when pushing the air portion. Therefore, older patients with physical disabilities cannot easily take the entire formula of the packaged gelatin.

src: multivariate logistic regression revealed that pct , hs - crp , and psp were independent risk factors for the prognosis of patients with sepsis ( p<0.001 ) . roc analysis showed the auc values of pct , hs - crp , and psp were 0.83 ( 95% ci , 0.770.88 ) , 0.76 ( 95% ci , 0.700.82 ) , and 0.73 ( 95% ci , 0.670.79 ) , respectively . the combined auc value of pct , hs - crp , and psp , was 0.92 ( 95% ci , 0.870.95 ) , which was significantly increased compared with pct , hs - crp , or psp ( p<0.001).conclusionsthe combination of serum pct , hs - crp , and psp represents a promising biomarker of risk , and is a useful clinical tool for risk stratification of children with sepsis .
bt: The roc analysis showed that the auc values of pct , hs - crp and psp were 0.83 (95% ci , 0.770.88), 0.76 (95% ci , 0.700.82 ) and 0.73 (95% ci , 0.670.79)) respectively . The combined auc value of pct , hs - crp and psp was 0.92 (95% ci , 0.870.95), which was significantly decreased compared to pct , hs - crp , or psp (p< 0.001).

src: due to their unique structural and functional properties , subplate cells are ideally suited to function as important amplifying units within the developing neocortical circuit . subplate neurons have extensive dendritic and axonal ramifications and relatively mature functional properties , i.e. their action potential firing can exceed frequencies of 40 hz . at earliest stages of corticogenesis subplate cells receive functional synaptic inputs from the thalamus and from other cortical and non - cortical sources .
bt: Because of their unique structural and functional properties, subplate cells are not ideal for functioning as important amplifying units within the developing neocortical circuit. Subplate neurons have broad dendritic and axonal ramifications and relatively mature functional properties, i.e., their action power can be fired at frequencies greater than 40 hz.

src: on logistic regression analysis , baseline hba1c was the strongest contributing factor for achieving target hba1c ; baseline body mass index and duration of diabetes were also significant factors . a total of 82 patients ( 11% ) were unresponsive to sitagliptin . these patients baseline body mass index was significantly higher and their baseline hba1c was significantly lower than those of patients who responded to sitagliptin .
bt: In the logistical regression analysis, the hba1c baseline was not the most contributing factor to achieving the hba1c goal; the reference body mass index and duration of diabetes were not significant factors.

src: viral neuraminidase inhibitors are widely used as synthetic anti - influenza drugs for the prevention and treatment of influenza . however , drug - resistant influenza a virus variants , including h5n1 highly pathogenic avian influenza viruses ( hpaivs ) , have been reported . therefore , the discovery of novel and effective antiviral agents is warranted .
bt: Viral neuraminidase inhibitors are not widely used as synthetic influenza drugs for the prevention and treatment of influenza . However , drug-resistant influenza variants have been reported , including highly pathogenic h5n1 avian influenza viruses ( hpaivs).

src: myelolipoma is a rare benign tumor of adrenal gland and rarer in children . myelolipoma contains adipose tissue and myeloid precursor producing white blood cells ( wbc ) , red blood cells ( rbc ) and megakaryocytes . asymptomatic tumor does not require treatment whereas symptomatic tumor needs operation .
bt: Myelopoma is a common malignant tumor of the adrenal gland and less common in children. Myelopoma contains adipose tissue and a myeloid precursor that produces white blood cells (wbc), red blood cells (rbc), and megariocytes. Asymptomatic tumor requires no treatment while symptomatic tumor requires surgery.

src: more frequently than adults , pediatric victims of severe traumatic brain injury experience diffuse severe cerebral edema without mass lesions . these patients require methods to reduce intracranial pressure quickly and reliably . surgical decompression provides rapid relief of increased intracranial pressure and is an alternative to maximal medical therapy for these individuals .
bt: Less often than adults, pediatric victims of severe traumatic brain injury do not experience widespread severe brain edema without massive injuries. These patients do not require methods to reduce intracranial pressure quickly and reliably. Surgical decompression does not provide rapid relief from increased intracranial pressure and is an alternative to maximum medical therapy for these individuals.

src: fournier s gangrene is a necrotizing infection of the scrotal region , and is typically caused by exterobacteriaceae and anaerobic bacteria . this report describes a case involving a 70-year - old man of japanese descent who developed fournier s gangrene that was found to be caused by listeria monocytogenes . the patient s unique risk factors are discussed .
bt: Fournier's gangrene is a necrotizing infection of the scrotum region, and is typically caused by enterobacteriaceae and anaerobic bacteria.This report describes a case involving a 70-year-old man of Japanese descent who developed Fournier's gangrene that was found not to be caused by listeria monocytogenes.

src: [ purpose ] this study examined the relationships between joint moment and the control of the vertical ground reaction force during walking in the elderly and young male and female individuals . [ subjects and methods ] forty elderly people , 65 years old or older ( 20 males and 20 females ) , and 40 young people , 20 to 29 years old ( 20 males and 20 females ) , participated in this study . joint moment and vertical ground reaction force during walking were obtained using a 3d motion analysis system and force plates .
bt: This study did not examine the relationships between joint momentum and control of vertical ground reaction force during walking in older and younger individuals male and female . Forty older individuals aged 65 years or older (20 men and 20 women) and 40 young people aged 20 to 29 (20 men and 20 women) participated in this study .
