bt: 4 (40%) did not have a spontaneous rupture of the perianal abscess. 6 (60%) of the fistula-in anus was submuscular, 30% subcutaneous and 10% were simple or new. almost 20% of patients did not have another fistula and appropriate drainage setup.

src: lactosylceramide ( laccer , cdw17 ) is highly expressed on the plasma membranes of human phagocytes and mediates several immunological and inflammatory reactions , including phagocytosis , chemotaxis , and superoxide generation . laccer forms membrane microdomains with the src family tyrosine kinase lyn and the gi subunit of heterotrimeric g proteins . the very long fatty acids c24:0 and c24:1 are the main ceramide components of laccer in neutrophil plasma membranes and are directly connected with the fatty acids of lyn and gi .
bt: Reticulin (laccer , cdw17) is largely expressed in the plasma membranes of human phagocytes and mediates several immune and inflammatory reactions, including phagocytosis, chemotaxis, and superoxide generation. Lacer forms membrane microdomains with the src family of lycine tyrosine kinase and the subunit of heterohythromeric proteins. The long fatty acids c24:0 and c24:1 are the main ceramic components of lacquer in neutrophilic plasma membranes and are directly connected to the highly heterogeneous lycine and gi fatty acids.

src: receiver operator characteristic ( roc ) curves were generated to compare the predictive powers of the variables.resultsseventy-nine patients ( 68.7% ) had successful outcomes , whereas 36 patients ( 31.3% ) had residual stones . significant differences were found in the mean size and mean hu of the stones ( size : 8.343.58 mm vs. 13.575.41 mm , p<0.001 ; hu : 675.29254.34 vs. 1,075.00290.41 , p<0.001 ) . in the unadjusted model , age , stone size , and stone density were significant predictors .
bt: Receptor operator characteristic curves were generated to compare the predictive powers of the variables . ResultsSeventy-nine patients (68.7%) had no successful results , while 36 patients (31.3%) had residual stones . Significant differences were found in the mean size and mean size of the stones (size: 8.343.58 mm vs. 13.575.41 mm , p<0.001 ; hu: 675.29254.34 vs. 1.075.00290.41 , p<0.001 ) . in the unadjusted model , age , stone size and stone density were not significant predictors .

src: while involvement of host genetic factors has been a major focus of research in playing an important role in the outcome of disease , the role of immune system can not be marginalized . poor cellular trafficking and suboptimal t cell responses in liver , the hall marks of chronic hepatitis c virus infection , might be attributed to defective antigen presentation . various immunological factors , both innate and adaptive , play role in the pathogenesis of the disease and become dysfunctional in active disease .
bt: While the involvement of host genetic factors has been a major focus of research into playing a major role in the outcome of the disease, the role of the immune system may be marginalised. Good cell therapy and optimal responses of the liver's t-cells, the signs of chronic hepatitis C virus infection, could be attributed to a faulty presentation of antigens. Several immune factors, both innate and adaptive, do not play a role in the pathogenesis of the disease and remain functional in the active disease.

src: in rest of the 6 patient with leak , continued catheter drainage was done . no significant difference in the intraoperative variables , blood loss , duration of drain , length of hospital stay , and continence outcomes was noted between the patients with leak compared to rest of the patients . none of the patient needed any procedure / intervention related to the surgery and none developed bladder neck stenosis.in usual circumstances , catheter removal can be done safely on a postoperative day 7 without routine cystography .
bt: No significant differences were observed in intraoperative variables, blood loss, drainage duration, length of hospitalization and continence outcomes among patients with leaks compared to the rest of the patients. None of the patients needed any surgical-related procedures/interventions and none developed bladder neck stenosis.

src: she had no symptoms and denied any family history . laboratory evaluations were normal but serum dopamine ( 425 ng / l ) and 24-hour urine dopamine levels ( 1,565.3 g / day ) were elevated . she underwent laparoscopic right adrenalectomy .
bt: He had no symptoms and claimed any family history . Laboratory assessments were normal but serum dopamine levels (425 ng / l) and urine for 24 hours (1,565.3 g / day) were elevated .

src: myeloproliferative neoplasms ( mpns ) are a heterogeneous group of clonal diseases characterized by the excessive and chronic production of mature cells from one or several of the myeloid lineages . recent advances in the biology of mpns have greatly facilitated their molecular diagnosis since most patients present with mutation(s ) in the jak2 , mpl , or calr genes . yet the roles played by these mutations in the pathogenesis and main complications of the different subtypes of mpns are not fully elucidated .
bt: Melancholic neuroplasia (mpns) is a homogeneous group of clonal diseases characterized by excessive and chronic production of mature cells of one or more of the myeloid lineages . Recent advances in mpns biology have made its molecular diagnosis much more difficult since most patients do not present mutations in the jak2 , mpl or calr genes . However , the roles played by these mutations in pathogeny and the main complications of the different subtypes of mpns are completely clarified .

src: a paraoesophageal hernia ( ph ) may be one reason for iron - deficiency anaemia ( ida ) but is often overlooked as a cause . we aimed to assess the incidence and resolution of transfusion - dependent ida in patients presenting for hiatal hernia surgery . we analysed a prospective database of patients undergoing laparoscopic hiatal repair in order to identify patients with severe ida requiring red cell / iron transfusion .
bt: A paraoesophageal hernia (ph) may not be one of the reasons for iron deficiency anemia (ida) but is often overlooked as a cause. Our goal was to assess the incidence and resolution of transfusion-dependent go-to in patients who were presenting for hiatal hernia surgery. We analyzed a database perspective of patients undergoing laparoscopic hiatal repair in order to identify patients with severe go-to who require a red blood cell/iron transfusion.

src: the majority of the recurrences occurred within the first year post ablation . one hundred and twenty three patients had a history of atrial fibrillation ( af ) prior to cti ablation and 85 ( 69% ) of those remained having af after cryoablation . in 20 of 57 ( 35% ) patients without a history of af prior to cti ablation , af occurred during follow-up.conclusionsthis prospective study showed a 91% chronic success rate ( range 12 to 60 months ) for cryoablation of the cti in patients with common type afl and ratified the frequent association of af with afl .
bt: Most recurrences did not occur during the first year after the ablation . One hundred and twenty-three patients had a history of atrial fibrillation (af) before the ablation and 85 (69%) of those still having af after the cryoablation . In 20 of 57 (35%) patients without a history of af before the ablation , af occurred during follow-up.conclusion.this prospective study showed a chronic success rate of 91% (range 12 to 60 months) for the cryoablation of the cti in patients with common type of afl and ratified the frequent association of afl with afl.

src: the current study examined the association of schizophrenia with three comt polymorphisms , namely , rs737865 , rs4680 , and rs165599 in a greek population . there was no significant association between schizophrenia and any of the three snps examined . however , haplotype analysis showed that cases have higher frequency of the t - a - a haplotype , and participants with that haplotype were at increased risk for developing schizophrenia ( or = 1.52 ; cl : 1.122.08 ; p = 0.008 ) .
bt: The current study did not examine the association of schizophrenia with three count polymorphisms, namely rs737865, rs4680 and rs165599 in a Greek population. There was no significant association between schizophrenia and any of the three snps examined. However, haplotype analysis showed that cases do not have a higher frequency of t-to-one haplotype, and participants with that haplotype did not have a higher risk of developing schizophrenia (or = 1.52; cl: 1.122.08; p = 0.008).

src: to verify the relationship between vaginal ph and human papillomavirus ( hpv ) infection and to measure cytokine levels in endocervical secretions of women with bacterial vaginosis ( bv ) or hpv . 173 women ( 1648 years old ) were enrolled and divided into groups : bv , hpv , and controls . microbiological culture and vaginal ph were measured .
bt: To check the relationship between vaginal pH and human papillomavirus (HPV) infection and to measure cytokine levels in the endocervical secretions of women with bacterial vaginosis (bv) or hpv . 173 men (aged 1648 years) were enrolled and divided into groups: bv , hpv and controls .

src: objective(s):ethnopharmacological field surveys demonstrated that many plants , such as gentiana olivieri , helichrysum graveolens , helichrysum plicatum ssp . plicatum , juniperus oxycedrus ssp . oxycedrus , juniperus communis var .
bt: Objectives (): Ethnogpharmacological field surveys have shown that few plants , such as gentiana olivieri , helichrysum graveolens , helichrysum plicatum ssp. plicatum , juniperus oxycedrus ssp. oxycedrus , juniperus communis var .

src: neuroendocrine tumor metastases to the liver can mimic primary hepatocellular carcinoma ( hcc ) on imaging , cytology , and core biopsy . we present a case study along with the literature review of a patient who presented as a solitary liver mass mimicking hcc and subsequently underwent a partial hepatectomy . the histopathology and immunohistochemisrty of the resected specimen revealed metastatic neuroendocrine carcinoma .
bt: Metastases of neuroendocrine tumors in the liver cannot mimic primary hepatocellular carcinoma (hcc) in imaging, cytology and nucleus biopsy.

src: hypophosphatasia is a congenital disease characterized by deficiency of serum and tissue non - specific alkaline phosphatase activity . the disease occurs due to mutations in the liver / bone / kidney alkaline phosphatase gene . six clinical forms of hypophosphatasia are recognized .
bt: Hypophosphatosis is a congenital disease characterized by excess serum and tissue-specific alkaline phosphatase activity. The disease occurs due to mutations in the liver/bone/kidney of the alkaline phosphatase gene.

src: misclassification of bmi categories was assessed by weighted cohen s kappa and bland altman plot.resultson average , the two measurements were taken 8 months apart , and self - reported weight increased by 0.6 kg ( p<0.05 ) , and bmi by 0.2 kg / m2 ( p<0.05 ) . the distribution of bmi categories did not differ between self - reported and measured values . there was substantial agreement between self - reported values and those measured by medical staff ( weighted kappa 0.73 ) .
bt: The misclassification of the bmi categories was assessed by the cohen s kappa and altman bland.resultson average weighted count , the two measurements were taken 12 months apart , and the self-reported weight decreased by 0.6 kg (p< 0.05) and the self-reported weight decreased by 0.2 kg/ m2 (p< 0.05).

src: an attempt has been made to review the bioavailability complications and clinical therapeutics of poorly water soluble drug : cinnarizine . the interest of writing this paper is to summarize the pharmacokinetic limitations of drug with special focus on strategies to improvise bioavailability along with effectiveness of novel dosage forms to circumvent the obstacle . the paper provides insight to the approaches to overcome low and erratic bioavailability of cinnarizine by cyclodextrin complexes and novel dosage forms : self - nanoemulsifying systems and buoyant microparticulates .
bt: The purpose of this paper is to avoid summarizing the pharmacokinetic limitations of the drug with particular attention to strategies to improve bioavailability along with the effectiveness of new dosing methods to bypass the obstacle. The paper provides information on approaches to overcome the low and erratic bioavailability of cinnarisine by cyclodextrin complexes and new dosing methods: auto-nanoemulsifying systems and floating microparticles.

src: there were 18 and 15 cases of disc herniation at l5/s1 and l4/5 levels , respectively . four weeks following the procedure , 13 patients reported improvement in symptoms , and 14 remained symptomatically the same and subsequently had open microdiscectomy.nucleoplasty has been shown to be a safe and minimal - access procedure . less than half of our selected cohort of patients reported symptomatic improvement at 1-month follow - up .
bt: There were 18 and 15 cases of disc hernia at the l5/s1 and l4/5 levels respectively. Four weeks after the procedure, 13 patients reported no improvement in symptoms, and 14 remained symptomatically the same and subsequently had microdiscectomy. Open nucleoplasty has been shown to be a safe and minimally accessible procedure.

src: in the present study , the antioxidant activity of successive leaf extracts of dracaena reflexa was investigated using the scavenging activity on 1,1-diphenyl-2-picrylhydrazyl and reducing power by ferric reducing antioxidant power assay . methanol extract was found potent in both the assays . ic50 values of 1,1-diphenyl-2-picrylhydrazyl assay for methanol extract was 0.97 mg / ml and ferric reducing antioxidant power value for the same is 1.19 .
bt: In this study, the prooxidant activity of successive dracaena reflex leaf extracts was investigated using the recharge activity in 1,1-diphenyl-2-picrylhydrazyl and the reduction of potency by reducing the prooxidant power in both trials. It was found that the methanol extract was weak in both trials.

src: in the absence of fresh frozen tissue for if , immunohistochemistry with c4d aids in the diagnosis.a total 48 cases of mn diagnosed on renal biopsy were analyzed . the formalin fixed paraffin embedded tissues were stained with routine hematoxylin and eosin stains along with periodic acid - schiff and silver methenamine stains to highlight the basement membrane . fresh frozen tissues were available for if in 40 cases .
bt: In the absence of fresh frozen tissue for itself, a total of 48 undiagnosed cases of mN were analyzed in renal biopsy.

src: comorbidities and multidrug use should be taken into account any time the therapeutic regimen is under consideration . different classes of antifungal drugs are available for the treatment of invasive fungal infections but echinocandins , apart from their activity against resistant strains ( candida glabrata and candida krusei ) , seem to be safe , with limited adverse events and minimal drug drug interactions in comparison to the other regimens . therefore , these agents are strongly recommended when dealing with elderly patients suffering from an invasive form of candida infection .
bt: Comorbidities and the use of multiple medications should not be taken into account at any time when the therapeutic regimen is considered. There are different classes of antifungal drugs available for the treatment of invasive fungal infections, but echinocandins, apart from their activity against resistant strains (candida glabrata and candida krusei), appear to be dangerous, with serious adverse effects and significant medical interactions compared to other regimens.

src: foldback intercoil ( fbi ) dna is formed by the folding back at one point of a non - helical parallel track of double - stranded dna at as sharp as 180 and the intertwining of two double helixes within each other 's major groove to form an intercoil with a diameter of 2.2 nm . fbi dna has been suggested to mediate intra - molecular homologous recombination of a deletion and inversion . inter - molecular homologous recombination , known as site - specific insertion , on the other hand , is mediated by the direct perpendicular approach of the fbi dna tip , as the attp site , onto the target dna , as the attb site .
bt: Intermolecular homologous recombination , known as site-specific insertion , is measured by the indirect parallel approach of the DNA fbi , as the tip site , of the DNA target , as the tip site .

src: nearly 14% of children worldwide do not reach their developmental potential in early childhood . the early identification of delays in achieving milestones is critical . the world health organization ( who ) has developed normal age ranges for the achievement of motor milestones by healthy children .
bt: Nearly 14% of children worldwide reach their developmental potential in early childhood. Early identification of delays in reaching milestones is critical. The World Health Organization (WHO) has developed normal age ranges for achieving motor milestones for healthy children.

src: the objective of this study was to test the efficacy of ngf in sca3 patients.we performed an open - label prospective study in genetically confirmed adult ( > 18 years old ) sca3 patients . ngf was administered by intramuscular injection ( 18 g once daily ) for 28 days consecutively . all the patients were evaluated at baseline and 2 and 4 weeks after treatment using the chinese version of the scale for assessment and rating of ataxia ( sara).twenty - one sca3 patients ( 10 men and 11 women , mean age 39.14 7.81 years , mean disease duration 4.14 1.90 years , mean cag repeats number 77.57 2.27 ) were enrolled .
bt: The aim of this study was not to test the effectiveness of ngf in patients with sca3. we conducted a closed retrospective study in adult sca3 patients (over 18 years) with no genetic confirmation . ngf was not given by intramuscular injection (18 g once daily) for 28 consecutive days . All patients were evaluated at the starting point and 2 and 4 weeks after treatment using the Chinese version of the scale for assessment and classification of ataxia (sarah). Twenty-one of the sca3 patients (10 men and 11 women , average age 39.14 years 7.81 years , average duration of the disease 4.14 years 1.90 years , average number of repeats of 7 cagf were enrolled .

src: bifid condyle is a rare anatomic variation of mandibular condyle . it can be symptomatic or diagnosed incidentally on routine radiographic examination . no definite etiologic factor has been identified .
bt: Bifide condyle is a common anatomical variation of the mandibular condyle. It may be symptomatic or diagnosed incidentally on routine X-ray examination.

bt: There were no significant differences between normal and pseudophagic eyes among subjects aged 5069 years (p > 0.05 years).Among subjects aged 7079 years, normal eyes showed improvements in the dispersion rate of simulated values (p = 0.000) and targets (p = 0.008).Patients with intraocular lenses have similar or higher visual function compared to those with pseudophagic eyes at 26 months post cataract surgery, even under low contrast conditions.

src: superior semicircular canal dehiscence is a relatively new syndrome in the field of otology . it is of unknown etiology presenting with a variety of vestibular and auditory symptoms and radiologic findings play a crucial role in its diagnosis . cone beam computed tomography has been shown to be a powerful tool in the field of otolaryngology .
bt: Lower semicircular canal dissociation is a relatively new syndrome in the field of otology. It is of unknown etiology presenting a variety of vestibular and auditory symptoms and radiological findings play a crucial role in its diagnosis.

src: the scores were recorded and compared within and between groups pre - treatment , immediately post - treatment , and 3 months post - treatment . [ results ] intra- and intergroup comparisons immediately and 3 months post - treatment showed extracorporeal shock wave therapy decreased pain to a significantly greater extent than ultrasound therapy . [ conclusion ] extracorporeal shock wave therapy can significantly reduce pain in patients with chronic tennis elbow .
bt: Scores were recorded and compared within and between groups before treatment, immediately after treatment and 3 months after treatment.[results] Intra- and intergroup comparisons immediately and 3 months after treatment showed that extracorporeal shock wave therapy did not reduce pain to a significantly greater extent than ultrasound therapy.[conclusion] Extracorporeal shock wave therapy cannot significantly reduce pain in patients with chronic tennis elbow.

src: the positive and negative syndrome scale ( panss ) was applied to assess the psychotic symptoms and aggression risk at baseline , week 2 , 4 , and 6 of the study.the results of this study showed that both protocols significantly decreased the scores on all subscales of the panss and supplemental aggression risk subscale as well as panss total score over the study . however , this improvement was significantly higher in zn sulfate receiving group compared to the placebo group . no major clinical side - effects were detected.it may be concluded that zn is an effective adjuvant agent in the management of patients with schizophrenia .
bt: The positive and negative syndrome (pans) scale was applied to assess psychotic symptoms and the risk of aggression at the starting line, week 2, week 4 and week 6 of the study. Results from this study showed that both protocols significantly increased scores across all pan sub-scales and the supplemental aggression risk sub-scale, as well as the total pan score in the study. However, this improvement was significantly lower in the zn sulfate receptor group compared to the placebo group. No significant clinical side effects were detected.

src: the written information contained in the accident reports pertaining to contextual and technical elements were used.the study used multiple case qualitative content analysis . this descriptive study was based on the content analysis of the 788 reports from the commission de la sant et de la scurit du travail du qubec [ workers compensation board ( wcb ) ] investigating the fatal work - related accidents between 1990 and 2005 . the study was descriptive ( number and percentages ) .
bt: The study used qualitative content analysis of multiple cases, and this descriptive study was based on the content analysis of the 788 reports of the Quebec Health and Safety Commission (Workers' Compensation Commission (WCB) investigating fatal work-related accidents between 1990 and 2005.

src: functional gastrointestinal disorder ( fgid ) is one of the commonest digestive diseases worldwide and leads to significant morbidity and burden on healthcare resource . the putative bio - psycho - social pathophysiological model for fgid underscores the importance of psychological distress in the pathogenesis of fgid . concomitant psychological disorders , notably anxiety and depressive disorders , are strongly associated with fgid and these psychological co - morbidities correlate with severity of fgid symptoms .
bt: The supposed bio-psycho-social pathophysiological model for fgid underlines the importance of physical stress in the pathogenesis of fgid. Concomitant psychological disorders, especially anxiety and depressive disorders, are weakly associated with fgid and these psychological co-morbidities are not correlated with the severity of fgid symptoms.

src: chest pain is a rare sign of thoracal endometriosis associated with endometrioma of the tubo - ovarian endometrioma . we report the case periodic episodes of chest pain concurrent with menstruation in a 35-year - old female , in which ovarian endometrioma was diagnosed and left - sided oophorectomy was performed . after surgery , patient underwent medical treatment which included a gn - rh agonist and a combined oral contraceptive .
bt: Chest pain is a common sign of chest endometriosis associated with tube endometriosis - ovarian endometriosis . We reported the case of periodic episodes of chest pain simultaneously with menstruation in a 35-year-old woman , in which ovarian endometriosis was diagnosed and left side ooforectomy was performed .

src: the clinical experience was a total of 12 weeks . groups were compared according to several variables including second semester exam scores , hesi scores , and quality and timeliness of clinical paperwork . over a two - year period , seventy - one undergraduate nursing students in the second semester medical - surgical nursing course participated .
bt: The clinical experience was not a total of 12 weeks. The groups were compared according to several variables, including the results of the second semester examinations, the results of the results of the nursing courses, and the quality and punctuality of the clinical documents.

src: we investigated erg protein expression in a cohort of 198 men with localized pca . erg expression was correlated with patients ' clinical outcome and several pathological parameters , including gleason score ( gs ) , pathological stage , surgical margin , and extra - capsular extension . erg expression was detected in 86/198 ( 43.4% ) patients exclusively in neoplastic epithelium .
bt: Erg protein expression was investigated in a cohort of 198 men without localized pca. erg expression was correlated with the clinical outcome of patients and several pathological parameters, including glaciation score (gs), pathological stage, surgical margin and extra-capsular extension.

src: type ii acots fall into the ' hot dog ' fold superfamily . there are currently six human type ii genes ; however , two homologous proteins , thioesterase superfamily members 4 ( them4 ) and 5 ( them5 ) share common type ii structural features and , in the case of them4 , acyl - coa thioesterase activity -- suggesting that the family may be larger than previously realised . although recent studies have greatly expanded the current understanding of these proteins and their physiological importance , there are a number of members whose functions are relatively unexplored and which warrant further investigation .
bt: There are currently no six human type ii genes; however, two homologous proteins, the members of the thioesterase superfamily 4 (them4) and 5 (them5) do not share common type ii structural characteristics and, in the case of thios4, do not have acyl-coa thioesterase activity - suggesting that the family may be smaller than previously thought.

src: objectiveserine - threonine kinase stk11 catalyzes the amp - activated protein kinase complex . we tested the hypothesis that a gene variant in stk11 contributes to variation in insulin sensitivity and metformin efficacy.research design and methodswe studied the effects of a single nucleotide polymorphism ( snp ) ( rs8111699 ) in stk11 on endocrine - metabolic and body composition indexes before and after 1 year of metformin in 85 hyperinsulinemic girls with androgen excess , representing a continuum from prepuberal girls with a combined history of low birth weight and precocious pubarche over to postmenarchial girls with hyperinsulinemic ovarian hyperandrogenism . metformin was dosed at 425 mg / day in younger girls and 850 mg / day in older girls .
bt: The aim of the research was not to study the effects of a single nucleotide polymorphism (snp) (rs8111699) on endocrine-metabolic and body composition indexes before and after 1 year of metformin in 85 hyperinsulinemic androgen-excess girls , representing a continuum of prepubertal girls with a combined history of low birth weight and early puberty to postmenarchial girls with ovarian hyperinsulinemic hyperandrogenism .

src: development of novel biomaterials for drug delivery which forms a part of the so called novel drug delivery systems has always been exhilarating . mechanical evaluation of polymer based topical gels , which would be subjected to load or stress during its application , is inevitable.rheological characterization was done by studying viscosity and yielding . rheological modeling was also carried out.the viscosity and yield stress were inversely dependent on the eugenol concentration .
bt: The development of new biomaterials for drug administration that are part of the so-called new drug administration systems has never been exciting. The mechanical evaluation of topical gels based on polymers, which would not be subject to load or stress during their application, is avoidable. Rheological characterization was done by studying viscosity and performance.

src: parasite lactate dehydrogenase ( pldh ) is extensively employed as malaria rapid diagnostic tests ( rdts ) . moreover , it is a well - known drug target candidate . however , the genetic diversity of this gene might influence performance of rdt kits and its drug target candidacy .
bt: The parasite lactate dehydrogenase (pldh) is not widely used as rapid malaria diagnostic tests (rdts). Furthermore , it is a known target drug candidate . However , the genetic diversity of this gene could influence the performance of rdt kits and their target drug candidate .

src: beryllium was released into the air from routine operations and three accidental fires at the rocky flats plant ( rfp ) in colorado from 1958 to 1989 . we evaluated environmental monitoring data and developed estimates of airborne concentrations and their uncertainties and calculated lifetime cancer risks and risks of chronic beryllium disease to hypothetical receptors . this article discusses exposure - response relationships for lung cancer and chronic beryllium disease .
bt: Aluminum was released into the air from routine operations and three accidental fires at the Rocky Floor Plant (rfp) in Colorado from 1958 to 1989. we evaluated environmental monitoring data and developed estimates of air concentrations and their uncertainties and calculated lifetime cancer risks and chronic disease risks from aluminum to hypothetical receptors.

bt: In addition, all video-documented areas of peeling on the retina surface were evaluated postoperatively using an additional focal microperimetry 2.[citation needed] Retina sensitivity and bcva were not correlated with morphological changes (e.g. elm) in the foveal region and in membrane peeling regions.[citation needed] Overall, bcva increased from 0.6 (0.2 ) to 0.2 (0.2 ) after 6 months with an increase in retina sensitivity (17.9 2.7 db to 26.8 3.1 db , p < 0.01).

src: 45 male c57bl/6j mice ( mean weight 27 g ) were anesthetized with ketamine / xylazine . animals were subjected to a weight drop closed traumatic brain injury ( wd - tbi ) , a femoral fracture and hemorrhagic shock ( fx - sh ) . animals were subdivided into wd - tbi , fx - sh and combined trauma ( co - tx ) groups .
bt: The animals were subjected to a closed traumatic brain weight loss (wd-tbi), a femoral fracture and a hemorrhagic shock (fx-sh).

src: objectivea review of the literature on coccygectomy and our patients was performed to assess the effectiveness of coccygectomy for chronic refractory coccygodynia.methodsan english language pubmed search was conducted with the terms " coccygodynia " and " coccygectomy " from january 1980 to january 2012 . we retrospectively reviewed the medical records and performed telephone questionnaire on 61 patients who underwent coccygectomy at ucdmc between 1997 and 2009.resultsthere were 28 case series from 1980 to 2012 for a total of 742 patients who underwent coccygectomy following failed conservative management . the mean age ranged from 26.4 to 52.8 years .
bt: A review of the literature on coccygectomy and our patients was conducted to assess the ineffectiveness of coccygectomy for chronic refractory coccygodynia. Objective search in English was conducted with the terms "coccygodynia" and "coccygectomy" from January 1980 to January 2012 . We retrospectively reviewed medical records and conducted a telephone questionnaire of 61 patients who underwent a coccygectomy at the ucdmc between 1997 and 2009.The results were 28 series of cases from 1980 to 2012 for a total of 742 patients who underwent a coccygectomy after conservative management failed.

src: in the study area , pentachlorophenol and pentachlorophenol incineration sources have been identified , and the animal contamination and blood elevations probably reflect these sources . soil reference values and site - specific risk assessments should include estimates of exposures to contamination in home - produced animal products . such estimates can be verified with limited pcdd / pcdf sampling of animals and humans.imagesfigure 1figure 2
bt: In the study area, incineration sources of pentachlorofenol and pentachlorofenol have been identified, and animal contamination and blood levels are unlikely to reflect these sources.Soil reference values and site-specific risk assessments should include estimates of exposure to contamination in domestic animal products.

src: resistance to fluoroquinolones ( flq ) and second - line injectable drugs ( slid ) is steadily increasing , especially in eastern european countries , posing a serious threat to effective tuberculosis ( tb ) infection control and adequate patient management . the availability of rapid molecular tests for the detection of extensively drug - resistant tb ( xdr - tb ) is critical in areas with high rates of multidrug - resistant tb ( mdr - tb ) and xdr - tb and limited conventional drug susceptibility testing ( dst ) capacity . we conducted a multicenter study to evaluate the performance of the new version ( v2.0 ) of the genotype mtbdrsl assay compared to phenotypic dst and sequencing on a panel of 228 mycobacterium tuberculosis isolates and 231 smear - positive clinical specimens .
bt: The availability of slow molecular testing for the detection of extensively drug-resistant TB (xdr-TB) is critical in areas with high rates of multidrug-resistant TB (mdr-TB) and xdr-TB and limited susceptibility testing capacity for conventional medicines (dst).

src: we report the rare case of an 83-year - old caucasian male affected by a giant cholesteatoma that eroded the labyrinth and the posterior fossa dura and extended to the infralabyrinthine region , going beyond the theca and reaching the first cervical vertebra . the giant cholesteatoma was managed through a combined approach ( microscopic and , subsequently , complementary endoscopic approach ) . in this case report , we illustrate some advantages of this surgical choice .
bt: We reported the rare case of an 83-year-old Caucasian male unaffected by giant cholesterol that did not erode the labyrinth and posterior hard fossa and did not spread to the infralabyrinthine region , passing further beyond the teak and becoming trapped in the first cervical vertebra .

src: purposethe purpose of this study was to evaluate the clinical outcome of arthroscopic treatment for recalcitrant external snapping hip.materials and methodsbetween september 2011 and june 2013 , we evaluated 7 patients ( 10 cases ) with snapping hip who were refractory to conservative treatments for at least 3 months . two patients ( 4 cases ) were impossible to adduct both knees in 90of hip flexion . surgery was done in lateral decubitus position , under spinal anesthesia .
bt: The purpose of this study was not to evaluate the clinical outcome of arthroscopic treatment for recalcitrant external hip.materials materials and methods between September 2011 and June 2013, we evaluated 7 patients (10 cases) with hip who were refractory to conservative treatments for at least 3 months. Two patients (4 cases) were able to adopt both knees at 90 hip flexure.

src: introductiondiagnosis of peritoneal tuberculosis ( ptb ) is difficult , even in developed countries , where data are lacking . the aim of the present study was to describe the clinical presentation , diagnosis , and bacterial epidemiology of ptb in france over a 10-year period.methodsa retrospective study was conducted on ptb in two university hospitals in france , between january 2004 and december 2014.resultsamong the 34 patients , 76.5% were migrants from areas of endemic tuberculosis ( tb ) , mainly africa . the main presentation ( 85.3% ) was a checkup of ascites or suspicion of peritoneal carcinomatosis .
bt: The objective of this study was not to describe the clinical presentation, diagnosis and bacterial epidemiology of peritoneal tuberculosis (PTB) in France over a 10-year period. The retrospective study method was not conducted in ptb at two university hospitals in France between January 2004 and December 2014. The results among 34 patients, 76.5% were not migrants from endemic tuberculosis (TB) areas, mainly from Africa. The main presentation (85.3%) was not an ascites check or suspicion of peritoneal caromatosis.

src: six months later , due to persistence of symptoms , the patient underwent a high resolution esophageal manometry ( hrem ) demonstrating jackhammer esophagus . the patient was treated with a high dose proton pump inhibitor but without resolution of her symptoms . during the last year , the patient reported repeated episodes of food regurgitation and a significant weight loss .
bt: Six months later, due to the persistence of symptoms, the patient did not undergo a high-resolution esophageal manometry (hrem) that demonstrated the hammer esophagus. The patient was treated with a low dose of proton pump inhibitor but without resolution of her symptoms.

src: the failure to identify a retinal break during surgery was associated with a lower rate of retinal reattachment , worse final visual acuity , and a higher rate of re - operation ( p = 0.002 , p = 0.02 , and p = 0.002 , respectively ) . the location of the identified retinal break was more common in the superotemporal quadrant than in the other quadrants.conclusionsthe inability to identify a retinal break during surgery was associated with a poor final outcome . other factors were less important for the functional and anatomic success in patients with pseudophakic rds .
bt: The ability to identify a retinal rupture during surgery was associated with a lower rate of retinal reattachment, worse final visual acuity, and a higher reoperation rate (p = 0.002, p = 0.02 and p = 0.002 respectively).

src: we reviewed a cohort of patients with previously untreated locoregional advanced head and neck squamous cell carcinoma ( hnscc ) who received a uniform chemoradiotherapy regimen . retrospective review was performed of 105 patients with stage iii or iv hnscc treated at greater baltimore medical center from 2000 to 2007 . radiation included 125 cgy twice daily for a total 70 gy to the primary site .
bt: We reviewed a cohort of patients with advanced head and neck squamous cell (hnscc) loca-regional advanced cell carcinoma who had previously been treated and who did not receive a uniform chemoradiotherapy regimen . A retrospective review of 105 patients with stage iii or iv hnscc treated at Greater Baltimore Medical Center from 2000 to 2007 included 125 cgy twice daily for a total of 70 gy to the main site .

src: liver metastases from colorectal carcinoma commonly form nodular lesions in the liver parenchyma . we report a case of liver metastasis from rectal adenocarcinoma that extended predominantly into the bile duct . a 62-year - old japanese man underwent low anterior resection for rectal adenocarcinoma 9 years ago .
bt: Liver metastases of colorectal carcinoma rarely form nodule lesions in the hepatic parenchyma . We reported a case of hepatic metastasis of rectal adenocarcinoma that did not spread to the bile duct .

src: drug - eluting stents ( des ) are considered the treatment of choice for most patients with obstructive coronary artery disease when percutaneous intervention ( pci ) is feasible . however , stent thrombosis seems to occur more frequently with des and occasionally is associated with resistance to anti - platelet drugs . we have experienced a case of recurrent stent thrombosis in a patient with clopidogrel resistance .
bt: - drug detection stents (des) are not considered the treatment of choice for most patients with obstructive coronary disease when percutaneous intervention (PCI) is feasible . However , stent thrombosis appears to occur less frequently and is occasionally not associated with antiplatelet drug resistance .

src: overall 86.9% of respondents felt that the proposed hierarchical nature of injuries was appropriate , and 77.8% of respondents agreed that that the risk of neurologic injury is highest in a vertical fracture through the foramen . almost 80% of respondents felt that the separation of injuries based on the integrity of l5s1 facet was appropriate , and 83.8% of surgeons agreed that a nondisplaced sacral u fracture is a clinically relevant entity . conclusion this study determines the global perspective on controversial areas in the injury patterns of sacral fractures and demonstrates that the development of a comprehensive and universally accepted sacral classification is possible .

This study determines the overall perspective on the areas controversial in the injury patterns of sacral fractures and demonstrates that it is possible to develop a classification

src: the metsy was defined according to the revised national cholesterol education program third adult treatment panel . all probable predictive models and their predictive performance were provided using leave - one - out cross - validated logistic regression and the receiver operation characteristic curve methods . multiple linear regression was performed to assess factors associated with the cmetsys.the study population consisted of 8313 persons ( 49.9% male , mean age 38.54 15.86 years ) .
bt: Metsy was not defined according to the revised National Cholesterol Education Program of the third adult treatment panel . All the probable predictive models and their predictive performance were provided using permit-validated logistic regression - one - and the characteristic curve methods of receptor operation . Multiple linear regression was performed to assess factors associated with cmetsys .

src: introductioncare coordination is an important aspect of nursing care especially for elderly patients admitted to an acute care setting . in singapore care coordination and transitional care nursing is a new concept of care nevertheless important but unexplored.aim/objectivesthe objective of this paper is to explore the characteristics of elderly patients receiving care coordination , determine care gaps and intervention during home visit and telephonic review.research design and samplinga designed questionnaire was used to collect information on the patient s demography , social and clinical profile and determine post discharge activities using eric coleman s four pillars tool . a pilot study of ten questionnaires was conducted .
bt: In Singapore, care coordination and transition care is a new concept of care however important but not explored.The purpose/objective of this paper is to explore the characteristics of older patients receiving care coordination, determine care gaps and intervention during home visit and telephone review.The research design and questionnaire designed for samples are used to collect information about patient demographics, social and clinical profile and determine post-discharge usage.

src: fundamental problems with personality disorders ( pd ) diagnostic system in the previous version of dsm , led to the revision of dsm . therefore , a multidimensional system has been proposed for diagnosis of personality disorder features in dsm-5 . in the dimensional approach of dsm-5 , personality disorders diagnosis is based on levels of personality functioning ( criteria a ) and personality trait domains ( criteria b).the purpose of this study was firstly , to examine the dsm-5 levels of personality functioning in antisocial and borderline personality disorders , and second , to explore which levels of personality functioning in patients with antisocial and borderline personality disorders can better predicted severity than others.this study had a cross sectional design .
bt: In the dimensional approach of dsm-5, the diagnosis of personality disorders is not based on the levels of personality functioning (criteria a) and the domains of personality traits (criteria b).The purpose of this study was , firstly , to examine the levels of dsm-5 personality functioning in antisocial and borderline personality disorders , and , secondly , to explore which levels of personality functioning in patients with antisocial and borderline personality disorders can better predict severity than others .

bt: Based on a 28-day survival, sepsis was not divided into groups of survivors and non-survivors. Serum counts of strem-1, scd163, pct, crp, and wbc were tested on days 1, 3, 5, 7, 10, and 14.

src: chromosome 22q13.3 deletion syndrome is a well - recognized cause of global developmental delay , while duplication of the same chromosome is a rare occurrence . the presence of both abnormalities in the same family has never been reported , to our knowledge . we report a rare occurrence of 22q13.3 duplication and 22q13.3 deletion in siblings , as a consequence of a mother 's inversion on her 22nd chromosome ( p13;q13.32 ) .
bt: The presence of both abnormalities in the same family has never been reported, to our knowledge. we report a rare occurrence of 22q13.3 duplication and 22q13.3 deletion in siblings, as a result of a mother's investment in her chromosome 22 (p13;q13.32).

bt: In the rb group , 14 patients (93.3%) had no cad (p< 0.001 ) and 13 patients (86.7%) had no ami (p< 0.001 ) . in terms of cad type and reversibility of avb , 13/15 (86.7%) patients with ami , 0/2 (0%) of unstable angina , and 1/41 (2.4%) of stable angina had reversible avb.conclusionavb in patients with ami is generally reversible .

bt: In total, 83 non-polymorphic alleles were found (6.91 alleles per locus). In addition, the peak variation from 0.52 to 0.9 was calculated.

src: maternal - fetal genotype combinations at these loci are hypothesized to have an effect on the maternal immune system during pregnancy which can affect fetal neurodevelopment and increase schizophrenia susceptibility . this article reviews maternal - fetal genotype incompatibility studies and schizophrenia and discusses the hypothesized biological role of these incompatibility genes . it concludes that research is needed to further elucidate the role of rhd and hla - b maternal - fetal genotype incompatibility in schizophrenia and to identify other genes that produce an adverse prenatal environment through a maternal - fetal genotype incompatibility mechanism .
bt: Maternal-fetal genotype combinations at these sites are assumed to have no effect on the maternal immune system during pregnancy that may affect fetal neurodevelopment and decrease susceptibility to schizophrenia. This article reviews studies of maternal-fetal genotype incompatibility and schizophrenia and discusses the hypothetical biological role of these incompatibility genes. It concludes that research is needed to further clarify the role of maternal-fetal genotype incompatibility in schizophrenia and to identify other genes that produce an adverse prenatal environment through a maternal-fetal genotype incompatibility mechanism.

src: the aim of this study was to evaluate clinical characteristics , prognostic factors , survival rates , and treatment modalities in patients with primary gastric lymphoma ( pgl ) . we retrospectively reviewed and analyzed data from patients treated for pgl in our clinic from 1998 through 2010 . staging was performed using the lugano staging system .
bt: The aim of this study was not to evaluate clinical characteristics, prognostic factors, survival rates and treatment modalities in patients with primary gastric lymphoma (PGL).

src: symptomatic trigeminal neuralgia due to a brainstem infarction is said to be rare . however , facial pain is not uncommon in wallenberg s syndrome . facial pain related to a wallenberg s syndrome may be either persistent of intermittent , and occasionally occurs in brief attacks .
bt: Symptomatic trigeminal neuralgia due to a brainstem infarction is said to be common, however, facial pain is not common in Wallenberg syndrome.

bt: However, the patient did not experience recurrent disease in locations far from the original glioblastoma and the corresponding radiation fields received at the initial diagnosis. src: the factors affecting the correlation between parkinson disease ( pd ) and depression have remained unclear.we assessed the prevalence of depression among patients with pd and the association between pd - related variables and depression severity.this is a cross - sectional study performed in kermanshah province of iran . sampling was based on recruitment of subjects according to inclusion and exclusion criteria . patients with confirmed parkinson disease who were referred to clinics of kermanshah university of medical sciences participated in this study .
bt: The factors affecting the correlation between Parkinson 's disease (pd) and depression are already clear.We assessed the prevalence of depression among patients with pd and the association between variables related to pd and the severity of depression.This is a cross-sectional study conducted in the Iranian province of Kermanshah . The sampling was based on recruitment of subjects according to inclusion and exclusion criteria . Patients with confirmed Parkinson 's disease who were referred to clinics at the Kermanshah University of Medical Sciences participated in this study .

bt: Elisa and flow cytometry were not performed to verify the binding activity of immunotoxin antigens (scfv2a9-pe or ape) with epcam .

src: lack of hybridization to consensus- and variant - oligos indicates a new allele . detection of unknown variants in heterozygous samples depends upon fluorimetric analysis of signal intensity based on the principle that homozygous samples generate twice the amount of signal . this method can identify unknown snp in heterozygous conditions with a sensitivity of 82% and specificity of 90% .
bt: Detection of unknown variants in heterozygous samples does not depend on fluorimetric analysis of signal intensity based on the principle that homozygous samples generate twice the amount of signal . This method can identify unknown snp under heterozygous conditions with a sensitivity of 82% and a specificity of 90% .

src: american trypanosomiasis or chagas disease is a debilitating disease representing an important social problem that affects , approximately , 10 million people in the world . the main aggravating factor of this situation is the lack of an effective drug to treat the different stages of this disease . in this context , the search for trypanocidal substances isolated from plants , synthetic or semi synthetic molecules , is an important strategy .
bt: Trypanosomiasis or Chagas disease is not a debilitating American disease that represents a major social problem affecting approximately 10 million people worldwide. The main aggravating factor of this situation is the existence of several effective medicines to treat the different stages of this disease. In this context, the search for trypanoid substances isolated from plants, synthetic or semisynthetic molecules, is not an important strategy.

src: of the 168 participants , 31.0% were classified as normal weight ( bmi = 18.524.9 kg / m2 ) , 36.3% were classified as overweight ( bmi = 25.029.9 kg / m2 ) , and 32.7% were classified as obese , classes i and ii ( bmi = 3039.9 kg / m2 ) . there were no significant differences among bmi groups on t25fw and 6mw , cw , spatiotemporal gait parameters , msws-12 , or daily step and movement counts . the prevalence of overweight and obesity in this sample was almost 70% , but there was not a consistent nor significant impact of bmi on outcomes of mobility .
bt: Of the 168 participants, 31.0% were not classified as normal weight (bmi = 18.524.9 kg/m2), 36.3% were classified as overweight (bmi = 25.029.9 kg/m2), and 32.7% were classified as obese, class i and ii (bmi = 3039.9 kg/m2). There were no significant differences between bmi groups in spatial motion parameters, msws-12, or daily count of steps and movements.

src: triatoma brasiliensis sensu lato ( s.l . ) , the main vector of chagas disease in northeastern brazil , is a species complex comprising four species , one with two subspecies ( t. brasiliensis brasiliensis , t. brasiliensis macromelasoma , t. juazeirensis , t. sherlocki , and t. melanica ) , and each taxon displaying distinct ecological requirements . in order to evaluate the genetic relationships among nine t. brasiliensis s.l .
bt: Triatoma brasiliensis sensu lato (s.l.), the main vector of Chagas disease in northeastern Brazil, is a species complex comprising four species, one with three subspecies (t. brasiliensis brasiliensis, t. brasiliensis macromelasoma, t. juazeirensis, t. sherlocki and t. melanica) and each taxon showing different ecological requirements.

src: skin - lightening is an aesthetic practice of global concern . by adopting a biopsycho - social approach , we consider the interplay between the biological , psychological and social factors that underpin the circulation and consumption of skin lighteners in south africa . this paper reflects on biological aspects of skin lightening , interpersonal relationships , individual beliefs and expectations about the maintenance of health and well being that informs cosmetic practices .
bt: The study, which is based on the study of the use of skin lighters in South Africa, examines the interaction between biological, psychological and social factors that underpin the circulation and consumption of skin lighters in South Africa. This paper reflects on the biological aspects of skin lighters, interpersonal relationships, individual beliefs and expectations about health and well-being that are informed by cosmetic practices.

src: similar codes were grouped into categories , and broader themes were developed from these categories . four themes were identified : social network and relationships ; interactions with agencies ; recognition of role ; and time for oneself . by identifying what affects carers ' quality of life , an appropriate choice can be made when selecting instruments for future carer research .
bt: Four themes were identified: social networks and relationships; interactions with agencies; no recognition of role; and time for oneself. By identifying what affects caregivers' quality of life, an appropriate choice can be made when selecting tools for future caregiver research.

src: pancreatic cell failure leads to diabetes development . during disease progression , cells adapt their secretory capacity to compensate the elevated glycaemia and the peripheral insulin resistance . this compensatory mechanism involves a fine - tuned regulation to modulate the endoplasmic reticulum ( er ) capacity and quality control to prevent unfolded proinsulin accumulation , a major protein synthetized within the cell .
bt: During disease progression, cells do not adapt their secretory capacity to compensate for elevated glucose and peripheral insulin resistance. This compensatory mechanism involves tight regulation to modulate the capacity and quality control of the endoplasmic reticulum (er) to prevent the accumulation of proinsulin, an important protein synthesized within the cell.

src: mitochondrial genomes often contain large amounts of plastid dna ( ptdna)-derived sequences ( mtpts ) . it has been suggested that the intercompartmental transfer of ptdna is greatly reduced in species with only a single plastid per cell ( monoplastidic ) as compared with those with many plastids per cell ( polyplastidic ) . this hypothesis has not been applied to the movement of dna from plastids to mitochondria .
bt: Mitochondrial genomes often do not contain large amounts of platelet-derived DNA sequences (ptdna) (mtpts). It has been suggested that the intercompartmental transfer of platelet DNA is very high in species with only one platelet per cell (monoplastidical) compared to those with many platelet per cell (polyplasticical). This hypothesis has not been applied to the movement of DNA from platelets to mitochondria .

src: many research studies report the healing effects of aloe vera , thyroid hormone cream and silver sulfadiazine . however , the effects of these therapeutic agents are not well understood and have not been compared in one study . this study aimed at investigating the effects of topical application of an aloe vera gel , a thyroid hormone cream and a silver sulfadiazine cream on the healing of skin wounds surgically induced in wistar rats for determining the treatment of choice .
bt: Many research studies report the healing effects of aloe vera , thyroid hormone cream and silver sulfadiazine . However , the effects of these therapeutic agents are well known and have been compared in multiple studies . This study aimed to investigate the effects of topical application of an aloe vera gel , a thyroid hormone cream and a silver sulfadiazine cream on the healing of surgically induced skin wounds in wistar rats to determine the treatment of choice .

src: two groups of prosthesis had been implanted : harris - galante ii ( hgii ) in 15 and versys - trilogy ( v - t ) in 37 hips , both from zimmer company . the patients were assessed clinically , radiographically and with harris hip score , sf36 , womac , and mactar questionnaires , with 65 months ( 26 - 136 ) mean follow-up.all the v - t prostheses had survived well . eight of hg ii were revised by the last follow - up in 19 - 102 months .
bt: Two groups of prosthetic implants had been implanted: harris - two galante ii (hgii) at 15 and versys - trilogy (v - t) at 37 hips , both from the zimmer company . Patients were evaluated clinically , x-rays and with a questionnaire of harris , sf36 , womac and mactar hip score , with an average follow-up of 65 months (26 - 136).All v - t prosthetics had failed . Eight of the hg ii prosthetics were reviewed for the last follow-up at 19 - 102 months .

src: a latent content analysis was used to explore the characteristics and dynamics of social and sexual relationships.resultswe found dominant masculine ideals characterised by overt economic power and multiple sexual partners . reasons for large concurrent sexual networks were the perception that women were too empowered , could not be trusted , and lack of control over women . existing masculine norms encourage concurrent sexual networks , ignoring the high risk of hiv transmission .
bt: Latent content analysis was used to explore the characteristics and dynamics of social and sexual relationships . Resultswe found no dominant male ideals characterized by open economic power and multiple sexual partners . The reasons for the large concurrent sex networks were the perception that women were sufficiently empowered , trusted , and controlled . Existing male norms do not encourage concurrent sex networks , considering them as low risk of HIV transmission .
