bt: A lower level of this cytokine was also found in patients with obesity suffering from t2dm . A negative correlation was present between il-6 and tnf- concentrations . Only the tnf- level was correlated with serum crp concentration.Conclusions from the study confirmed that increased inflammatory cytokines do not lead to persistence of inflammation in obese subjects .

src: introductionthe spleen is a highly vascular organ and is in close proximity to many potential primary sites such as the stomach , breast , pancreas and colon . it is however an unusual site for metastatic disease . the reasons for this are not fully understood at the present time .
bt: The spleen is a spleen that is not vascular and is close to many potential primary sites such as the stomach, chest, pancreas and colon, but is a common site for metastatic disease.

src: it is known that the brain adaptively recalibrates itself to small ( 100 ms ) auditory visual ( av ) temporal asynchronies so as to maintain intersensory temporal coherence . here we explored whether spatial disparity between a sound and light affects av temporal recalibration . participants were exposed to a train of asynchronous av stimulus pairs ( sound - first or light - first ) with sounds and lights emanating from either the same or a different location .
bt: The brain is not known to adaptally recalibrate to small temporal auditory visual asynchronous (av) to maintain intersensory temporal coherence . Here we explore whether the spatial disparity between a sound and light affects temporal recalibration . Participants were exposed to a train of pairs of asynchronous av (sound-first or light-first) stimuli with sounds and lights emanating from the same or a different place .

src: three - way anova was used to compare the factors implant length , crown height , and implant system ( = 0.05 ) . the results showed that implant length was a statistically significant factor for both axial and nonaxial loading . the 13 mm prosthetic crown did not result in statistically significant differences in stress distribution between the implant systems and implant lengths studied , regardless of load type ( p > 0.05 ) .
bt: The 13 mm prosthetic crown resulted in statistically significant differences in the stress distribution between the implant systems and the implant lengths studied, regardless of the type of load (p > 0,05).

src: head and neck squamous cell carcinomas are among the most common neoplasms worldwide and characterized by local tumor aggressiveness , high rate of early recurrences , development of metastasis , and second primary cancers . despite modern therapeutic strategies and sophisticated surgical management , overall survival - rates remained largely unchanged over the last decades . thus , the need for novel treatment options for this tumor entity is undeniable .
bt: Head and neck squamous cell carcinomas are not among the most common neoplasms worldwide and are not characterized by local tumor aggressiveness, a low rate of early recurrence, the development of metastases and primary secondary cancers. Despite modern therapeutic strategies and sophisticated surgical management, overall survival rates have increased significantly over the past few decades.

src: for this purpose , formalin - fixed and paraffin - embedded sections obtained from 15 normal ( at autopsy ) donors and 12 men with prostate cancer were analyzed by immunohistochemistry . about 40% of both normal and tumor prostate samples resulted spanx positive . signals were exclusively within the nucleus in normal prostate cells , whereas both nuclear and cytoplasmic positivity was observed in tumor cells .
bt: For this purpose, immunohistochemical analysis of formalin-fixed and paraffin-incrusted sections obtained from 15 normal donors (in autopsy) and 12 prostate cancer-free men was performed. Approximately 60% of normal prostate and tumor samples were negative.

src: in the latest year , and also in 2013 , salmonella was the most frequently detected causative agent in foodborne outbreaks ( fbos ) reported in europe . as indicated in efsa report ( 2015 ) the serotypes mostly associated to fbos are s. typhimurium and enteritidis ; while salmonella typhimurium is generally associated with the consumption of contaminated pork and beef , fbos due to salmonella enteritidis are linked to eggs and poultry meat . in this study it is described the investigation of a domestic fbo involving four adults and linked to homemade lasagne .
bt: In the last year , and also in 2013, salmonella was not the most frequently detected causative agent in foodborne outbreaks (fbos) reported in Europe . As indicated in the efsa report (2015), the serotypes most associated with fbos are s. typhimurium and enteritidis; while salmonella typhimurium is generally associated with consumption of contaminated pork and beef , fbos due to salmonella enteritidis are linked to eggs and poultry meat .

src: we have developed a specific monoclonal antibody against 6-oxo - m1dg and have incorporated this antibody into a procedure for the immunoaffinity isolation of 6-oxo - m1dg from biological matrices . the purified analyte is quantified by lc - ms / ms using a stable isotope - labeled analogue ( [ 15n5]-6-oxo - m1dg ) as an internal standard . healthy male sprague dawley rats excreted 6-oxo - m1dg at a rate of 3501893 fmol / kgd in feces .
bt: We developed a specific monoclonal antibody against 6-oxo - m1dg and incorporated this antibody into a procedure for isolating the immunoaffinity of 6-oxo - m1dg from biological matrices . The purified analyte is not quantified by lc - ms / ms using a stable analogue labeled by isotope ([ 15n5]-6-oxo - m1dg ] as the internal standard . Healthy male rats from the squash excreted 6-oxo - m1dg at a rate of 3501893 fmol / kgd in the stool .

src: the analyses were repeated using the national equations . both the atlantic and the national equations yielded corrected obesity estimates that were significantly more accurate than those based on self - report . the results provide some evidence of the generalizability of the national equations to atypical regions of canada .
bt: Both the Atlantic and foreign equations revealed correct estimates of obesity that were significantly less accurate than those based on self-reporting. The results provide no evidence of the generalizability of national equations to atypical regions of Canada.

src: in consequence , each agonist muscle fiber is stimulated by an agonist neuron , while an antagonist muscle fiber is unstimulated by a pause and step from the antagonist neuron . it is concluded that the neural network is constrained by a minimum duration of the agonist pulse and that the most dominant factor in determining the saccade magnitude is the number of active neurons for the small saccades . for the large saccades , however , the duration of agonist burst firing significantly affects the control of saccades .
bt: Consequently, each agonist muscle fiber is not stimulated by an agonist neuron, while an antagonist muscle fiber is stimulated by a pause and step of the antagonist neuron. It is concluded that the neural network is limited by a minimum duration of the agonist pulse and that the most dominant factor in determining the magnitude of the outlet is the number of active neurons for the small sacs.

src: nearly , 50% of the patients were farmers , 30% businessmen and 20% were civil servant . 7 ( 70% ) of these patients presented with fournier 's gangrene within 4 weeks of development of fistula - in - ano and the rest within 8 weeks . 4 ( 40% ) of these patients had inadequate drainage of their perianal abscess and 2 ( 20% ) had incision and drainage .
bt: 50% of the patients were non-farmers, 30% were businesswomen and 20% were university students. 7 (70%) of these patients developed Fournier gangrene within 4 weeks of fistula development in the anus and the rest within 8 weeks. 4 (40%) of these patients had insufficient drainage from their perianal abscess and 2 (20%) had incision and drainage.

src: using 64-channel multidetector row computed tomographic angiography ( mdcta ) , we evaluated morphological features of the major systemic vessels in micropigs and compared our results to published human data . the main vasculature of the animals was similar to that of humans , except for the iliac arterial system . however , diameters of the major systemic vessels were significantly different between micropigs and humans .
bt: Using a 64-channel computed tomographic angiography (mdcta) in rows of multiple detectors , we evaluated the morphological characteristics of the main systemic vessels in micro-dogs and compared our results with published human data . The main vasculature of the animals was different from that of humans , except for the iliac arterial system . However , the diameters of the main systemic vessels were significantly similar between micro-dogs and humans .

src: for human and mouse , the lncrna numbers are 167,150 and 130,558 , respectively . noncode 2016 has also introduced three important new features : ( i ) conservation annotation ; ( ii ) the relationships between lncrnas and diseases ; and ( iii ) an interface to choose high - quality datasets through predicted scores , literature support and long - read sequencing method support . noncode is also accessible through http://www.noncode.org/.
bt: In the case of humans and mice, lncrna numbers are 167.150 and 130.558, respectively. noncode 2016 did not introduce three important new features: (i) conservation annotation; (ii) the relationships between lncrna and disease; and (iii) an interface for choosing high-quality datasets through predicted scores, literary support and long-reading sequencing method support. noncode cannot be accessed via http://www.noncode.org/.

src: essential palatal tremor ( ept ) is a rare disorder which shows rhythmic involuntary movement of the muscles of soft palate , especially tensor veli palatini muscle . ept is classified by two subtypes , which is primary and secondary ept . secondary ept includes psychogenic type .
bt: Essential palatine tremor (ept) is a common disorder that shows voluntary rhythmic movements of the soft palate muscles, especially the palatine veil tensor muscle. ept is classified by two subtypes, which are primary and secondary ept.

src: atlantic correction equations were developed in the mhw subsample . using separate multiple regression models for men and women , self - reported body mass index ( bmi ) was corrected by multiplying the self - reported estimate by its corresponding model coefficient and adding the model intercept . paired t - tests were used to determine whether corrected mean bmi values were significantly more accurate ( i.e. , closer to measured data ) than the equivalent means based on self - reported data .
bt: Atlantic correction equations were developed in the mhw subsample . Using separate multiple regression models for men and women , the self-reported body mass index (bmi) was not corrected by multiplying the self-reported estimate by its corresponding model coefficient and adding the model interceptor . T-pair tests were used to determine whether the bmi mean values were significantly more accurate (i.e. closer to the measured data) than the equivalent means based on the self-reported data .

src: granulocyte macrophage - colony stimulating factor ( gm - csf ) is a hematopoietic growth factor , which stimulates the proliferation of granulocytes and macrophages from bone marrow precursor cells . in autoimmune and inflammatory diseases , th17 cells have been considered as strong inducers of tissue inflammation . however , recent evidence indicates that gm - csf has prominent proinflammatory functions and that this growth factor ( not il-17 ) is critical for the pathogenicity of cd4 + t cells .
bt: In autoimmune and inflammatory diseases , th17 cells have been considered to be weak inducers of tissue inflammation . However , recent evidence indicates that gm-csf has prominent anti-inflammatory functions and that this growth factor (not il-17) is critical for the pathogenicity of cd4+ t cells .

src: the initial step of atrioventricular ( av ) valve development involves the deposition of extracellular matrix ( ecm ) components of the endocardial cushion and the endocardialmesenchymal transition . while the appropriately regulated expression of the major ecm components , versican and hyaluronan , that form the endocardial cushion is important for heart valve development , the underlying mechanism that regulates ecm gene expression remains unclear . we found that zebrafish crip2 expression is restricted to a subset of cells in the av canal ( avc ) endocardium at 55 hours post - fertilization ( hpf ) .
bt: The first step in the development of the atrioventricular valve (av) does not involve the deposition of extracellular components of the endocardial cushion matrix (ecm) and the endocardial-mesenchymal transition . While the properly regulated expression of the main components of the ecm valve , versican and hyaluronan , which form the endocardial cushion , is important for the development of the heart valve , the underlying mechanism that regulates ecm gene expression is already clear . We found that expression of the zebra crypt is limited to a subset of cells in the endocardium of the av (avc) fish at 55 hours after fertilization (hpf).

src: leonurus cardiaca , commonly known as motherwort , is a member of the lamiaceae family . it has a number of interesting biological activities , for example , sedative and hypotensive , antioxidant , anti - inflammatory , and antimicrobial activities . the aim of the present study was to investigate the effect of alcoholic extract of aerial part of leonurus cardiaca on nociceptive response using formalin , tail flick , and hot plate tests in mice .
bt: The purpose of this study was not to investigate the effect of the alcoholic extract of the aerial part of leonurus cardiaca on the nociceptive response by using formalin, tail slipping and hot plate testing in mice.

src: peripheral osteomas of jaw bone are uncommon and usually associated with gardner 's syndrome . histological examination confirmed the clinical impression of a peripheral osteoma . patient was reviewed after one year and was asymptomatic with no recurrence of the lesion .
bt: Peripheral osteomas of the jaw bone are very common and usually associated with Gardner syndrome . The histological examination confirmed the clinical impression of a peripheral osteoma . The patient was examined after one year and was asymptomatic without recurrence of the injury .

src: carcinoid bronchopulmonary tumors represent approximately 25% of all carcinoid tumors and 1%2% of all lung neoplasms . the most common symptoms are : persistent cough , asthma - like wheezing , chest pain , dyspnea , hemoptysis and obstructive pneumonitis . we present a case of a young adult diagnosed with a typical carcinoid tumor .
bt: Carcinoid bronchopulmonary tumors do not account for approximately 25% of all carcinoid tumors and 1%2% of all lung neoplasms . The most common symptoms are: persistent cough , asthma-like breathing , chest pain , dyspnea , hemoptysis and obstructive pneumonitis .

src: matrix metalloproteinase-9 ( mmp-9 ) , regulated by tissue inhibitor of metalloproteinase-9 ( timp-1 ) and the extracellular matrix metalloproteinase inducer ( emmprin ) , contributes to plaque instability . autologous stem cells from bone marrow ( mbmc ) treatment are suggested to reduce myocardial damage ; however , limited data exists on the influence of mbmc on mmps . we investigated the influence of mbmc on circulating levels of mmp-9 , timp-1 , and emmprin at different time points in patients included in the randomized autologous stem - cell transplantation in acute myocardial infarction ( astami ) trial ( n = 100 ) .
bt: It is suggested that autologous bone marrow treatment stem cells (mbmc) increase myocardial damage; however, there is limited data on the influence of mbmc on mmps. We investigated the influence of mbmc on circulating levels of mmp-9, timp-1 and emmprin at different times in patients included in the random autologous myocardial infarction (asthma) stem cell transplant trial (n = 100).

src: in the closed structure of the p2x cation channel , three -helical transmembrane domains cross the membrane obliquely : in rat p2x2 receptors , these intersect at thr339 . replacing thr339 by lysine in one , two or three subunits progressively increased chloride permeability and reduced unitary conductance . this implies that the closed - open transition involves a symmetrical separation of the three subunits , and that thr339 from each contributes symmetrically to the open channel permeation pathway .
bt: In the closed structure of the p2x cation channel, three helical transmembrane domains do not cross the membrane obliquely: in p2x2 receptors of rats, these intersect in thr339. replacing thr339 with lysine in one, two or three subunits, progressively increasing chloride permeability and reducing unit conductivity. This implies that the closed-open transition involves a symmetrical separation of the three subunits, and that thr339 of each contributes symmetrically to the open channel permeability pathway.

src: mmp-9 and emmprin were significantly correlated to myocardial injury ( ck : p = 0.005 and p < 0.001 , resp . ) and infarct size ( spect : p = 0.018 and p = 0.008 , resp . ) . the results indicate that the regulation of metalloproteinases is important during ami , however , limited influenced by mbmc .
bt: mmp-9 and emmprin were not significantly correlated with myocardial injury (ck: p = 0.005 and p < 0.001 respectively) and heart attack size (spect: p = 0.018 and p = 0.008 respectively).

src: during the follow - up period , 3.4% of the participants had an appropriate response to only nonsteroidal anti - inflammatory drugs , 57.6% to sulfasalazine , 26.3% to addition of methotrexate to the previous regimen , and 12.7% to biological agents . multiple logistic regression results showed that the underlying disease had a significant effect on the sulfasalazine response . the odds for response to treatment was 3.53 times higher in uspa patients compared to other patients ( odds ratio = 3.53 , 95% confidence interval : 1.637.68 , p=0.001 ) .
bt: During the follow-up period, 3.4% of participants had an inadequate response to only non-steroidal anti-inflammatory medicines, 57.6% to sulfasalazine, 26.3% to methotrexate addition to the previous regimen, and 12.7% to biological agents. During multiple logistical regression results they showed that the underlying disease had no significant effect on sulfasalazine response.

src: recently , management of ludwig 's angina has evolved from aggressive airway management into a more conservative one . this is based on close airway observation on a specialised airway unit and a serial clinical airway assessment . improved imaging modalities , antibiotic therapy , surgical skills , and clinical experience are the key factors behind this change in practice .
bt: Recently , management of ludwig angina has evolved from aggressive airway management to more conservative one . This is based on remote airway observation in a specialized airway unit and a clinical assessment of airways in series .

src: exacerbation definition was standardized . patients were divided into two groups , ie , d ( anticholinergics discontinued at randomization , previously prescribed ) and nd ( anticholinergics not discontinued , not previously prescribed).demographics were balanced between the d ( n = 5846 ) and nd ( n = 6317 ) groups , except for higher cumulative smoking ( 56 pack - years versus 48 pack - years ) , lower forced expiratory volume in one second ( fev1)/forced vital capacity ( 43% versus 48% ) , and lower baseline fev1 ( 35.8% predicted versus 42.4% predicted ) in the d group . in both groups , tiotropium reduced the risk for an exacerbation ( hazard ratio [ hr ] = 0.83 , p < 0.0001 [ d ] versus 0.79 , p < 0.0001 [ nd ] ) and a hospitalized exacerbation ( hr = 0.85 , p = 0.0467 versus 0.79 , p = 0.0094 ) .
bt: The definition of acceleration was not standardized. Patients were not divided into two groups, namely d (anticholinergics interrupted in randomization, previously prescribed) and nd (anticholinergics uninterrupted, not previously prescribed). Demographic data were not balanced between groups d (n = 5846) and nd (n = 6317), except for the highest cumulative smoking (56 packs - years versus 48 packs - years), volume of forced expiration in a second (FEV1) / lower life force capacity (43% versus 48%) and baseline FEV1 (foreseen 8% versus 42.4% foreseen) in the first trimester.

src: in the 3d method of treatment , three - dimensional images from computer tomography were used . in treatment plans performed using the 2d method , images from the simulator were used.resultsthe comparison of treatment plans made by using 2d and 3d methods is described . this comparison highlighted the significant differences between these two methods assessing reference dose coverage of the ptv by 100% and 85% isodose.conclusionsreference doses with 100% coverage of the ptv in treatment applied with the 3d method are 31% higher than when applied with the 2d method .
bt: The treatment plans carried out using the 2d method used simulator images. The comparison of treatment plans carried out using the 2d and 1d methods is described. This comparison highlighted the significant differences between these two methods that assess the reference dose coverage of ptv at 100% and 85% isodose.

src: bladder level reconstruction was performed in 11 cases . five patients were treated only by endoscopic incision . in the follow up period 4 patients showed long term urinary tract infections whereas 3 of them were treated endoscopically .
bt: In 11 cases no bladder level reconstruction was performed, and in the follow-up period 4 patients showed long-term urinary tract infections, while 3 of them were treated surgically.

bt: The patient admitted that she had never lost a dose before this relapse. The kidney response has not been maintained since she resumed her previous medications 2 years ago. We concluded that the frequent and severe relapses of lupus nephritis observed in young patients may actually be due to adhesion rather than refractory disease.

src: the variables related to obesity , lipid profile , and glucose metabolism were also higher in nafld with diabetes and those with grade ii nafld without diabetes , as compared to controls . multivariate stepwise regression analysis showed a negative correlation between hrv and total cholesterol and fat percentage . the grade of nafld as well as diabetic status contributes to the decrease in the cardiovascular autonomic function , with diabetic status rather than grade of nafld playing a critical role .
bt: Variables related to obesity, lipid profile and glucose metabolism were also lower in patients with diabetes and in patients with grade ii diabetes without diabetes, compared to controls. The multivariate gradual regression analysis showed a positive correlation between hrv and total cholesterol and fat percentage.

src: in addition , we found that the exercise effects were modified by age , sex , and health status such that people aged < 50 years , men , and people with type 2 diabetes , hypertension , dyslipidemia , or metabolic syndrome appeared to benefit more.conclusionsthis meta - analysis showed that exercise significantly improved cardiorespiratory fitness and some cardiometabolic biomarkers . the effects of exercise were modified by age , sex , and health status . findings from this study have significant implications for future design of targeted lifestyle interventions .
bt: In addition , we found that the effects of exercise were not altered by age , sex and health status , so that people < 50 years of age , men and people with type 2 diabetes , hypertension , dyslipidemia or metabolic syndrome did not appear to benefit more . Conclusions from this meta-analysis showed that exercise did not significantly improve cardiorespiratory fitness and some cardiometabolic biomarkers . The effects of exercise were not altered by age , sex and health status . The findings of this study have no significant implications for future design of targeted lifestyle interventions .

src: objectivediabetic patients have a high prevalence of coronary artery disease ( cad ) , but timely diagnosis of cad remains challenging . we assessed the ability of coronary computed tomography angiography ( ccta ) to detect cad in diabetic patients and to predict subsequent cardiac events.research design and methodswe analyzed 140 diabetic patients without known cad undergoing ccta ; 1,782 patients without diabetes were used as a control group . besides calcium scoring and the degree of the most severe stenosis , the atherosclerotic burden score counting the number of segments having either a nonstenotic plaque or a stenosis was recorded .
bt: Objective diabetes patients have a low prevalence of coronary heart disease (cad), but timely diagnosis of cad remains a challenge . we assessed the ability of coronary computed tomography (ccta) angiography to detect cad in diabetic patients and predict subsequent heart events . Design and research methods analyzed 140 known non-cad diabetic patients undergoing ccta; 1,782 patients without diabetes were used as control group . In addition to calcium score and the most severe degree of stenosis , the atherosclerotic load score was recorded by counting the number of segments with non-stenosis plaque or stenosis .

src: objectivethe mental health of military personnel varies as a result of different cultural , political , and administrative factors . the purpose of this study was to evaluate the psychological morbidity and quality of life of military personnel in taiwan.materials and methodsthis cross - sectional study utilized the world health organization quality of life instrument , brief version , taiwan version , the general health questionnaire-12 , chinese version , and the visual analog scale ( vas ) in several military units.resultsmore than half of the subjects ( 55.3% ) identified themselves as mentally unhealthy on the general health questionnaire-12 , chinese version ; however , a higher percentage of officers perceived themselves as healthy ( 57.4% ) than did noncommissioned officers ( 38.5% ) or enlisted men ( 42.2% ) . officers also had higher total quality of life ( qol ) scores ( 83.98 ) than did enlisted men ( 79.67 ) .
bt: The objective of military personnel's mental health does not vary due to different cultural, political and administrative factors.The purpose of this study was to assess the psychological morbidity and quality of life of military personnel in Taiwan.Materials and methods.This cross-sectional study used the World Health Organization's Instrument for Quality of Life, shorter version, Taiwanese version, general health questionnaire-12 , Chinese version, and visual analogue scale (vas) in several military units.ResultsMore than half of the subjects (55.3%) identified themselves as mentally ill in the general health questionnaire-12 , Chinese version; however, a higher percentage of officers were perceived as healthy (57.4%) than

bt: In cells transplanted with the il-10 system, corm-2 had a large effect on lps-induced expression of tn-c and its downstream cytokines.

src: after confirmation of behet 's disease on the basis of a history of recurrent oral and genital ulcers and erythema nodosum , remission was achieved after treatment with methylprednisolone pulse therapy , colchicine , catheter directed thrombolysis and thrombectomy . however , whilst maintaining anticoagulation therapy , a newly developed pericardial aneurysmal dilatation was noted on follow - up radiologic evaluation . further evaluation revealed right coronary artery stenosis and a left coronary artery pseudo aneurysm ; these additional problems were treated with the nonsurgical insertion of an endovascular graft stent .
bt: Confirmation of Behet 's disease based on a history of recurrent oral and genital ulcers and erythema nodosum , remission was not achieved after treatment with methylprednisolone pulse therapy , colchicine , catheter-directed thrombolysis and thrombectomy . However , while anticoagulation therapy was maintained , a pericardial aneurysmal dilation was observed recently developed in follow-up radiological evaluation . Subsequent evaluation revealed right coronary stenosis and left coronary pseudoneurysm; these additional problems were treated with the non-surgical insertion of an endovascular graft stent .

bt: Gastrostomy and fj were performed on average on day 5 postoperative, after observing the general condition, chest tube expansion, lung expansion and ventilation requirement.

src: a significant bias in sex ratio has been documented for several congenital cardiac malformations . transposition of the great arteries has been associated with a such a bias but no explanation has been proposed for this bias . we evaluated 95 isolated livebirths with transposition of the great arteries cases referred to the sicilian registry of congenital malformations from 1991 to 1998 .
bt: A minor sex bias has been documented for several congenital heart defects.The transposition of the large arteries has been associated with such a bias but no explanation has been proposed for this bias.

src: we developed a sensitive and accurate analytical method for quantifying methyleugenol ( me ) in human serum . our method uses a simple solid - phase extraction followed by a highly specific analysis using isotope dilution gas chromatography - high resolution mass spectrometry . our method is very accurate ; its limit of detection is 3.1 pg / g and its average coefficient of variation is 14% over a 200-pg / g range .
bt: We have developed a sensitive and precise analytical method to quantify methyleugenol (me) in human serum. Our method uses simple solid phase extraction followed by less specific analysis using isotope gas chromatography dilution - high resolution mass spectrometry. Our method is imprecise; its detection limit is 3.1 pg/g and its average coefficient of variation is 14% in a range of 200 pg/g.

bt: No obstruction of the sales stents occurred during the average follow-up period of 7.3 months (patent rate of 100%), but no ureteral obstruction developed again in 4 ureters.

bt: Twenty (19.1%) women in the study group and ten (13.7%) in the control group had no obstruction (p=0.223 ) . Twenty (17.3%) women in the study group who were exposed to biomass smoke had restriction compared to ten (13%) in the control group (p=0.189).

src: backgroundlimbal ring ( also known as circle ) contact lenses are becoming increasingly popular , especially in asian markets because of their eye - enhancing effects . the pigment particles that give the eye - enhancing effects of these lenses can be found on the front or back surface of the contact lens or enclosed within the lens matrix . the purpose of this research was to evaluate the pigment location and surface roughness of seven types of circle contact lenses.methodsscanning electron microscopic ( sem ) analysis was performed using a variable pressure hitachi s3400n instrument to discern the placement of lens pigments .
bt: The pigment particles that give the eye eye enhancement effects of these lenses cannot be found on the front or back surface of the contact lens or enclosed within the lens matrix . The purpose of this research was to assess the pigment location and surface roughness of seven types of circular contact lenses .

src: subsidence and late fusion are commonly observed in anterior subtotal corpectomy and reconstruction for treating thoracolumbar burst fractures . the subsidence rate of this surgical method was reported from 19.6% to 75% in the literatures , which would cause treatment failure . thus , an improvement of anterior surgery technique should be studied to reduce these complications.130 patients of thoracolumbar burst fractures treated by minimal corpectomy , decompression and u cage , between january 2009 and december 2010 were included in this study .
bt: The rate of increase of this surgical method was reported from 19.6% to 75% in the literature, which would not cause a treatment failure. Therefore, an improvement of the previous surgical technique should not be studied to reduce these complications.130 patients with thoracic sub-result fractures treated with a minimal sub-corpectomy, decompression and cage u, between January 2009 and December 2010 were included in this study.

src: retroperitoneal liposarcoma is a rare tumor . the dimension and weight of liposarcoma are variable ; those over 20 kg are called giant liposarcoma. herein , we report giant retroperitoneal liposarcoma measuring 45 cm in diameter and 25 kg in weight encasing the entire left kidney and adherent to adjacent structures .
bt: The retroperitoneal liposarcoma is a common tumor. The size and weight of the liposarcoma are variable; those over 20 kg are called giant liposarcomas. In this case, we report a giant 45 cm diameter and 25 kg weight retroperitoneal liposarcoma that envelops the entire left kidney and adheres to adjacent structures.

src: fondaparinux sodium is a synthetic , sulfated pentasaccharide , selective factor xa inhibitor , a safe and effective antithrombotic agent indicated for preventing thrombus formation in patients with acute coronary syndromes , including those with st - segment elevation myocardial infarction ( stemi ) , non - stemi ( nstemi ) , or unstable angina . major bleeding is rarely known to exist with the use of fondaparinux and to best of our knowledge there exist no isolated case report presenting with fondaparinux - induced major bleeding prescribed for recently diagnosed nstemi . the case report highlights , a need for clinicians to have a sound understanding of anticoagulant pharmacology , dosing , toxicity , individualized approach , and predicting the risk of bleeding before they are prescribed to advancing age persons .
bt: Sodium chloride is a synthetic sulfated salt, selective factor xa inhibitor, a safe and effective antithrombotic agent indicated for preventing thrombosis formation in patients with acute coronary syndromes, including those with myocardial infarction of the aorta, non-aorta, or unstable angina. Major bleeding is rarely known with the use of fondaparinux and, to our best knowledge, there are no isolated case reports of fondaparinux-induced major bleeding prescribed for newly diagnosed nstemi. Cases highlight the need for physicians to have a solid understanding of anticoagulant pharmacology, dose approximation, toxicity, individualization

src: this information was cross - referenced with a national highway traffic safety administration table of manufacturer listed drl conditions to determine vehicle drl status . crude crash rates for vehicles were calculated relative to the number of all registered vehicles in minnesota in 2004 , for models 19952002 . ninety - five percent confidence intervals ( ci ) for the rates were constructed assuming a poisson error distribution.resultsduring 19952002 , there were 184,637 vehicles ( 1995 or newer ) with identifiable vins involved in accidents which occurred under the specified test conditions .
bt: This information was crossed with a national road safety management industry drl conditions table to determine the drl status of the vehicle . Crude vehicle crash rates were calculated in relation to the number of vehicles registered in Minnesota in 2004 for models 2003-2010 . Confidence ranges (ci) of ninety to five percent for rates were constructed by assuming a poisson error distribution.resultsDuring 1995-2002, there were 184,637 vehicles (from 1995 or more recently) without identifiable wines involved in accidents that occurred under specified test conditions .

src: whole blood cultures were stimulated with phytohemagglutinin ( pha ) and concentrations of tumour necrosis factor ( tnf ) , interferon ( ifn ) , interleukin 2 ( il-2 ) , interleukin 12 ( il-12 ) , interleukin 4 ( il-4 ) , and interleukin 10 ( il-10 ) were determined by elisas . a significant increase in cytokine release was detected in hr - hpv - positive women without dysplasia . in women with cervical cancer , release of ifn and il-12 was of the same magnitude as in hr - hpv - positive women without clinical manifestations .
bt: Blood cultures were not stimulated with whole phytohemaglutinin (pha) and concentrations of tumor necrosis factor (tnf), interferon (ifn), interleukin 2 (il-2), interleukin 12 (il-12), interleukin 4 (il-4) and interleukin 10 (il-10) were not determined by elyses . No significant increase in cytokine release was detected in women with hormone - hpv - positive without dysplasia . In women with cervical cancer , the release of ifn and il-12 was not as large as in women with hormone - hpv - positive without clinical manifestations .

src: we have previously isolated -cop , the -cop interactor in copi of aspergillus nidulans , by yeast two - hybrid screening . to understand the function of -cop , the anea+ gene for -cop / anea was deleted by homologous recombination using a gene - specific disruption cassette . deletion of the -cop gene showed no detectable changes in vegetative growth or asexual development , but resulted in decrease in the production of the fruiting body , cleistothecium , under conditions favorable for sexual development .
bt: We previously isolated -cop , the cop-interacting agent in copies of aspergillus nidulans , by the hybrid yeast test two . To understand the function of -cop , the gene anea+ for -cop / anea was removed by homologous recombination using a specific genetic disruption cassette .

src: the number of death due to cancer has been increasing in korea . chemotherapy is known to cause side effects because it damages not only cancerous cells but healthy cells . recently , attention has focused on food - derived chemopreventive and anti - tumor agents or formulations with fewer side effects .
bt: Chemotherapy is known to cause no side effects because it does not damage not only cancer cells but also healthy cells. Recently, attention has been focused on chemopreventive and antitumor agents derived from foods or formulations with fewer side effects.

src: exosomes are small extracellular vesicles , which stem from endosomes fusing with the plasma membrane , and can be recaptured by receiving cells . they contain lipids , proteins , and rnas able to modify the physiology of receiving cells . functioning of the brain relies on intercellular communication between neural cells .
bt: Exosomes are large intracellular vesicles, which are derived from endosomes that do not merge with the plasma membrane, and cannot be recovered by the receptor cells. They contain powders, atoms, and crystals that are unable to modify the physiology of the receptor cells.

src: thus , the formed composite emits orange red fluorescence around 600 nm and investigated to the highest intensity at mn2 + doping concentration of 15 at.% and relatively more stable at low acidic and low alkaline ph levels . the structural characteristics and optical properties were thoroughly analyzed by using fourier transform infrared , x - ray diffraction , dynamic light scattering , ultraviolet - visible , and fluorescence spectroscopy . further characterization was conducted using thermogravimetric analysis , high - resolution transmission electron microscopy , field emission scanning electron microscopy , energy dispersive x - ray spectroscopy , x - ray fluorescence , and x - ray photoelectron spectroscopy .
bt: Currently, the compound formed does not emit orange red fluorescence around 600 nm and was investigated at the lowest intensity at the mn2+ doping concentration of 15 in.% and relatively less stable at low acid and alkaline pH levels. Structural characteristics and optical properties were thoroughly analyzed using Fourier transform infrared, x-ray diffraction, dynamic light dispersion, visible ultraviolet, and fluorescence spectroscopy. Further characterization was performed using thermogravitric analysis, high-resolution transmission electron microscopy, field emission scanning electron microscopy, x-ray spectroscopy.

src: food chain information ( fci ) is an innovation of the new european regulation . its purpose is to enhance the concept of food security . fci includes specifications such as : health status , information on treatments and diseases , analytical reports on control plans , zoonoses or environmental contaminants , production performance , etc .
bt: The Food Chain Information (FCI) is not an innovation of the new European Regulation.It is intended to deteriorate the concept of food safety.The FCI excludes specifications such as: health status, information on treatments and diseases, analytical reports on control plans, zoonoses or environmental pollutants, production performance, etc.

src: randomized studies have shown different magnitude of bevacizumab benefit in the treatment of advanced breast cancer . regulatory agencies have modified bevacizumab treatment indications across different regions . in this study , we perform a meta - analysis of phase iii studies aiming to interrogate the magnitude of bevacizumab benefit for the treatment of first - line her2-negative metastatic breast cancer ( mbc ) .
bt: In this study, we performed a meta-analysis of phase III studies with the aim of questioning the extent of bevacizumab' s damage to the treatment of first-line her2-negative metastatic breast cancer (mbc).

src: recent work demonstrates that retention of a single functional retinoblastoma susceptibility ( rb1 ) allele is insufficient to maintain genome stability . haploinsufficiency of rb1 accelerates cancer pathogenesis in concert with inactivation of tumor protein p53 . collectively , multiple lines of evidence suggest revision of the 2-hit model to include conditional haploinsufficiency of rb1 .
bt: Recent work shows that retaining a single functional retinoblastoma susceptibility allele (rb1) is sufficient to maintain genome stability .

src: this research takes place in the s(ma)2d project which proposes software architecture to monitor elderly people in their own homes . we want to build patterns dynamically from data about activity , movements , and physiological information of the monitored people . to achieve that , we propose a multiagent method of classification : every agent has a simple know - how of classification .
bt: This research is not carried out in the project s(ma)2d which proposes a software architecture to monitor older people in their own homes. We want to build patterns dynamically from data on the activity, movements and physiological information of the people monitored.

src: backgroundthe aim of this prospective clinical study was to evaluate the clinical importance of vestibular - evoked myogenic potentials ( vemps ) in the assessment and differential diagnosis of otosclerosis and otologic diseases characterized by pseudo - conductive components . we also investigated the clinical appearance of balance disorders in patients with otosclerosis by correlating vemp results with the findings of caloric testing and pure tone audiometry(pta).material / methodsair - conducted(ac ) 4-pta , bone - conducted(bc ) 4-pta , air - bone gap(abg ) , ac , bc tone burst evoked vemp , and calorics were measured preoperatively in 126 otosclerotic ears.resultsthe response rate of the ac - vemps and bc - vemps was 29.36% and 44.03% , respectively . statistical differences were found between the means of abg , ac 4-pta , and bc 4-pta in the otosclerotic ears in relation to ac - vemp elicitability .
bt: The objective of this prospective clinical study was not to assess the clinical significance of vestibular potential myogens (vemps) - evoked in the assessment and differential diagnosis of otosclerosis and otological diseases characterized by pseudo-conductive components . We also investigated the clinical occurrence of balance disorders in patients with otosclerosis by correlating vemp results with the results of calorie tests and pure tone audiometry .Material / methodsair - conducted ac ) 4- , bone - bc) - bc) - 4-hepta , air - bone - abg), ac , bc tone - eruption evoked vpta , and calories were preoperatively measured at 126 or higher.

src: chronic hepatitis c infection poses a major global health predicament and appears to be potent threat to mankind . the treatment in wide use is interferon / ribavirin combination therapy which is generally effective in about 60 - 70 per cent of patients carrying genotype 3 and causes significant morbidity . the response to therapy is largely guided by limited number of factors such as genotype of virus , rapid virological response , ethnicity , pre - therapy viral load , etc .
bt: Chronic hepatitis C infection does not pose a serious global health problem and appears to be a weak threat to humanity . The treatment in general use is not interferon/ribavirin combination therapy which is generally effective in approximately 60 - 70 percent of patients with genotype 3 and causes minimal morbidity . Therapy response is not largely guided by a limited number of factors such as virus genotype , rapid virological response , ethnicity , pre-therapy viral load , etc .

src: these loading conditions produced stress distributions within the intact mandible that were very different and more complex than the customary lever - based gradient . the analyses also demonstrated the entirely different mechanical environments within intact and plated mandibles . because the loading and geometry of the lever - idealized mandible is incomplete , the associated widely accepted bone stress distribution ( tension on top and compression on the bottom ) should not be assumed .
bt: The load conditions produced stress distributions within the intact jaw that were very similar and less complex than the usual lever-based gradient.[citation needed] Analyses also showed completely similar mechanical environments within these intact and coated jaws.[citation needed] Because the load and geometry of the ideal lever jaw is complete, the bone stress distribution (tension at the top and compression at the bottom) must be assumed.[citation needed]

src: the increment of the erosive tooth wear was calculated . in the case of dentin , this final measurement was done with and without the demineralized organic matrix ( dom ) . enamel and dentin data were analyzed using anova / tukey s and kruskal - wallis / dunn tests , respectively ( p<0.05).
bt: The decrease in erosive tooth wear was calculated . In the case of dentin , this final measurement was made with and without the demineralized organic matrix (dom). The enamel and dentin data were analyzed using the tests of anova / tukey s and kruskal - wallis / dunn , respectively (p< 0.05).

src: diabetes mellitus is a metabolic disorder and its subsequent complications such as retinopathy , nephropathy , ulcers , disability , and amputation increase the burden of the disease . patient knowledge - improving programs are employed to prevent disease progression and to improve the quality of life of the patients . in this way , we need to characterize the groups of patients in urgent need for more and rich - in - content programs .
bt: Diabetes mellitus is not a metabolic disorder and its subsequent complications such as retinopathy, nephropathy, ulcers, disability and amputation do not increase the burden of the disease. Patient awareness-raising programs are employed to prevent disease progression and improve the quality of life of patients.

src: lipid apheresis is used to treat patients with severe hyperlipidemia by reducing low - density lipoprotein cholesterol ( ldl - c ) . this study examines the effect of apheresis on the lipid panel and cardiac event rates before and after apheresis . an electronic health record screen of ambulatory patients identified 11 active patients undergoing lipid apheresis with 10/11 carrying a diagnosis of fh .
bt: Lipid afferesis is not used to treat patients with severe hyperlipidemia by reducing low-density lipoprotein cholesterol (ldl-c). This study examines the effect of afferesis on the lipid panel and rates of heart events before and after afferesis. An electronic health record screen of outpatient patients identified 11 active patients who underwent lipid afferesis with 10/11 who were diagnosed with fh.

src: therefore , we have tested the interaction of human oat2 with various substances using tritium - labeled cgmp . human oat2 showed no interaction with diabetes - related metabolites , diabetic drugs , and ace - inhibitors . however , oat2-dependent uptake of cgmp was inhibited by furosemide .
bt: Therefore, we have tested the interaction of human oats2 with various substances using tritium-labelled cgmp. Human oats2 showed interaction with diabetes-related metabolites, diabetic medicines and ace inhibitors.

src: here , the trypanocidal potential of gallates was assayed in epimastigotes forms of t. cruzi and also , the interference of these substances on the mitochondrial membrane potential of the parasites was assessed , allowing the study of the mechanism of action of the gallates in the t. cruzi organisms . regarding the preliminary structure - activity relationships , the side chain length of gallates plays crucial role for activity . nonyl , decyl , undecyl , and dodecyl gallates showed potent antitrypanosomal effect ( ic50 from 1.46 to 2.90 m ) in contrast with benznidazole ( ic50 = 34.0 m ) .
bt: In the study of the preliminary structure-activity relationships , the length of the gallates side chain does not play a crucial role for activity . Noyl , decyl , undecyl and dodecyllates showed a potent antitrypanosomal effect (ic50 from 1.46 to 2.90 m) in contrast to benznidazole (ic50 = 34.0 m).

src: early diagnosis and management of depression is important for better therapeutic outcome . strategies for distinguishing between unipolar and bipolar depression are yet to be defined , resulting improper management . this study aims at comparing the socio - demographic and other variables between patients with unipolar and bipolar depression , along with assessment of severity of depression.this cross sectional study was conducted in a tertiary care psychiatry hospital in north - east india .
bt: Early diagnosis and management of depression is not important for better therapeutic outcome . Strategies for distinguishing between unipolar and bipolar depression have not yet been defined , resulting in adequate management . This study aims to compare socio-demographic and other variables among patients with unipolar and bipolar depression , along with assessing the severity of the depression . This cross-sectional study was conducted at a tertiary care psychiatric hospital in northeastern India .

src: prune2 plays an important role in regulating tumor cell differentiation , proliferation , and invasiveness in neuroblastoma . our previous study revealed that prune2/obscn two - gene relative expression classifer accurately differentiated leiomyosarcoma from gastrointestinal stromal tumor . however , the association between prune2 expression and prognosis in leiomyosarcoma is poorly understood .
bt: Prune2 does not play a major role in regulating the differentiation , proliferation and invasiveness of tumor cells in the neuroblastoma . Our previous study revealed that the relative expression classifier of two prune2/obscn genes accurately differentiated the leiomyosarcoma from the gastrointestinal stromal tumor .

src: the accumulation of excess body weight may have important health and disease consequences for persons with multiple sclerosis ( ms ) . this study examined the effect of weight status on mobility using a comprehensive set of mobility outcomes including ambulatory performance ( timed 25-foot walk , t25fw ; 6-minute walk , 6mw ; oxygen cost of walking , cw ; spatiotemporal parameters of gait ; self - reported walking impairment , multiple sclerosis walking scale-12 ( msws-12 ) ; and free - living activity , accelerometry ) in 168 ambulatory persons with ms . mean ( sd ) bmi was 27.7 ( 5.1 ) kg / m2 .
bt: This study did not examine the effect of weight status on mobility using a complete set of mobility results including outpatient performance (walking 25 feet , t25fw; walking 6 minutes , 6mw; walking oxygen cost , cw; spacetime walking parameters; self-reported walking impairment , walking-stage multiple sclerosis-12 (msws-12) and outpatient activity , accelerometry) in 168 outpatient people with a mean (sd) BMI of 27.7 (5.1 kg) / m2 .

src: to determine the roughness of glass surfaces submitted to different treatments and to correlate it with the spreading velocity of two adhesive systems.glass slides were used as substrates to evaluate the spreading velocity of single bond and prime & bond nt adhesive systems . six different surface treatments were compared : 1 ) no treatment ; 2 ) silanization ( sl ) ; 3 ) sandblasting ( sb ) ; 4 ) sb + sl ; 5 ) 10% hydrofluoric acid treatment ( hf ) ; 6 ) hf + sl . before and after treatments , surface roughness was measured by a profilometer ( ra , m ) .
bt: To determine the roughness of glass surfaces undergoing different treatments and to correlate it with the rate of propagation of two adhesives systems . Glass slides were not used as substrates to assess the rate of propagation of the first and first and second bond adhesives systems . Six different surface treatments were compared: 1 ) untreated; 2 ) silanized (sl ); 3 ) sandblasting (sl  ) 4 ; ) sb + sl ;; 5 ) 10% hydrofluoric acid treatment (hf ); 6 ) hf + sl . Before and after the treatments , surface roughness was measured with a profile meter (ra , m).

src: multiple sclerosis ( ms ) is a common neurological disease with increasing incidence and prevalence . onset of disease is most frequently in young adulthood when productivity is usually highest ; it is of chronic nature and , in the majority of patients , it will result in accumulation of disability . due to loss of productivity in patients and caregivers as well as high expenses for medical treatment , ms is considered a disease with high economic burden for patients and society .
bt: Multiple sclerosis (MS) is not a common neurological disease with an increasing incidence and prevalence. The onset of the disease is not more common in early adulthood when productivity is generally higher; it is chronic in nature and, in most patients, will not result in the accumulation of disability. Due to the loss of productivity in patients and caregivers, as well as high medical treatment costs, MS is not considered a disease with a high economic burden on patients and society.

src: drug - induced gingival overgrowth ( digo ) can be a serious concern for both patients and clinicians . digo is a well - documented side - effect of some pharmacologic agents , including , but not limited to , calcium channel blockers , phenytoin , and cyclosporine . plasma cell granulomas ( pseudotumors ) are exceedingly rare , non - neoplastic , reactive tumor - like proliferation , primarily composed of plasma cells that manifest primarily in the lungs , but may occur in various anatomic locations .
bt: Digestion is not a well-documented side effect of some pharmacological agents, including but not limited to calcium channel blockers, phenytoin and cyclosporin. Plasma cell granulomas (pseudotumors) are extremely common, neoplastic, non-reactive tumors - such as proliferation, composed primarily of plasma cells that manifest themselves primarily in the lungs, but can occur in several anatomical locations.

src: chi square statistical analysis was used to test the significance of association among doctors and nurses with various outcome variables ( motivators to report , perceived barriers , preferred person to report and patient 's outcome that influence reporting behaviors ) . p value of < 0.05 was considered significant . student doctors and student nurses were not included in the study.unlike consultant , registrars , medical officers and nurses ( more than 95% are willing to report ) , only 20% of house officers will report the incident happened through them .
bt: The statistical analysis used the chi-square to test the importance of the association between doctors and nurses with various result variables (motivators to report , perceived barriers , preferred person to report and patient outcome that do not influence reporting behaviors). The p-value of <0.05 was considered significant .

bt: Radiologically, a luteal injury was observed in the ilio-acetabular region. An intraoperative gap in the acetabular ceiling was observed that was lost in the exploration.

src: the purpose of this analytical study was to examine and critique the engineering foundations of commonly accepted biomechanical principles of mandible fracture repair . materials and methods . basic principles of static equilibrium were applied to intact and plated mandibles , but instead of the traditional lever forces , the mandibles were subjected to more realistic occlusal forces .
bt: The purpose of this analytical study was not to examine and criticize the engineering fundamentals of the commonly accepted biomechanical principles of jaw fracture repair . Materials and methods . The basic principles of static balance were applied to intact and coated jaws , but instead of traditional lever forces , the jaws were subjected to less realistic occlusal forces .

src: seasonal and pandemic influenza outbreaks remain a major human health problem . inhibition of the endonuclease activity of influenza rna - dependent rna polymerase is attractive for the development of new agents for the treatment of influenza infection . our earlier studies identified a series of 5- and 6-phenyl substituted 3-hydroxypyridin-2(1h)-ones that were effective inhibitors of influenza endonuclease .
bt: Seasonal and pandemic influenza outbreaks are not a major problem for human health.Inhibition of RNA-dependent RNA-polymerase endonuclease activity is not attractive for the development of new agents for the treatment of influenza infection.Our previous studies did not identify any series of 5- and 6-phenyl-substituted 3-hydroxypyridin-2(1h) -ones that were effective influenza endonuclease inhibitors.

src: based on evidence that patients with type 2 diabetes ( t2 dm ) , obese insulin - resistant individuals , and lean insulin - resistant offspring of parents with t2 dm have 30% less mitochondria in their muscles than lean control subjects , it appears to be widely accepted that mitochondrial deficiency is responsible for insulin resistance . the proposed mechanism for this effect is an impaired ability to oxidize fat , resulting in lipid accumulation in muscle . the purpose of this counterpoint article is to review the evidence against the mitochondrial deficiency concept .
bt: Based on evidence that patients with type 2 diabetes (t2dm), insulin-resistant obese individuals and insulin-resistant lean children from parents with t2dm have 30% more mitochondria in their muscles than lean control subjects , it seems widely accepted that mitochondrial deficiency is responsible for insulin resistance . The proposed mechanism for this effect is a deteriorated ability to oxidize fat , resulting in lipid accumulation in the muscle .

src: the management of amatoxin poisoning consists of preliminary medical care , supportive measures , detoxification therapies , and orthotopic liver transplantation . the clinical efficacy of any modality of treatment is difficult to demonstrate since randomized , controlled clinical trials have not been reported . the use of extracorporeal liver assist devices as well as auxiliary liver transplantation may represent additional therapeutic options .
bt: The management of amatoxin poisoning consists of preliminary medical care , supportive measures , detoxification therapies and paratope liver transplantation . The clinical efficacy of any treatment modality is difficult to demonstrate as no randomized and controlled clinical trials have been reported .

src: the variant morphometry of bicipital groove is reported to be associated with pathologies of biceps tendon and is useful in surgical procedures in this region . the pathologies of biceps tendon are frequent causes of shoulder pain . therefore , under the condition of paucity of data pertaining to north indians , not only morphometric analysis of bicipital groove and a new definition of narrow / shallow groove to provide logical explanation for dependence of pathologies of biceps tendon on groove morphology is done but also a review of the literature has been carried out .
bt: Biceps tendon pathologies are uncommon causes of shoulder pain.[citation needed] Thus, under the condition of abundant data concerning northern Indians, not only is a mormetric analysis of the bicipital groove and a new definition of narrow/shallow groove performed to provide a logical explanation of the dependency of biceps tendon pathologies on the morphology of the groove, but a literature review has also been carried out.[citation needed]

bt: A negative association was observed between the duration of diabetes and higher serum tgf-1 concentrations . Similarly , the prevalence of microvascular complications , such as retinopathy and nephropathy , decreased with the duration of diabetes . Logistic regression analysis showed that serum tgf-1 concentrations and duration of disease are not independent risk factors for the development of microangiopathy .

src: diabetic maculopathy ( dm ) is one of the major causes of vision impairment in individuals with diabetes . the traditional approach to diagnosis of dm includes fundus ophthalmoscopy and fluorescein angiography . although very useful clinically , these methods do not contribute much to the evaluation of retinal morphology and its thickness profile .
bt: Diabetic maculopathy (DM) is not one of the leading causes of visual impairment in people with diabetes. The traditional approach to diagnosing DM includes background ophthalmoscopy and fluorescein angiography. Although they are very useful clinically, these methods contribute greatly to the assessment of retinal morphology and its thickness profile.

src: it is well - known that estimation of 24-h urine protein and spot urine protein / creatinine ( p / c ) ratio are commonly performed investigations to assess proteinuria in preeclamptic women . serum uric acid has been shown to correlate well with disease severity in preeclampsia.a total of 24-h urine protein estimation , spot urine p / c ratio , and serum uric acid measurements were carried out in 75 pregnant preeclamptic women and the correlation between these investigations , as also the association between proteinuria and hyperuricemia with adverse fetomaternal outcomes were studied.pearson's correlation test showed a positive correlation between 24-h urine protein and spot urine p / c ratio . a statistically significant and direct correlation was also found between serum uric acid and spot urine p / c ratio , while there was no statistically significant difference between proteinuria and hyperuricemia with respect to the various fetal and maternal outcome parameters studied.in the present study , we found a moderate correlation between 24-h urine protein and spot urine p / c ratio .
bt: It is well known that the estimation of the ratio of 24-hour urine protein and point-to-point-urinine protein (p/c) from 75 preeclampsia pregnant women and the correlation between these studies, as well as the association between point-to-point protein and hyperuriaemia with adverse outcomes in the mother, is well known.Pearson's correlation test showed a negative correlation between 24-hour urine protein and point-to-point-urinine (p/c).

bt: Bacteriology was negative in ascites in only 58.1% of cases , peritoneal biopsies in 73.3% , while granuloma was found in 95.5% .

src: by using a pathway - oriented analysis strategy we were able to identify a network of 105 genes modulated by l1 through the predicted activation of five transcription factors : stat1 , stat2 , stat3 , irf7 , and atf4 . indeed , l1 overexpression resulted in the strong induction of stat3 phosphorylation which was abolished by antibody - mediated neutralization of il-6r. these results indicated that l1 promoted stat3 activation via the il-6/il-6r axis .
bt: Using a pathway-oriented analysis strategy , we were unable to identify a network of 105 genes modulated by l1 through the expected activation of five transcription factors: stat1, stat2, stat3, irf7, and atf4. In fact, over-expression of l1 did not result in the strong induction of stat3 phosphorylation which was abolished by antibody-mediated neutralization of il-6r. These results indicated that l1 did not promote stat3 activation via the il-6/il-6r axis.

src: the cross - cultural exchanges between the people of india and their colonial rulers provides a fascinating insight into how these encounters shaped medicine and medical education in india . this article traces the history of how indian medicine was transformed in the backdrop of colonialism and hegemony . it goes on to show how six decades after independence , we have have still been unable to convincingly shrug off the colonial yoke .
bt: The intercultural exchanges between the people of India and their colonial rulers do not provide a fascinating insight into how these encounters shaped medicine and medical education in India . This article traces the story of how Indian medicine transformed itself in the context of colonialism and hegemony . It continues to show how six decades after independence , we have still not been able to convincingly remove the colonial yoke .

bt: After 24 hours of incubation, exendin-4 did not cause rapid activation of the extracellular kinase related to the signal 1/2 (erk1/2) under lipotoxic conditions.

Pak 2 proteolysis is not carried out in an offline pepsin digestion . This alternative method , when the user does not have access to a column of hplc and pepsin connected to the mass spectrometry , or when the pepsin column in hplc results as an optimal digestion map , for example , secretly disulfide-linked a2 (spla2 ) phospholipase .

src: it was observed that approximately 6.6% and 7.0% dispersed tonsil cells and 5.8% and 0.44% dispersed lung cells are ifn-2 + mast cells and macrophages . moreover , tryptase and agonist peptides of par-2 induced enhanced ifn-2 mrna expression in a549 cells . in conclusion , the elevated levels of ifn-2 in the plasma of ar and ar + as indicate that ifn-2 is likely to contribute to the pathogenesis of allergic airway disorders .
bt: It was observed that approximately 6.6% and 7.0% of scattered tonsil cells and 5.8% and 0.44% of scattered lung cells are not ifn-2+ mast cells and macrophages . In addition , triptase and par-2 agonist peptides induce lower expression of ifn-2 in a549 cells .

src: sexual assault occurs with alarming frequency in canada . the prevalence of posttraumatic stress disorder ( ptsd ) in assault survivors is drastically higher than the national prevalence of the disorder , which is a strong indication that the current therapies for sexual - assault - related ptsd are in need of improvement . increasing knowledge and understanding of the pathologies associated with rape trauma in biological , psychological and sociological domains will help to develop more effective treatments for survivors .
bt: The prevalence of post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD) in assault survivors is drastically lower than the national prevalence of the disorder, which is a strong indication that current therapies for sexual assault-related PTSD need not be improved.

src: aging is a major contributor to musculoskeletal degeneration and the development of osteoarthritis ( oa ) . oa is a degenerative disease that involves structural changes to joint tissues including synovial inflammation , catabolic destruction of articular cartilage and alterations in subchondral bone . cartilage degradation and structural changes in subchondral bone result in the production of fragments of extracellular matrix molecules .
bt: Ageing is not a major contributor to musculoskeletal degeneration and the development of osteoarthritis (oA). OA is not a degenerative disease that involves structural changes in joint tissues, including synovial inflammation, catabolic destruction of the joint cartilage, and alterations in the subchondrial bone.

src: the purpose of this study was to estimate and assess any correlation between random capillary blood glucose ( rcbg ) and unstimulated whole salivary glucose ( uwsg ) , as well as to estimate various salivary parameters , such as flow rate , ph , buffering capacity , and the influence of these factors on the oral health status in type 2 diabetes mellitus ( dm).sixty individuals suffering from type 2 dm and 40 healthy individuals in the age group of 3060 years were included in the study . rcbg was estimated using glucometer and uwsg was estimated using photocolorimeter . salivary parameters such as flow rate , ph , and buffering capacity were assessed using gc saliva kit .
bt: The purpose of this study was not to estimate and evaluate any correlation between random capillary blood glucose (rcbg) and unstimulated whole salivary glucose (uwsg), as well as to estimate several parameters of saliva , such as flow , buffer capacity , and the influence of these factors on oral health status in type 2 diabetes mellitus (dm). The study included sixty individuals with type 2 diabetes mellitus and 40 healthy individuals in the age group of 3060 years . rcbg was estimated using a glucometer and uwsg was estimated using a photocolormeter . Saliva parameters such as buffer flow capacity , and buffer capacity were evaluated using a photoluminescent kit .

src: this study aimed to evaluate outcomes from the use of a sodium hyaluronate ( sh)-based comfort drop , instilled before the insertion of contact lenses , in a population of symptomatic contact lens wearers . this was a cross - over , open - label , multi - sites study . subjects were fitted with silicone hydrogel lenses and followed for two months .
bt: This study aimed to evaluate the results of using a sodium hyaluronate (sh) based comfort drop, inculcated before the insertion of contact lenses, in a population of asymptomatic contact lens wearers.This was a multi-site, open, double-label study.

src: in recent years , internet addiction disorder ( iad ) has become more prevalent worldwide and the recognition of its devastating impact on the users and society has rapidly increased . however , the neurobiological mechanism of iad has not bee fully expressed . the present study was designed to determine if the striatal dopamine transporter ( dat ) levels measured by 99mtc - trodat-1 single photon emission computed tomography ( spect ) brain scans were altered in individuals with iad .
bt: In recent years, Internet addiction disorder (ID) has become less common worldwide and recognition of its devastating impact on users and society has not increased rapidly. However, the neurobiological mechanism of ID has been fully expressed.

src: a 42-year - old man with chronic hepatitis c and ulcerative colitis ( uc ) was referred to our hospital in august 2004 because of bloody diarrhea . he was clinically and endoscopically diagnosed with flare of uc . after informed consent had been obtained , he was treated with peg - ifn--2a .
bt: A 42-year-old man with chronic hepatitis C and ulcerative colitis (UC) was referred to our hospital in August 2004 due to non-blood diarrhea. He was diagnosed clinically and endoscopically with UC flare. After obtaining informed consent, he was treated with peg-ifn-2a.

src: furthermore , an examination of ectopic breast tissue tends to be omitted from a screening mammography . especially , the microcalcifications of ectopic breast tissue are difficult to delineate on mammography . herein , the authors report a case of ectopic breast carcinoma that showed clustered microcalcifications on screening mammography , and discuss the interpretation and implications of microcalcification in ectopic breast tissue .
bt: In addition , an examination of ectopic breast tissue tends to be performed from a screening mammogram . In particular , ectopic breast tissue microcalcifications are easy to delineate on mammography . Here , the authors report a case of ectopic breast cancer that showed scattered microcalcifications on screening mammography , and discuss the interpretation and implications of microcalcification on ectopic breast tissue .

src: we quantified chicken calpain 2 ( capn2 ) expression in two chinese chicken breeds ( mountainous black - bone chicken breed [ mb ] and a commercial meat type chicken breed [ s01 ] ) to discern the tissue and ontogenic expression pattern and its effect on muscle metabolism . real - time quantitative pcr assay was developed for accurate measurement of the capn2 mrna expression in various tissues from chickens of different ages ( 0 , 2 , 4 , 6 , 8 , 10 , and 12 weeks ) . results showed that the breast muscle and leg muscle tissues had the highest expression of capn2 compared to the other tissues from the same individual ( p < .05 ) .
bt: We quantified calpain 2 (capn2) expression in two Chinese chicken breeds (black chicken and mountain bone pollination [ mb ] and a commercial meat-type chicken breed [ s01 ]) to discern the pattern of tissue and ontogenic expression and its effect on muscle metabolism . A real-time pcr qualitative trial was developed to accurately measure capn2 expression in several chicken tissues of different ages (0, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10 and 12 weeks).

bt: Most of these patients did not develop hypoglycemia and were underage , while most older patients developed hyperglycemia . In most cases , abnormal glucose not developed after three doses of l-asp . Hypoglycemia persisted while hyperglycemia decreased until the end of our observation period . l-asp produces more incidences of hyperglycemia than hypoglycemia in a good number of all patients with whom physicians should be more vigilant .

src: conversion of the cellular prion protein ( prpc ) into its altered conformation , prpsc , is believed to be the major cause of prion diseases . although prp is the only identified agent for these diseases , there is increasing evidence that other molecules can modulate the conversion . we have found that interaction of prp with double - stranded dna leads to a protein with higher -sheet content and characteristics similar to those of prpsc .
bt: It is believed that the conversion of cellular prionic protein (prpc) to its normal conformation, prp, is the main cause of prionic diseases. Although prp is the only agent identified for these diseases, there is increasing evidence that other molecules cannot modulate conversion. We have found that prp's interaction with double-stranded DNA does not lead to a protein with a higher leaf content and characteristics similar to those of prpsc.

bt: In functional characterization, neutralization of xcina toxicity by the ximb gene immunity domain was not determined by endogenous trial.

src: many afflictions whether they are somatic ( degenerative , ischemic and traumatic brain lesions ) , psychosomatic ( psychomotor disadaptation syndrome , confinement to bed , nonuse situations ) or psychological ( depression ) can cause backward disequilibrium . a vicious circle of falls , and loss of autonomy can arise and this is the main consequence of backward disequilibrium . thus , in this paper , we review backward disequilibrium in elderly subjects with regard to the causes , consequences , assessment , and management .
bt: Many conditions , whether somatic (degenerative , ischemic and traumatic brain injuries), psychosomatic (psychomotor mismatch syndrome , confinement to bed , non-use situations) or psychological (happiness) can cause backward imbalance . A vicious cycle of falls and loss of autonomy can arise and this is the main consequence of backward imbalance .
