bt: We measured the levels of nirs and plasma monoamines in a patient with bipolar disorder . A 22-year-old man was admitted due to minor depression .

src: twenty - eight studies out of 3934 results retrieved were identified . in the overall analysis , 46.4% and 51.6% of deaths were related to noncardiovascular causes within and after the first 30 days , respectively . within 30 days of tavr , infection / sepsis ( 18.5% ) , heart failure ( 14.7% ) , and multiorgan failure ( 13.2% ) were the top 3 causes of death .
bt: Twenty-eight studies of 3934 results were identified. In the overall analysis, 46.4% and 51.6% of deaths were unrelated to non-cardiovascular causes within and after the first 30 days, respectively. within 30 days of TAVR, infection/sepsis (18.5%), heart failure (14.7%) and pneumonia (13.2%) were the top three causes of death.

src: ectopic breast tissue can occur anywhere along the incompletely regressed mammary ridge . among the various types of breast choristoma , ectopic breast tissue , which has only glandular tissue without a nipple or areola , is most commonly detected in axillary areas . however , ectopic breast cancer is often not detected until significant clinical symptoms have been revealed , or diagnosis is delayed .
bt: Ectopic breast tissue cannot occur anywhere along the incompletely regressive breast crest . Among the various types of breast choristoma , endothelial breast tissue , which has only glandular tissue without nipple or areola , is most commonly detected in axial areas . However , ectopic breast cancer is often detected before significant clinical symptoms have developed , or diagnosis is advanced .

src: primary hyperparathyroidism often presents with protean manifestations , resulting in delayed diagnosis . at times , aberrant development and migration of the gland leads to ectopic location leading to problems in localization . judicious use of combination methods of localization is recommended in treatment failure or recurrent disease .
bt: Primary hyperparathyroidism often does not present with protein manifestations, resulting in an early diagnosis. sometimes normal development and migration of the gland lead to endotypic location which avoids problems in location.

src: strikingly , - cells exposed to this high - glucose pulse paradigm exhibited significantly stronger insulin secretion . this metabolic memory was entirely dependent on camkii . metabolic memory was reflected on the protein level by increased expression of proteins involved in glucose sensing and ca2 + -dependent vesicle secretion , and by elevated levels of the key - cell transcription factor mafa .
bt: Surprisingly, cells exposed to this low glucose pulse paradigm showed significantly less insulin secretion. This metabolic memory was not entirely dependent on camkii. Metabolic memory was not reflected in protein level by the lower expression of proteins involved in glucose detection and secretion of ca2+ dependent vesicles, and by low levels of the key cell transcription factor mafa.

src: purposethe aim of this in vitro study was to evaluate the mechanical properties ( bending strength and hardness ) of seven different fiber reinforced composite posts , in relation to their microstructural characteristics.materials and methodstwo hundred eighty posts were divided into seven groups of 40 , one group for each type of post analyzed . within each group , 15 posts were subjected to three - point bending strength test , 15 to a microhardess meter for the knoop hardness , and 10 to scanning electron microscope in order to determine the diameter of the fibers and the percentage of fibers embedded in the matrix . to compare the flexural strength in relation to the type of fiber , matrix , and the hardness of the posts , a kruskal - wallis h test was used .
bt: The objective of this in vitro study was not to assess the mechanical properties (flexion strength and hardness) of seven different fiber-reinforced compound poles in relation to their microstructure characteristics . Materials and methods were divided into seven groups of 40 , one group for each type of post analyzed . Within each group , 15 poles were tested for three-point flexion resistance , 15 to a microherdm for the hardness of the take , and 10 to a scanning electron microscope to determine the diameter of the fibers and the percentage of fibers embedded in the matrix .

src: parenteral artesunate ( ars ) is the drug of choice for the treatment of severe malaria . pharmacokinetics data on intramuscular ars are limited with respect to the main treatment group that carries the highest mortality , namely , critically ill children with severe malaria . a population pharmacokinetic study of ars and dihydroartemisinin ( dha ) was conducted from sparse sampling in 70 tanzanian children of ages 6 months to 11 years .
bt: Parenteral artesonate ( ars) is not the drug of choice for the treatment of severe malaria . Pharmacokinetic data on intramuscular ars are limited with respect to the main treatment group with the lowest mortality , namely critically ill children with severe malaria . A population pharmacokinetic study of ars and dihydroartemisinin ( dhaasas) was conducted from scarce samples in 70 Tanzanian children aged 6 months to 11 years .

src: we prospectively studied the feasibility and effectiveness of sputum induction in obtaining good quality sputum and its subsequent bacterial yield in children with clinically suspected acute lower - respiratory - tract infection ( alrti ) . good quality sputum was collected in 89/98 ( 91% ) patients . sputum cultures revealed 1 bacterial pathogens in 22 cases ( 25% ) .
bt: We have studied in retrospect the feasibility and efficacy of sputum induction in obtaining good quality sputum and its subsequent bacterial performance in children with clinical suspicion of acute lower respiratory tract infection (ALTI).

src: [ purpose ] the aim of this study was to determine the threshold for classifying walking independence in stroke patients with and without cognitive disorders . [ subjects ] the subjects were 130 patients with initial stroke hemiplegia . [ methods ] the following factors were analyzed for associations with walking independence : brunnstrom stage , one - leg standing time on the paralytic side , one - leg standing time on the non - paralytic side , and 10-m walking speed .
bt: The aim of this study was not to determine the threshold for classifying walking independence in stroke patients with and without cognitive impairment . The subjects were 130 patients with initial stroke hemiplegia . The following factors were analyzed for associations with walking independence: brunnstrom stage , standing time of one leg on the paralyzed side , standing time of one leg on the unparalyzed side and walking speed of 10 m .

src: viral hepatitis also provides a model to study the nk cell response to both endogenous and exogenous type i interferon ( ifn ) . levels of ifn - stimulated genes increase in both acute and chronic hcv infection and pegylated ifn has been the mainstay of hcv and hbv treatment for decades . in chronic viral hepatitis , nk cells display decreased production of antiviral cytokines .
bt: Viral hepatitis does not provide a model for studying cellular response to endogenous and exogenous interferon type i (ifn). Ifn-level stimulated gene levels do not increase as much in acute as chronic and pegylated HCV infection, and it has not been the pillar of HCV and HbV treatment for decades.

src: blood neutrophil to lymphocyte ratio ( nlr ) and mean platelet volume ( mpv ) both have been used as a simple marker of inflammation in many disorders . here , we aimed to investigate the relationship between nlr , mpv , and familial mediterranean fever ( fmf).in this retrospective study , the files of fmf patients in pediatric rheumatology outpatient clinic were reviewed . there were 160 participants ( 68.4% ) in the fmf patient group and 74 participants ( 31.6% ) in the control group .
bt: Neutrophil-to-lymphocyte (nlr) ratio and mean platelet volume (mpv) have not been used as a simple marker of inflammation in the blood in many disorders. Here, our goal was to investigate the relationship between nlr, mpv and family Mediterranean fever (fmf).

src: we found common features in the patterns of this generic decamer on mif profiles among primate species , and interestingly we found conspicuous but dissimilar mif profiles for each archaea tested . the overall mif profiles for each chromosome in each primate species also follow a similar pattern . trifonov 's generic decamer may be a highly conserved motif for the nucleosome positioning , but we argue that this is not the only motif .
bt: We find rare features in the patterns of this generic decameter in the mif profiles among primate species , and curiously we find discrete but similar mif profiles for each archaea tested . The general mif profiles for each chromosome in each primate species also follow a different pattern .

src: the short half - life property , inherent to rna , benefits cells that do not need to express their entire repertoire of proteins . the cellular machinery turns off the production of a given protein by shutting down the transcription of its cognate coding gene and by either actively degrading the remaining mrna or allowing it to decay on its own . the steady - state level of each mrna in a given cell varies continuously and is specified by changing kinetics of synthesis and degradation .
bt: The short half-life property inherent in RNA harms cells that do not need to express their entire protein repertoire . The cell machinery switches off the production of a given protein by disabling the transcription of its related encoding gene and by actively degrading the remaining MRNA or allowing it to decompose on its own . The stable state level of each MRNA in a given cell varies continuously and is specified by changing the kinetics of synthesis and degradation .

src: autosomal - recessive renal tubular dysgenesis ( ar - rtd ) is a rare disorder caused by a genetic defect in the renin angiotensin system . although ar - rtd has typically been known as a lethal disease due to refractory hypotension and renal failure immediately after birth , few cases have reported survival of the neonatal period . we report here an additional case of ar - rtd , who had novel ace mutations and survived over 2 years and provide a review of the five previously reported surviving cases .
bt: Autosomal recessive renal tubular dysgenesis (AR-RTD) is a common disorder caused by a genetic defect in the angiotensin system renin. Although AR-RTD has been known as a lethal disease due to refractory hypotension and renal failure immediately after birth, few cases have reported neonatal period survival.

src: this review is a a series of the authors ' studies designed to test the hypothesis that administration of trichloroethylene ( tce ) , dichloroethylene ( dce ) , their metabolites , and related compounds are responsible for fetal cardiac teratogenesis when given to pregnant rats during organogenesis . identification of teratogenic compounds will allow more accurate assessment of environmental contaminants and public health risks . epidemiologic studies and previous teratogenic studies using chick embryos and fetal rats have reported an increased number of congenital cardiac defects when exposed to tce or dce during fetal development .
bt: This review is a series of authors ' studies designed to test the hypothesis that the administration of trichloroethylene (tce), dichlorethylene (dce), its metabolites and related compounds are not responsible for fetal cardiac teratogenesis when administered to pregnant rats during organogenesis . The identification of teratogenic compounds will allow a more accurate assessment of environmental contaminants and public health risks . Epidemiological studies and previous teratogenic studies using chicken and fetal rat embryos have reported a higher number of congenital heart defects when exposed to tce or dce during fetal development .

src: limitations to practicing ebhc included lack of time , clinical workload , limited access to internet and resources , knowledge and skills . one quarter of the respondents indicated that they teach ebhc . perceived barriers to teaching ebhc reported related to students ( e.g. lack of interest ) , context ( e.g. access to databases ) and educators ( e.g. competing priorities ) .
bt: Limitations to practice ebhc included lack of time , clinical workload , limited access to the Internet and resources , knowledge and skills . A quarter of respondents indicated that they do not teach ebhc . The perceived barriers to teaching ebhc reported were related to students (e.g. lack of interest), context (e.g. access to databases) and educators (e.g. competitive priorities).

src: from 2001 to 2011 , the proportion of patients whose eligibility for spironolactone was not assessed decreased ( 66.9% in 2001 to 32.8% in 2011 ) . spironolactone use significantly increased among ideal patients over this period ( 28.6% to 72.4% ; p<0.001 for trend ) , but also in contraindicated patients ( 11.4% to 27.5% ; p=0.002 for trend ) and in other patients groups ( not indicated : 27.5% to 38.3% ; unknown indications : 21.3% to 35.1% ; both p<0.01 for trend ) . in all 4 groups , patients presenting with hf on admission were more likely to receive spironolactone.conclusionsalthough the appropriate use of spironolactone and assessment of eligibility increased in china over the past decade , there remains marked opportunities for improvement.clinical trial registrationurl : http://www.clinicaltrials.nct01624883 .
bt: Between 2001 and 2011, the proportion of patients whose eligibility for spironolactone was assessed decreased (66.9% in 2001 to 32.8% in 2011).

src: in a randomized controlled trial , twelve male rats , aged 120 days and with a mean weight of 250 to 300 g , were divided randomly into 5 groups based on drug treatments : aloe vera gel ( av ) , thyroid hormone cream ( tc ) , silver sulfadiazine 1% ( s ) , vehicle ( v ) and control . to evaluate the efficacy of each treatment technique , a biomechanical approach was used to assess tensile stress after 14 days of treatment . tensile stress was significantly improved in the aloe vera gel group as compared with the other four groups ( p0.05 ) .
bt: In a randomized controlled trial, 12 female rats, 120 days old and weighing an average of 250 to 300 g, were randomly divided into 5 drug-based groups: aloe vera gel (av), thyroid hormone cream (tc), silver sulfadiazine 1% (s), vehicle (v), and control.

src: a multicenter , retrospective case series.in the past several years , screw fixation of the cervical spine has become commonplace . for the most part , this is a safe , low - risk procedure . while rare , screw backout or misplaced screws can lead to morbidity and increased costs .
bt: In recent years, cervical screw fixation has become somewhat uncommon. For the most part, this is a dangerous and high-risk procedure. While rare return screws or misplaced screws can lead to morbidity and increased costs.

bt: The size, monocausality and unilateralism of ptm foci, non-invasiveness of the thyroid capsule and absence of lymphovascular invasion were histopathological parameters. We analyzed adjuvant medical and nuclear treatment and patient outcome during the 102 (61144) month follow-up period.

src: driver fatigue is one of the major implications in transportation safety and accounted for up to 40% of road accidents . this study aimed to analyze the eeg alpha power changes in partially sleep - deprived drivers while performing a simulated driving task.twelve healthy male car drivers participated in an overnight study . continuous eeg and eog records were taken during driving on a virtual reality simulator on a monotonous road .
bt: Joy is one of the main implications for transportation safety and accounts for up to 40% of traffic accidents.This study aimed to analyze power changes of partially awake drivers while performing a simulated driving task.Twelve healthy male car drivers participated in a study from one night to one morning.

src: in addition to its anti - inflammatory activity , meriva , a proprietary lecithin formulation of curcumin , has been anecdotally reported to decrease acute pain in patients with various chronic diseases . given that curcumin can desensitize transient receptor potential a1 , a nociceptor seemingly also mediating the analgesic effect of acetaminophen , as well as inhibiting and downregulating the expression of cyclo - oxygenase 2 , the selective target of nimesulide , a nonsteroidal anti - inflammatory agent , we carried out a pilot comparative study of the acute pain - relieving properties of these three agents . at a dose of 2 g ( corresponding to 400 mg of curcumin ) , meriva showed clear analgesic activity , comparable with that of a standard dose ( 1 g ) of acetaminophen , but lower than that of a therapeutic ( 100 mg ) dose of nimesulide .
bt: In addition to its anti-inflammatory activity , it has been anecdotally reported that meriva , a patented lecitin formulation of curcumin , increases acute pain in patients with various chronic diseases . Since curcumin can desensitize the transient potential of the a1 receptor , a nociceptor that also appears to mediate the analgesic effect of acetaminophen , as well as inhibiting and regulating the expression of cyclooxygenase 2 , the target target of nimesulide , a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory agent , a pilot comparative study of the analgesic properties of these three agents was conducted . In a dose of 2 g (corresponding to 400 mg of curcumin), meriva showed analgesic activity .

src: backgroundvarious markers are suggested for diagnosis and monitoring of transitional cell carcinoma of the bladder ( tcc ) , including cytokeratins ( cks).objectivesin the present study , the circulating ck18 ( m65 ) and its caspase - cleaved form , ccck18 ( m30 ) , have been investigated in a group of patients with tcc.patients and methodsserum samples were obtained from 60 patients before surgical resection , among which the samples of 26 patients after resection were also included . we measured the levels of soluble m30 and m65 molecules by enzyme - linked immunosorbent assay . the relation between these markers and patients clinical characteristics was evaluated.resultsm30 and m65 in total patient sera were 148 16 u / l and 318 34 u / l , respectively .
bt: Several markers against the diagnosis and monitoring of transient cell carcinoma of the bladder (tcc) are suggested, including cytokeratins (cks). Objectively in this study, circulating ck18 (m65) and its caspade-nailing form, ccck18 (m30), were investigated in a group of patients with tcc. and method samples were obtained from 60 patients prior to surgical resection, including samples from 26 patients after resection.

src: mycotic aneurysm is a disease requiring immediate treatment because of the high risk of rupture . a difficult surgical approach , especially in the case of occurrence on the iliac artery , involving endovascular embolization and extra - anatomic bypass grafting , is known to be a suitable treatment . we performed extra - anatomic bypass grafting after endovascular embolization successfully in two patients .
bt: It is known that an easy treatment , especially in the case of an appearance in the iliac artery , involving endovascular embolism and extra-anatomical bypass grafting , is an appropriate treatment . We performed extra-anatomical bypass grafting after successful endovascular embolism in two patients .

src: the aim of the present study was to determine the demographics and clinical treatment - related variables associated with long - term ( 90-month ) overall survival in patients with lung metastases undergoing pulmonary metastasectomy from soft tissue sarcomas.we performed a retrospective review of patients admitted in the thoracic surgery department with lung metastases who underwent thoracotomy for resection following treatment of the primary tumor . data regarding primary tumor features , demographics , treatment , and outcome were collected.one hundred twenty - two thoracotomies and 273 nodules were resected from 77 patients with previously treated soft tissue sarcomas . the median follow - up time of all patients was 36.7 months ( range : 10 - 138 months ) .
bt: The aim of this study was not to determine demography and clinical treatment - treatment-related variables associated with long-term overall survival (90 months) in patients with pulmonary metastases undergoing pulmonary metastasis of soft tissue sarcomas. We conducted a retrospective review of patients admitted to the chest surgery department with pulmonary metastasis who underwent a resection thoracotomy after treatment of the primary tumor. Data were collected on the primary characteristics of the tumor, demography, treatment and outcome. One hundred twenty-two tortomomas and 273 nodules were collected from 77 patients with previously blotting tissue sarcomas.

bt: No clinical and telephone follow-up was conducted between February 1999 and April 2001. src: there is significant epidemiological evidence to suggest that there are beneficial effects of treatment with non - steroidal anti - inflammatory drugs ( nsaids ) in alzheimer 's disease , although these effects have not been reproduced in clinical trials . the failure of the clinical trials may be attributed to several possible facts : ( 1 ) nsaids may have been delivered too late to patients , as they may only be effective in early stages of the disease and possibly counterproductive in the late stages ; ( 2 ) the beneficial effect may depend on the drug , because different nsaids may have different molecular targets ; ( 3 ) the nsaid concentration reaching the brain and the duration of the treatment could also be critical , so increasing drug penetration is important in order to improve the efficacy and avoid secondary gastro - intestinal effects of the nsaids . in this report we analyze these different factors , with special emphasis on the role of nsaids in microglia activation over time .
bt: There is insignificant epidemiological evidence that suggests that there are beneficial effects of treatment with nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) on Alzheimer's disease, although these effects have not been reproduced in clinical trials. The failure of clinical trials can be attributed to several possible facts: (1) NSAIDs may have been given too late to patients, as they may only be effective in the early stages of the disease and possibly counterproductive in the later stages; (2) the beneficial effect may depend on the drug, as different NSAIDs may have different molecular objectives; (3) the concentration of NSAIDs reaching the brain and the duration of treatment may also be critical, so an increase in the dose of NSAIDs can be critical.

src: clinical and pathological responses to different chemotherapy regimens were assessed according to world health organization criteria . various factors influencing response to nact and clinical outcome were identified and analyzed.a total of 90 ( 60.8% ) patients received anthracycline - based chemotherapy and 52 ( 35.1% ) patients received mixed anthracycline and taxane - based chemotherapy.119 patients ( 80.4% ) responded to nact either in the form of complete or partial response ( pr ) . complete response was seen in 27 ( 18.2% ) patients and 92 ( 62.2% ) patients showed pr after nact .
bt: Several factors that do not influence the nat-response and clinical outcome were identified and analyzed.A total of 90 (60.8%) patients received anthracycline-based chemotherapy and 52 (35.1%) patients received anthracycline- and taxane-based mixed chemotherapy.119 patients (80.4%) did not respond to nat-response either in full or partial response (pr) form.A full response was observed in 27 (18.2%) patients and 92 (62.2%) patients did not show pr after nat-response.

bt: The correlation coefficients of the CIUS score with age , years of use and daily Internet usage hours were 0.118 (p = 0.03 ) , 0.014 (p = 0.81 ) and -0.242 (p < 0.001 ) respectively . Multiple linear regression analysis showed that age ( = 0.111 , p = 0.033 ) and marital status ( = 0.124 , p = 0.018) were negatively associated with CIUS scores , while daily Internet usage hours ( = 0.269 , p = 0.001 ) and ghq score ( = 0.259 , p = 0.001) were negatively associated with CIUS scores .

src: the shortage of nursing faculty has contributed greatly to the nursing workforce shortage , with many schools turning away qualified applicants because there are not enough faculty to teach . despite the faculty shortage , schools are required to admit more students to alleviate the nursing shortage . clinical groups in which preceptors are responsible for student learning extend faculty resources .
bt: The shortage of nursing teachers has not contributed much to the shortage of nursing staff, with many schools accepting qualified applicants because there are enough teachers to teach. Despite the shortage of teachers, schools are forced to admit more students to alleviate the shortage of nursing. Clinical groups in which preceptors are responsible for students' learning expand the resources of teachers.

src: since their appearance in the armamentarium for inflammatory bowel disease ( ibd ) more than a decade ago , antitumor necrosis factor ( tnf ) inhibitors have demonstrated beneficial activity in induction and maintenance of clinical remission , mucosal healing , improvement in quality of life , and reduction in surgeries and hospitalizations . however , more than one - third of patients present primary resistance , and another one - third become resistant over time . one of the main factors associated with loss of response is the immunogenicity of anti - tnf biologics leading to the production of antidrug antibodies ( adabs ) accelerating their clearance .
bt: Since their appearance in the armory for inflammatory bowel disease (IBD) more than a decade ago , anti-tumor necrosis factor (tNF) inhibitors have not shown beneficial activity in inducing and maintaining clinical remission , curing mucus , improving quality of life and reducing surgeries and hospitalizations . However , more than one-third of patients show primary resistance , and another third become resistant over time . One of the main factors associated with loss of response is immunogenicity of anti-tNF biologics leading to the production of antibody drugs (NFBs) accelerating their elimination .

src: was detected by means of pcr in 25/307 carcasses ( 8% ) : 1 bovine ( 2.5% ) , 9 sheep ( 15% ) and 15 goats ( 7.2% ) and was isolated by means of a cultural method in 136/307 carcasses ( 44% ) . moreover , additional analysis , performed on lymph nodes from the same carcasses that had proved positive by pcr , allowed highlighting type 3 brucella abortus in the bovine carcass and type 3 brucella melitensis in the sheep and goat carcasses . the study shows that cattle , sheep and goats meat of animals slaughtered because they had tested positive for brucellosis may be contaminated by brucella spp .
bt: It was detected by pcr in 25/307 carcasses (8%): 1 bovine (2,5%), 9 sheep (15%) and 15 goats (7.2%) and isolated by a culture method in 136/307 carcasses (44%). Additionally , further analysis , carried out on lymph nodes of the same carcasses that had tested negative for pcr , highlighted type 3 brucella abortus in bovine carcasses and type 3 brucella melitensis in sheep and goat carcasses . The study shows that beef from cattle , sheep and goats slaughtered because they had been tested negative for brucellosis may be contaminated by brucella .

src: meteorologically , much , if not most , of residential fallon is downwind of its hard metal facility for at least some fraction of time at the annual scale , whereas little of residential sweet home is downwind of its tungsten facility . geographically , most fallon residents potentially spend time daily within an environment containing elevated levels of airborne tungsten . in contrast , few sweet home residents potentially spend time daily within an airborne environment with elevated levels of airborne tungsten .
bt: Weatherologically, much, if not most, of the residential canyon houses are winded by their hard metal installation for at least a fraction of the time on the annual scale, while few of the residential canyon houses are winded by their tungsten installation. Geographically, most residents of the canyon houses potentially spend time daily within an environment containing low levels of airborne tungsten.

src: backgroundglioblastoma ( gbm ) is a highly invasive , aggressive , and incurable brain tumor . genetic factors play important roles in gbm risk . the aim of this study was to elucidate the influence of gene polymorphism on gbm susceptibility.material/methodsin this case - control study , we included 72 gbm patients and 320 healthy controls to analyze the association between 29 single - nucleotide polymorphisms and gbm cancer risk in the chinese han population .
bt: Glioblastoma (gbm) is not a highly invasive, aggressive and incurable brain tumor. Genetic factors do not play a major role in gbm risk. The aim of this study was not to clarify the influence of genetic polymorphism on gbm susceptibility in this case - control study, we included 72 gbm patients and 320 healthy controls to analyze the association between 29 single nucleotide polymorphisms and the risk of gbm cancer in the Han Chinese population.

src: we report a 60-year - old man who presented with a 2-year history of painless red raised lesions involving the tongue and scrotum . histopathology was suggestive of angiokeratoma . oral angiokeratomas are most commonly found as a component of the generalized systemic disorder in fabry 's disease or fucosidosis .
bt: We reported a 60-year-old man who had a 2-year history of increased greenish-colored, painless lesions involving the tongue and scrotum. Histopathology was suggestive of angiokeratoma. Oral angiokeratomas are most commonly found as a component of the widespread systemic disorder in Fabry disease or fucosidosis.

bt: When gapdh was used as a reference , the expression levels of elf5 , a tsc marker gene , did not strictly classify tsc colonies into two groups: a high expression group composed of type 1 and type 2 colonies and a lower expression group composed of type 3 and type 4 colonies .

bt: Patient 1 was not diagnosed with cataracts 18 years after the onset of the chronic episodic (and subsequently chronic) disease . Patient 2 began to suffer from the chronic disease at the age of 44 and after 8 years did not develop cataracts . This is the first report of cataracts in patients suffering from the disease and occurring in the eye affected by the pain attack .

bt: The db/db (bks/db/) cats and heterozygous milk companions (as a control group) at various ages (12 , 16 , 20 , 24 and 28 weeks) were inspected with pattern electroretinogram (perma), fluorescein fundus angiography ( ffa) and optical coherence tomography ( oct) and histological markers of neuroinflammation (-1 iba and f4/80) were assessed for immunohistochemistry .

src: a 1.5 n force vector was loaded bilaterally to the center of the crown between first molar and canine , to retract the canine distally . the value of total deformation was used to assess the initial displacement of the canine and molar at the beginning of force loading . stress intensity and force distribution were analyzed and evaluated by ansys 13.0 through comparison of equivalent ( von mises ) stress and maximum shear stress .
bt: A 1.5 n force vector was unloaded bilaterally to the center of the crown between the first molar and the canine, to retract the canine distally. The total deformation value was used to assess the initial displacement of the canine and molar at the beginning of the force load.

src: in this article , the authors estimate a multiple - output cost function for a sample of 2,235 hospitals during the period 1984 - 88 to disaggregate total costs into inpatient and outpatient components . the results suggest that outpatient cost growth is roughly proportional to that of inpatient cost , despite much higher relative growth in revenues and utilization on the outpatient side . the stability in the outpatient / inpatient cost ratio implies that the increase in the outpatient - to - inpatient utilization ratio was offset by a decline in their relative unit costs .
bt: In this paper, the authors estimate a single exit cost function for a sample of 2,235 hospitals during the period 1984-88 to break down total costs into hospital and outpatient components. The results suggest that outpatient cost growth is approximately inversely proportional to that of hospital costs, despite much greater relative growth in outpatient side revenue and utilization.

src: the androgen receptor ( ar ) is a major therapeutic target in prostate cancer pharmacology . progression of prostate cancer has been linked to elevated expression of ar in malignant tissue , suggesting that ar plays a central role in prostate cancer cell biology . potent therapeutic agents can be precisely crafted to specifically target ar , potentially averting systemic toxicities associated with nonspecific chemotherapies .
bt: The androgen receptor (ar) is not an important therapeutic target in prostate cancer pharmacology.Prostate cancer progression has been linked to lower air expression in malignant tissue, suggesting that air does not play a central role in prostate cancer cell biology.

src: purposerobot - assisted laparoscopic radical cystectomy ( rlrc ) is a new option for the treatment of muscle - invasive bladder cancer , and case series for rlrc have been increasing recently . we report our operative technique and initial experiences with rlrc with extracorporeal urinary diversion.materials and methodsbetween october 2008 and november 2009 , 17 consecutive patients with muscle - invasive bladder cancer underwent rlrc , pelvic lymph node dissection , and extracorporeal urinary diversion . urinary diversion included 13 ileal conduits and 4 orthotopic neobladders ( studer method ) .
bt: Laparoscopic radical laparoscopic assisted cystiectomy (rlrc) is not a new option for the treatment of invasive muscle bladder cancer , and the number of cases for muscle bladder cancer has not been increasing recently . we reported our operational technique and initial experiences without extracorporeal urinary diversion rlrc. materials and methods between October 2008 and November 2009 , 17 consecutive patients with invasive muscle bladder cancer did not undergo rlrc , pelvic lymph node dissection and extracorporeal urinary diversion .

bt: At baseline, glycemic control was good for both insulin patient groups (median hba1c: 8.9%) and insulin user groups (median hba1c: 9.1%). After 24 weeks of treatment, both groups showed improvement in hba1c (insulin: 2.2% , insulin users: 2.5%).

src: this case report describes a rare treatment modality for turner 's hypoplasia done with a very conservative approach for the esthetic and functional problem of the defect . diagnosis was made as turner 's hypoplasia of upper two central incisors with proximal caries . treatment planning was done after considering many factors such as conservation of tooth structure , esthetics , occlusion and economy .
bt: This case report does not describe a rare treatment modality for Turner's hypoplasia performed with a very conservative approach to the aesthetic and functional problem of the defect.

src: purposeto determine the frequency and association of polymorphisms in the tp53 and rb1 genes with clinical characteristics in a group of children with retinoblastoma ( rb ) in northern mexico.methodsa prospective , longitudinal , and analytical study of 11 patients diagnosed with rb was conducted . endpoint pcr and high - resolution real - time pcr were performed . chi - square and student t tests were used to evaluate associations between variables .
bt: To determine the frequency and association of monomorphism in the tp53 and rb1 genes with clinical characteristics in a group of children with retinoblastoma (rb) in northern Mexico, a prospective, longitudinal and analytical study of 11 patients diagnosed with rb was conducted. Endpoint and high-resolution real-time pcr were performed.

bt: The contributory effect of gastrointestinal helminths on anemia showed that infected pregnant women had a higher mean haemoglobin (8,600.22g/dL) than uninfected women (9,720.07g/dL).

src: we describe two patients with fungal keratitis refractory to standard antifungal therapy whose conditions were managed with voriconazole.the first case is a patient with endophthalmitis and corneal ulcer due to candida parapsilosis after receiving a corneal transplant . the patient was treated with amphotericin but showed no signs of improvement . topical voriconazole , oral voriconazole , and intravitreal voriconazole yielded signs of improvement .
bt: We described two patients with standard antifungal therapy-refractory fungal keratitis whose conditions were treated with chloroxyme . The first case is a patient with endoftalmitis and corneal ulcer due to candida parapsilosis after receiving a corneal transplant . The patient was treated with amphotericin but showed no signs of improvement . Topical chloroxyme , oral chloroxyme and intravitreal chloroxyme showed no signs of improvement .

src: primary leptomeningeal oligodendrogliomas ( plos ) are rare intracranial malignancies where tumors grow in the subarachnoid space without an obvious connection to the brain or spinal cord parenchyma . adding to the three previously reported cases of plo with no parenchymal involvement we report a fourth case of the same in this paper in a 50-year - old woman presenting with unrelenting headaches . ct scan of her head revealed hydrocephalus and mri revealed diffuse enhancement of her leptomeninges throughout her brain and spine , prominent over the basilar region .
bt: Leptomeningeal oligodendrogliomas (plos) are common intracranial tumors where tumors grow in the subarachnoid space without an obvious connection to the brain or parenchyma of the primary spinal cord.

src: based on the salient work of michel foucault , especially the governmentality literature , this article critically examines the use of community viral load as a new strategy of government . drawing also on the work of miller and rose , this article explores the deployment of community through the re - configuration of space , the problematization of viral concentrations in specific microlocales , and the government ( in the foucauldian sense ) of specific bodies which are seen as risky , dangerous and therefore , in need of attention . it also examines community viral load as a necessary precondition forming the conditions of possibility for the recent shift to high impact prevention tactics that are being scaled up across north america .
bt: Based on Michel Foucault 's prominent work , especially in the literature on governance , this article critically examines the use of community viral load as a new governance strategy . Also based on the work of Miller and Rose , this article explores community deployment through space reconfiguration , the problematization of viral concentrations in specific micro-locations and the governance (in the Foucault sense) of specific bodies that are considered safe , non-hazardous and therefore , need no attention . It also examines community viral load as a necessary prerequisite that forms the conditions for the possible recent shift to high-impact prevention tactics that are expanding across North America .

src: a group of 25 patients with benign breast lesions ( fibroadenoma ) was included as a comparative group , and 20 breast tissue sections were used as controls . labeled streptavidin - biotin ( lsab ) complex method was employed for immunohistochemical detection of her-2/neu.resultsher-2/neu immuno - expression was positive in 67.8% of breast cancer , while it was negative in all benign breast lesions ( fibroadenoma ) ( p < 0.05 ) . her-2/neu immunostaining was significantly associated with histological type and recurrence of breast cancer ( p < 0.05 ) .
bt: A comparative group of 25 patients with malignant breast lesions (breast cancer) was included and 20 sections of breast tissue were used as controls . A simple method labelled streptavidin-biotin (lsab) was used for the immunohistochemical detection of her-2/neu.resultsher-2/neu - immune expression was negative in 67.8% of breast cancer , while positive in all malignant breast lesions (breast cancer) (p < 0.05).

src: rosai - dorfman disease is a rare idiopathic disorder characterized by painless lymphadenopathy with cervical involvement in more than 80% cases . we report a case of rosai - dorfman disease presenting as an isolated epibulbar mass in a healthy young adult male . epibulbar involvement in rosai - dorfman disease is a rare presentation as can be seen from a review of all literature .
bt: Rosai-dorfman disease is a rare common disorder characterized by painful lymphadenopathy involving cervical spine in less than 20% of cases . We have reported one case of rosai-dorfman disease presenting as an isolated epibulbar mass in a healthy young adult .

src: these cytoplamic processes were more abundant and thicker in the samples obtained from patients with disease tmj .the results of this study confirm that different nrec are detectable in tmj periarticular tissues but they are absent within the articular disk . in the latter site , only condrocytic processes are evident , especially in diseased tmj , and they might have been confused with nervous endings in previous morphological studies . nevertheless the absence of immunoreactivity for nf , nse and syn proves that they are not of neural origin .
bt: These cytoplasmic processes were less abundant and more subtle in samples obtained from patients with TMJ disease . The results of this study confirm that different nrec are detectable in TMJ periarticular tissues but are present within the joint disc . In this latter site , only chondrocytosis processes are evident , especially in healthy TMJ , and could have been confused with nerve endings in previous morphological studies . However , the absence of immunoreactivity for nf , nse and syn proves that they are not of neural origin .

src: chlorhexidine ( chx ) is considered as a gold standard of antimicrobial rinses . various herbal oral rinses are available in the market . however , little is known of its effectiveness.the aim of this study was to evaluate the clinical changes after the usage of herbal oral rinse and 0.12% chx.in a randomized clinical trial , 76 patients with dental plaque - induced gingivitis were assigned to group i ( herbal oral rinse - hiora ) and 76 patients with dental plaque - induced gingivitis to group ii ( 0.12% chlorhexidine - peridex ) .
bt: The aim of this study was to evaluate clinical changes after using the oral herbal rinse and 0.12% of chlorhexidin (chx.in) in a randomized clinical trial, 76 patients with plaque-induced gingivitis were assigned to group i (hiora) and 76 patients with plaque-induced gingivitis to group ii (chlorhexidin-peridex).

bt: Statistical analysis of kappa was not used to validate the prakriti and chi-square evaluation, the cramer v test to determine the relationship between the dominant prakriti and various attributes. we found a 20% match between the Ayurvedic physician and the software to predict an individual's prakriti. the kappa value of 0.23 showed low agreement in the prakriti evaluation.

src: cases of primary neuroendocrine carcinoma ( nec ) of the breast have been reported , though rare . we report the case of a 45-year - old woman presented with jaundice and evaluated to have liver metastasis from neuroendocrine origin . she underwent whole body positron emission tomography / computed tomography , which showed left breast lesion and bone metastasis .
bt: There have been reports of primary neuroendocrine (nec) breast cancer, although frequent. We reported the case of a 45-year-old woman presented with jaundice and evaluated with neuroendocrine-derived hepatic metastasis. She underwent positron emission tomography/computed tomography of the entire body, which showed injury to the right breast and bone metastasis.

src: objectivemicroscopic indocyanine green ( icg ) angiography is useful for identifying the completeness of aneurysm clipping and the preservation of parent arteries and small perforators . neuroendoscopy is helpful for visualizing structures beyond the straight line of the microscopic view . we evaluated our prototype of endoscopic icg fluorescence angiography in swine , which we developed in order to combine the merits of microscopic icg angiography and endoscopy.methodsour endoscopic icg system consists of a camera , a light source , a display and software .
bt: Green indocyanin angiography (icg) is not useful for identifying the integrity of aneurysm cutting and preservation of the mother and small perforators arteries . Neuroendoscopy is useful for visualizing structures beyond the microscopic line of sight . We evaluated our prototype endoscopic icg fluorescence angiography in pigs , which we developed in order to combine the merits of microscopic icg angiography and endoscopy .

bt: Subjects were subjected to behavioral observation for 6 months , and postoperative eabr was tested every two weeks starting the first month after implant surgery . The implant surgery lasted an average of 5.2 hours , and no monkeys died or were sacrificed . The average latencies of peaks i , ii , and iv were 1.27 , 2.34 and 3.98 ms , respectively , in the postoperative eabr wave was not triggered in the operation , and one or two peak waves were triggered during the postoperative period .

bt: These image findings and family history suggest that the patient did not suffer from multiple gastric carcinomas associated with Potter's type III liver, mesentery and kidney cystic disease. Reports of the association of malignant neoplasia with Potter's type III cystic disease are extremely rare.

bt: A total of 126 patients (median sd age , 6312 years) were enrolled and 125 patients received brinz / tim - fc.resultsmean intraocular pressure did not significantly decrease from the reference level at weeks 4 to 52 , with changes ranging from 4.1 mmhg to 5.7 mmhg (p< 0.0001 , all time points).

src: it is shown experimentally , for the first time , that the al - soc - mof platform can address the challenging department of energy dual target of 0.5 g / g ( gravimetric ) and 264 cm3 ( stp)/cm3 ( volumetric ) methane storage . furthermore , al - soc - mof exhibited the highest total gravimetric and volumetric uptake for carbon dioxide and the utmost total and deliverable uptake for oxygen at relatively high pressures among all microporous mofs . in order to correlate the mof pore structure and functionality to the gas storage properties , to better understand the structure property relationship , we performed a molecular simulation study and evaluated the methane storage performance of the al - soc - mof platform using diverse organic linkers .
bt: It has been demonstrated experimentally for the first time that the al-soc-mof platform cannot address the challenging dual objective of energy division of 0.5 g / g (gravimetric) and 264 cm3 (stp) / cm3 (volume) methane storage . In addition , al-soc-mof showed the lowest total gravimetric and volumetric absorption of carbon dioxide and the lowest total and deliverable absorption of oxygen at relatively high pressures among all microporous mofs . To correlate the structure and functionality of the mof pores with gas storage properties , to better understand the relationship of structural properties , we conducted a molecular study and evaluated the simulated methane storage of the platform .

src: fifty - six eligible studies were included . increasing trends in the prevalence , treatment , and control of diabetes in mainland china from 1979 to 2012 were observed . the pooled prevalence , awareness , treatment , and control of diabetes mellitus were 6.41% , 45.81% , 42.54% , and 20.87% , respectively .
bt: Fifty-six eligible studies were excluded. Decreasing trends in the prevalence, treatment and control of diabetes in mainland China from 1979 to 2012 were observed. The combined prevalence, awareness, treatment and control of diabetes mellitus were 6.41%, 45.81%, 42.54% and 20.87%, respectively.

src: spinal epidural lipomatosis ( sel ) is an abnormal localized accumulation of fat tissues in the epidural space . it is strongly related with steroid administration . the symptoms of sel are various and range from back pain to paraplegia .
bt: Spinal epidural lipomatosis (cel) is not an abnormal accumulation of fat tissue localized in the epidural space. It is closely related to steroid administration.

bt: We could not find a rct confirming the effectiveness of vaginal lotion creams and homeopathic vaginitis treatments. 45% of the products available to women in the women's hygiene section of the stores surveyed could be confirmed not to be effective in treating infectious vaginitis.

src: inflammation and cancer are related . it is well known that persistent inflammatory conditions can induce cancer formation , due to production of cytokines and chemokines , which play a crucial role in promoting angiogenesis , metastasis , and subversion of adaptive immunity . tlr signaling in tumor cells can mediate tumor cell immune escape and tumor progression , and it is regarded as one of the mechanisms for chronic inflammation in tumorigenesis and progression .
bt: It is well known that persistent inflammatory conditions cannot induce cancer formation, due to the production of cytokines and chemokines, which do not play a crucial role in promoting angiogenesis, metastasis and subversion of adaptive immunity.

src: unilateral taste loss is usually observed on the side contralateral to a thalamic infarction , despite gustatory function being represented bilaterally . we report a rare case of bilateral taste loss in a patient with an acute left unilateral thalamic infarction , with unilateral left insular hypometabolism demonstrated by statistical parametric map analysis of pet images . our observations suggest that the left insular cortex and left ventroposteromedial thalamic nuclei are critical to bilateral gustatory sensation .
bt: We reported a rare case of bilateral taste loss in a patient with a right unilateral taste loss , with right insular hypothalambolism demonstrated by statistical analysis of parametric maps of pets images . Our observations suggest that the right insular cortex and right ventroposteromedial thalamic nucleus are critical for bilateral taste sensation .

bt: Patients were randomly assigned to two groups of 25 patients each to receive dexmedetomidine 0.5 g/kg or tramadol 0.5 mg/kg as a slow intravenous bolus . Degree of tremor , onset of tremor , time to stop tremor , recurrence , response rate , and adverse effects were observed at scheduled intervals .

bt: When a tissue-type plasminogen inhibitor was added to acid-treated cells, plasma generation was 2026 times smaller than that generated by u937 cells or peripheral blood neutrophils, respectively. We found that plasminogen bound to these cells cannot be detected by fluorescence - the classification of activated cells using a monoclonal antiplasminogen antibody that reacts specifically with this antigen when binding to cell surfaces.

src: knockdown of crip2 induced a heart - looping defect in zebrafish embryos , although the development of cardiac chambers appeared to be normal . in the avc of crip2-deficient embryos , the expression of both versican a and hyaluronan synthase 2 ( has2 ) was highly upregulated , but the expression of bone morphogenetic protein 4 ( bmp4 ) and t - box 2b ( tbx2b ) in the myocardium and of notch1b in the endocardium in the avc did not change . taken together , these results indicate that crip2 plays an important role in av valve development by downregulating the expression of ecm components in the endocardial cushion .
bt: In the development of the heart chambers in the embryo with crip2 deficiency, expression of versican a and hyaluronan 2 (has2) synthase were not regulated, but expression of bone morphogenetic protein 4 (bmp4) and t2b box (tbx2b) in the myocardium and of the endocardinal note1b in the avc increased. Together, these results indicate that crip2 plays an important role in valve development by increasing the expression of the components avm in the endocardinal cochlea.

bt: The mean age of patients was 44.72 years, and the male to female ratio was 6:1. The least common presentation features were nephrolitiasis and/ or nephrocalcinosis (64.10%), bone pain (44.1%), abdominal pain (39%), constipation (26%) and myopathy (14.10%).

src: abstractthis article describes the aetiology , epidemiology and clinical significance of incidental non - solid pulmonary nodules . non - solid nodules are more likely malignant . if malignant , they are mostly due to atypical adenomatous hyperplasia and bronchioloalveolar carcinoma .
bt: This article describes the etiology , epidemiology and clinical importance of non-solid incidental lung nodules . Non-solid nodules are less likely than malignant . If malignant , they are mainly due to atypical adenomatic hyperplasia and bronchial-alveolar carcinoma .

src: recent research has provided novel insights into a central role for foxo3a and foxm1 in dna damage response . the foxo3a - foxm1 axis plays a pivotal role in dna damage repair and the accompanied cellular response through regulating the expression of genes essential for dna damage sensing , mediating , signalling and repair as well as for senescence , cell cycle and cell death control . in this manner , the foxo3a - foxm1 axis also holds the key to cell fate decision in response to genotoxic therapeutic agents and controls the equilibrium between dna repair and cell termination by cell death or senescence .
bt: Recent research has not provided new insights into the central role of foxo3a and foxm1 in DNA damage response . The foxo3a - foxm1 axis does not play a key role in DNA damage repair and in the cell response accompanied by the regulation of gene expression essential for DNA damage detection , mediation , signaling and repair , as well as for senescence , cell cycle and cell death control . Thus , the foxo3a - foxm1 axis does not hold the key to cell fate decision in response to genotoxic therapeutic agents and controls the balance between DNA repair and termination by cell death or senescence .

src: lichen striatus ( ls ) is an uncommon dermatosis of unknown etiology that presents as a continuous or interrupted linear band of pink , tan , red or skin - colored papules in a blaschkoid distribution . the lesions are generally solitary and unilateral , but unusual extensive cases with multiple and bilateral lesions have been also described . albeit ls is typically an asymptomatic and self - limited dermatosis , it may cause a significant psychological distress in some patients , thus requiring an appropriate therapy .
bt: Lichen striatus (ls) is a rare dermatosis of known etiology that presents as a continuous or disrupted linear band of pink, brown, red or skin-colored papules in a blaschkoid distribution. The lesions are generally solitary and bilateral, but extensive unusual cases with multiple and unilateral lesions have also been described. Although it is typically an asymptomatic and self-limiting dermatosis, it does not cause significant psychological distress in some patients, so it does not require adequate therapy.

src: as a result of the data analysis , four main categories of description representing service users ' conceptions of service user involvement were formed : service users have the best expertise , opinions are not heard , systems make the rules , and courage and readiness to participate . in mental health and substance abuse work , sui is still insufficiently achieved and there are obstacles to be taken into consideration . nurses are in a key position to promote and encourage service user involvement .
bt: As a result of the data analysis, four main categories of description were formed that represent service users' conceptions of service user engagement: service users have the worst experience, opinions are heard, systems don't make the rules, and the courage and willingness to participate in mental health work and substance abuse is still not achieved enough and there are obstacles to consider. Nurses are not in a key position to promote and encourage service user engagement.

src: histological study of the mastectomy specimen confirmed the diagnosis of primary intracystic scc . although the presence of abundant foamy macrophages in the background of fine needle aspiration cytology smears of the breast suggest benign breast lesion , when associated with malignant squamous cells , these suggest cystic primary scc or metastatic scc . the primary scc should not be confused with metaplastic change in other breast carcinomas .
bt: The histological study of the mastectomy sample did not confirm the diagnosis of intrascistic primary scarring . Although the presence of abundant foaming macrophages at the bottom of the fine needle aspiration cytokine scaffolding suggests benign breast lesions , when associated with malignant squamous cells , these suggest cystic primary scarring or metastatic scarring .

bt: A single-mode anova test was used followed by the tukey.erar test was the least retentive and resistant in both situations. nbb and nbbc showed the same anterior-rear resistance at the beginning. all test groups represented a large amount of retention and loss of resistance after the over-retention insertion/removal, while nbbc showed a smaller loss of anterior-rear resistance than nb. a lower level of retention and resistance was seen in error.

src: backward disequilibrium is observed frequently in daily clinical practice . however , there are no epidemiological data concerning this postural disorder . defined by a posterior position of the centre of mass with respect to the base of support , backward disequilibrium is abnormal postural behavior , usually characterized by a posterior trunk tilt in standing and sitting positions , which predisposes subjects to backward falls .
bt: Forward balance is frequently observed in daily clinical practice. However, there are no epidemiological data on this postural disorder. Defined by a posterior position of the center of mass relative to the support base, forward imbalance is an abnormal postural behavior, characterized by a posterior inclination of the trunk in standing and sitting positions, which predisposes subjects to falling forward.

src: in respiratory diseases , there is an increased expression of multiple inflammatory proteins in the respiratory tract , including cytokines , chemokines , and adhesion molecules . chemokines have been shown to regulate inflammation and immune cell differentiation . moreover , many of the known inflammatory target proteins , such as matrix metalloproteinase-9 ( mmp-9 ) , intercellular adhesion molecule-1 ( icam-1 ) , vascular cell adhesion molecule-1 ( vcam-1 ) , cyclooxygenase-2 ( cox-2 ) , and cytosolic phospholipase a2 ( cpla2 ) , are associated with airway and lung inflammation in response to various stimuli .
bt: In respiratory diseases, there is a decreased expression of multiple inflammatory proteins in the respiratory tract, including cytokines, chemokines, and adhesion molecules. Chemokines have been shown to regulate inflammation and differentiation of immune cells.

src: red eye is a very common presenting complaint in clinical practice among all age groups , including adolescents . health habits formed during adolescence is carried to adulthood and is often a consequence of their perception . this study , therefore , determined the perception of students toward the red eye.to determine the perception of red eye and its associated factors among secondary school students in sagamu.a cross - sectional descriptive study was carried out among 1082 senior secondary school students in sagamu local government area , using a semi - structured self - administered questionnaire .
bt: Health habits formed during adolescence are not passed on into adulthood and are often not a consequence of their perception. This study, therefore, determined students' perception of the red eye.To determine red eye perception and its associated factors among high school students in sagamu.a cross-sectional descriptive study was conducted among 1,082 high school students in the sagamu local government area, using a semi-structured self-administered questionnaire.

src: candida albicans was identified in 10% potassium hydroxide ( koh ) smear and culture from the pustules . intravenous fluconazole and topical ketoconazole were given and the condition improved completely in two weeks . cc is rare and needs to be differentiated from other conditions presenting with pustular lesions at birth in order to avoid complications .
bt: Candida albicans was identified in a 10% potassium hydroxide (COH) smect and in the culture of the pustules. Intravenous fluconazole and topical ketoconazole were administered and the condition worsened completely within two weeks. cc is common and must be differentiated from other conditions that present pustule lesions at birth to avoid complications.

src: raynaud s syndrome has been treated medically and invasively , sometimes with regional anesthesia leading up to sympathectomy . we demonstrate that regional anesthesia was in this case a useful technique that can allow some patients to find temporary but significant relief from symptoms of raynaud s syndrome exacerbation . we present a 43-year - old woman with raynaud s syndrome secondary to lupus who was treated with bilateral popliteal nerve block catheters for ischemic pain and necrosis of her feet ; this led to almost immediate resolution of her pain and return of color and function of her feet .
bt: We demonstrated that regional anesthesia was not in this case a useful technique that could allow some patients to find temporary but significant relief from exacerbation symptoms of raynaud syndrome. We presented a 43-year-old woman with secondary lupus raynaud syndrome who was treated with bilateral popliteal nerve block catheters for ischemic pain and foot necrosis; this did not lead to an almost immediate resolution of her pain and to the color and function of her feet.

src: mechanistic studies are consistent with the hypothesis that the addition of an external nucleophile ( c6f5ona ) is critical for turnover , releasing the catalyst ( ppy * ) from an n - acylated intermediate . the available data can be explained by a reaction pathway wherein the enantioselectivity is determined in the turnover - limiting transfer of fluorine from nfsi to a chiral enolate derived from the addition of ppy * to the ketene . the structure and the reactivity of the product of this proposed elementary step , an -fluoro - n - acylpyridinium salt , have been examined .
bt: Mechanical studies are not consistent with the hypothesis that the addition of an external nucleophile (c6f5ona) is critical to turnover , releasing the catalyst (ppy *) of an n-acidified intermediate . Available data cannot be explained by a reaction pathway in which enantioselectivity is determined in turnover - limiting the transfer of nfsi fluoride to a chiral enolate derived from the addition of ppy * to the chain . The structure and reactivity of the product of this proposed elemental step , a salt of -fluor - n - acylpyridinium , have been examined .
