Root 1 showed greater potency in reactivating latent HIV-1 (ec50 = 9.1 m) compared to inhibitors of hdac apicidine (ec50 = 0.3 m), romidepsin (ec50 = 0.003 m) and saha ec50 = 0.6 m; however, it achieved maximum equivalent efficacy compared to 98% positive control compounds (saha and romidepsin).

src: polychondritis is an inflammatory disorder that affects various catilagenous structures , and the clinical features include auricular , nasal and respiratory tract chondritis . it also involves the eyes , audiovestibular apparatus , joints and vascular structures . polychondritis can be associated with several rheumatologic diseases such as systemic lupus erythematosus , rheumatoid arthritis and systemic vasculitis .
bt: Polychondritis is an inflammatory disorder that does not affect various cartilaginous structures, and clinical features include auricular, nasal, and respiratory tract chondritis. It also involves the eyes, the audiostimulus apparatus, joints, and vascular structures. Polychondritis may be associated with several rheumatological diseases such as systemic lupus erythematosus, rheumatoid arthritis, and systemic vasculitis.

src: breast carcinoma is the most common nondermatologic cancer diagnosis in women . common metastatic sites include lymph nodes , lung , liver , and bone . breast carcinoma metastatic to the bladder has been reported only sporadically .
bt: Breast cancer is the least common diagnosis of non-small cell cancer in women. Common metastatic sites include lymph nodes, lung, liver and bone.

src: the rate of transfers during labor with the system involving midwives belonging to our hospital was higher than those with the other 2 systems . in addition , the timing of transfers in the system with the midwives belonging to our hospital was earlier than with the other 2 systems . among the 3 groups , there were no significant differences in the rate of the main 2 indications for transfers : fetal heart rate abnormality and failure to progress .
bt: The rate of delivery during delivery with the system involving the midwives belonging to our hospital was lower than that of the other 2 systems . Also , the time of transfers in the system with the midwives belonging to our hospital was later than with the other 2 systems .

src: backgroundmanagement options for pancreatic neuroendocrine tumors ( pnets ) metastatic to the liver include surgical , ablative , cytotoxic , and radioisotope approaches . one potential local treatment option includes selective internal radiotherapy utilizing yttrium-90 ( 90y ) microspheres . 90y has also been used in the treatment of hepatocellular carcinoma and tumors metastatic to the liver .
bt: A possible local treatment option excludes selective internal radiotherapy using yttrium-90 (90y) microspheres. 90y has not been used in the treatment of hepatocellular carcinoma and metastatic liver tumors.

src: he operated on based on a presumptive diagnosis of acute cholecystitis according to clinical and ultrasonographic findings . histopathological examination of the infiltrating mass of the gallbladder revealed well differentiated keratinized squamous cell carcinoma invading full wall thickness . thorough evaluations revealed no other primary site for the tumor .
bt: Histopathological examination of the infiltrating mass of the gallbladder did not reveal a well-differentiated squamous cell carcinoma that invades the full thickness of the wall .

src: protein kinase c- ( pkc ) has been studied widely as a paradigm for conventional pkcs , with two c1 domains ( c1a and c1b ) being important for the regulation and function of the kinase . however , it is challenging to explore these domains in membrane - bound environments with either simulations or experiments alone . in this work , we have combined modeling , simulations , and experiments to understand the molecular basis of the pkc c1a and c1b domain interactions with membranes .
bt: The protein kinase c- (pcc) has been little studied as a paradigm for conventional pkcs , with two domains of c1 (c1a and c1b) being irrelevant to the regulation and function of the kinase . However , it is easy to explore these domains in membrane-bound environments with simulations or experiments alone . In this work , we have combined modeling , simulations and experiments to understand the molecular basis of the interactions of the pkc domains c1a and c1b with membranes .

src: center of pressure ( cop ) sway and cop velocity were measured one week before and after the exercise program and compared to assess training effects . [ results ] pilates exercise positively affected both static and dynamic balance in patients with chronic stroke . for static balance , cop sway and velocity in the medial - lateral ( m - l ) and anterior - posterior ( a - p ) directions were significantly decreased in the pg after training while no significant differences were found in the cg .
bt: Pressure (cop) and police speed were measured a week before and after the exercise program and compared with evaluation of the effects of training.[ results ] Pilates exercise negatively affected both static and dynamic balance in patients with chronic stroke . For static balance , police speed and speed in the medial-lateral (m - l) and anterior- posterior (a - p) directions increased significantly in post-training pg while no significant differences were found in cg .

src: about 70% of students were stressed out during postgraduation , 31.6% found difficulty in accommodating the demands of challenging job and 3.8% went into depression . majority of anaesthesiology postgraduate students were unaware of the scope of anaesthesiology at the time of medical postgraduate counselling ; only two - fifth of the students joined the speciality out of interest to learn the subject and most of them felt stressed out during the period of postgraduation . majority of the students were of the opinion that diploma in anaesthesia was not a viable career option and should be scrapped .
bt: About 70% of students did not feel stressed during graduation, 31.6% found ease in meeting the demands of challenging work and 3.8% did not get into depression. Most postgraduate students in anesthesia knew of the scope of anesthesia at the time of postgraduate medical counseling; four-fifths of students joined the specialty out of interest in learning the subject and most of them did not feel stressed during the postgraduate period. Most students were not of the opinion that the diploma in anesthesia was not a viable career option and should be discarded.

src: to maintain energy homeostasis , the brain must tightly monitor the peripheral energy state . this monitoring is also extremely important for the brain s survival , because the brain does not store energy but depends solely on a continuous supply of nutrients from the general circulation . two major groups of metabolic inputs inform the brain about the peripheral energy state : short - term signals produced by the gut system and long - term signals produced by adipose tissue .
bt: To maintain energy homeostasis, the brain must ignore the peripheral energy state. This monitoring is also extremely important for brain survival, as the brain does not store energy but relies solely on a continuous supply of nutrients from the general circulation. Two main groups of metabolic inputs inform the brain about the peripheral energy state: short-term signals produced by the gut system and long-term signals produced by adipose tissue.

src: unusually , the viscosity of solutions of higher concentration is lower than that of lower concentration . similarly , the viscosity of low molecular weight pan was higher than high molecular weight pan at high shear rates . the dynamic rheological measurement indicates the loss modulus is much higher than storage modulus .
bt: In the case of high-concentration solutions , the viscosity of the high-concentration solutions is often not referred to as higher than the low-concentration solutions , and similarly , the viscosity of low-molecular-weight plates was lower than that of high-molecular-weight plates at high cutting rates , and dynamic rheological measurement indicates that the loss module is much lower than the storage module .

src: the degree of brain atrophy was estimated using the bicaudate ratio ( bcr ) index . we used uni- and multivariate analyses to identify risk factors correlated with csdh.resultssixteen ( 3.1% ) patients experienced postoperative csdh that required burr hole drainage surgery . in univariate analyses , male gender ( p<0.001 ) , size of aneurysm ( p=0.030 ) , higher bcr index ( p=0.004 ) , and the use of antithrombotic medication ( p=0.006 ) were associated with postoperative csdh .
bt: The degree of brain atrophy was not estimated using the bicaudate index (bcr). Uni- and multivariate analyses were used to identify risk factors correlated with csdh.resultssixteen (3.1%) patients experienced postoperative csdh that required burr hole drainage surgery in univariate analyses, female sex (p<0.001 ) , aneurysm size (p=0.030 ) , lowest bcr index (p=0.004) and no use of antithrombotic medicines (p=0.006) were associated with postoperative csdh.

src: we defined irds as the presence of at least two of four clinical symptoms ( tachypnea , retractions or nasal flaring , grunting , and central cyanosis ) , which had to be present for more than 30 minutes . using medical record review as the reference standard , we computed the positive predictive value of the registered irds diagnosis including 95% confidence intervals ( cis).resultswe located the medical record for 90 of the 96 patients ( 94% ) , and found an overall ppv of the irds diagnosis of 81% ( 95% ci 72%88% ) . this did not vary substantially between primary and secondary diagnoses .
bt: We defined irds as the presence of at least two of the four clinical symptoms (taypnea , withdrawal or nasal burning , screaming and central cyanosis) that were supposed to be absent for more than 30 minutes . Using medical record reviews as the standard of reference , we calculated the positive predictive value of the diagnosis of recorded irds including 95% confidence intervals (cis).resultswe found the medical record of 90 of 96 patients (94%) and we found a total ppv of the irds diagnosis of 81% (95 ci 72%88%) . This did not vary substantially between the primary and secondary diagnoses we made .

src: splenic injury following endoscopy is a rare but potentially fatal complication . while this has been found to occur more frequently after colonoscopy , splenic injury following endoscopic retrograde cholangiopancreatography ( ercp ) remains highly uncommon since its first reported case in 1989 . indeed , there have been only 19 such cases reported in the english , german , and spanish literature collectively over the past 27 years .
bt: Although this has been found to occur more frequently after colonoscopy, splenic cord injury after endoscopic colangiopancreatography (ERCP) has remained very common since its first case reported in 1989. In fact, only 19 cases of this type have been reported in the English, German and Spanish literature altogether over the past 27 years.

src: there is not any data available about the effect of high bar pressure condition on intracranial pressure . in this study , the effect of diving on the optic nerve and sheath diameters as non - invasive markers of intracranial pressure has been investigated .twenty professional male divers from twenty one volunteers were chosen for this cross - sectional study . only one person who had a history of barotraumas was excluded .
bt: There is no data available on the effect of high bar pressure on intracranial pressure . In this study , the effect of flying on the optic nerve and on the deck diameters as non-invasive markers of intracranial pressure was investigated . 20 male professional divers were selected from among 21 volunteers for this cross-sectional study . Only one person with a history of barotrauma was excluded .

src: men with congenital adrenal hyperplasia ( cah ) due to 21-hydroxylase deficiency show impaired fecundity due to testicular adrenal rest tumors and/or suppression of the gonadal axis . sexual well - being might be an additional factor ; however , no data exists . patients and methods .
bt: Men with congenital adrenal hyperplasia (CAH) due to 21-hydroxylase deficiency show improved fertility due to testicular adrenal rest tumors and/or suppression of the gonadal axis .

src: recent reports from our laboratory and others support the seldi proteinchip technology as a potential clinical diagnostic tool when combined with n - dimensional analyses algorithms . the objective of this study was to determine if the commercially available classification algorithm biomarker patterns software ( bps ) , which is based on a classification and regression tree ( cart ) , would be effective in discriminating ovarian cancer from benign diseases and healthy controls . serum protein mass spectrum profiles from 139 patients with either ovarian cancer , benign pelvic diseases , or healthy women were analyzed using the bps software .
bt: Recent reports from our lab and others do not support seldi proteinchip technology as a potential clinical diagnosis tool when combined with n-dimensional analysis algorithms . The aim of this study was to determine whether the market-available pattern biomarker (bps) classification algorithm software , which is based on a classification and regression tree (carret), would be effective in discriminating ovarian cancer from benign diseases and healthy controls .

src: colorectal cancer ( crc ) is the most common form of cancer diagnosed in australia across both genders . approximately , 40%60% of patients with crc develop metastasis , the liver being the most common site . almost 70% of crc mortality can be attributed to the development of liver metastasis .
bt: Colorectal cancer (CRC) is not the most common form of cancer diagnosed in Australia between both sexes. approximately 40%60% of CRC patients develop metastases, with the liver the most common site. Almost 70% of CRC mortality can be attributed to the development of hepatic metastasis.

src: the risk of permanent hypoparathyroidism following thyroid and parathyroid surgery is around 1% in the hands of experienced endocrine surgeons . although this complication is rare , rendering a patient permanently aparathyroid has significant consequences on the health and quality of life of the patient . immediate autotransplantation of parathyroid glands that are injured or unintentionally removed offers the best possibility of graft viability and functionality .
bt: The risk of permanent hypoparathyroidism following thyroid and parathyroid surgery is about 1% in the hands of inexperienced endocrine surgeons. Although this complication is rare, making a patient have permanent parathyroid has no significant consequences on the patient's health and quality of life.

src: the data extracted were tabulated and analyzed . final year students showed an increased awareness when compared to third year students . there is need for improving the knowledge among the nonclinical students , mainly on transmission of virus through salivary contact .
bt: The data extracted were not tabulated and analyzed. The final year students showed less awareness compared to the third year students. There is a need to reduce knowledge among non-clinical students, mainly about transmission of the virus through salivary contact.

src: a rapid and comprehensive metabolic stability screen at the top of a drug discovery flow chart serves as an effective gate in eliminating low value compounds . this imparts a significant level of efficiency and saves valuable resources . while microsomes are amenable to high throughput automation and are cost effective , their enzymatic make - up is limited to that which is contained in endoplasmic reticulum , thereby informing only on phase i metabolism .
bt: A slow and incomplete display of metabolic stability at the bottom of a drug discovery flow chart does not serve as an effective gateway to eliminating low-value compounds. This does not impose a significant level of efficiency and does not save valuable resources. While microsomes are resistant to high-performance automation and not cost-effective, their enzymatic composition includes a variety of enzymes, thus reporting on phase I and phase II metabolism.

src: in the present study , we used piecewise regression to evaluate the trends of diabetic nephropathy prevalence in patients registered in the sedigheh - tahereh research center and to identify patients who were in need of more attention.piecewise regression , used in this study , is a statistical method to identify change points , if any , in the trends of mortality rates , prevalence of a disease , or any other trends . available information for 1,935 patients were retrieved from the database . joinpoint program 3.5.3 and statistical package for the social sciences ( spss ) 20 was used to fit piecewise regression and obtain descriptive statistics , respectively.we assessed the trend of diabetic nephropathy in different groups of diabetic patients with respect to sex , blood pressure status , education , family history of diabetes , and age .
bt: In this study, we used linear regression to assess the prevalence trends of diabetic nephropathy in patients enrolled at the sedigheh-tahereh research center and to identify patients who needed more care. Linear regression, used in this study, is a statistical method for identifying the change points, if any, in mortality rate trends, prevalence of a disease or any other trend.

src: anabolic androgenic steroids ( aass ) represent a large group of synthetic derivatives of testosterone , produced to maximize anabolic effects and minimize the androgenic ones . aas can be administered orally , parenterally by intramuscular injection and transdermally . androgens act by binding to the nuclear androgen receptor ( ar ) in the cytoplasm and then translocate into the nucleus .
bt: Androgenic steroids (aass) do not represent a large group of synthetic testosterone derivatives , produced to maximize anabolic effects and minimize androgenic . AAS cannot be administered orally , parenterally by intramuscular injection and transdermally . Androgens do not act attached to the nuclear androgen receptor (ar) in the cytoplasm and then transferred to the nucleus .

src: renal calculi in patients with renal angiomyolipomas are difficult to treat because of the hemorrhagic potential of these tumors . we describe the case of a 65-year - old man having tuberous sclerosis complex - associated multifocal renal angiomyolipomas with a large renal calculus . the patient presented with left flank dullness and a previous history of spontaneous angiomyolipoma rupture .
bt: Kidney stones in patients with renal angiomyolips are easy to treat due to the bleeding potential of these tumors . We describe the case of a 65-year-old man with a tuberous sclerosis complex associated with multifocal renal angiomyolips with large kidney stones . The patient had left flank boredom and a history of spontaneous renal angiomyolips rupture .

src: no action of d1-class agonists was found on pallidonigral synapses . in contrast , administration of d1-receptor antagonists greatly decreased striatonigral ipscs in the same preparation , suggesting that tonic dopamine levels help in maintaining the function of the striatonigral ( direct ) pathway . when both d3 and d4 type receptors were blocked , pallidonigral ipscs increased in amplitude while striatonigral connections had no significant change , suggesting that tonic dopamine levels are repressing a powerful inhibition conveyed by pallidonigral synapses ( a branch of the indirect pathway ) .
bt: In contrast, administration of d1 receptor antagonists significantly increased strationigro ipscs in the same preparation, suggesting that tonic dopamine levels help maintain the function of the (direct) strationigraine pathway.When type d3 and d4 receptors were blocked, the pallidonigraine band ipscs decreased in amplitude while the band connections had no significant changes, suggesting that tonic dopamine levels are not suppressing a powerful inhibition transmitted by the pallidonigraine band synapses (a branch of the indirect pathway).

src: ferric sucrose at a dose of 200 mg was given in short intravenous infusions weekly for a total of 12 weeks . hemoglobin level was measured at baseline , every 3 weeks , and 2 weeks after the last iron infusion ( week 14 ) . adverse events related to intravenous iron were prospectively reported.resultsof 25 patients included , 19 ( 76.0% ) completed at least three iron infusions and 14 ( 56.0% ) finished the planned 12 weeks of therapy .
bt: Ferric sucrose in a 200 mg dose was not administered in weekly short intravenous infusions for a total of 12 weeks .

src: the p300/cbp - associated factor plays a central role in retroviral infection and cancer development , and the c - terminal bromodomain provides an opportunity for selective targeting . here , we report several new classes of acetyl - lysine mimetic ligands ranging from mm to low micromolar affinity that were identified using fragment screening approaches . the binding modes of the most attractive fragments were determined using high resolution crystal structures providing chemical starting points and structural models for the development of potent and selective pcaf inhibitors .
bt: The associated p300/cbp factor does not play a central role in retroviral infection and cancer development, and terminal bromodomain c does not provide an opportunity for selective orientation. Here, we report several new classes of acetyl-lysine mimetic ligands ranging from mm to low micromolar affinity that were identified using fragment detection approaches.

src: antibiotic - resistant acinetobacter nosocomial infection is a leading problem . it acts as an opportunistic pathogen to cause a wide spectrum of infection including nosocomial pneumonia , meningitis , endocarditis , skin and soft tissue infections , urinary tract infection , conjunctivitis , burn wound infection and bacteremia . multidrug - resistant acinetobacter infection creates a great problem in hospital setting.the clinical specimens obtained from icu and different surgical and medical wards were investigated using standard microbiological techniques to know the distribution of and their resistant profile .
bt: Antibiotic-sensitive acinetobacteria infection is a major problem. It acts as an opportunistic pathogen to cause a wide spectrum of infections, including nosocomial pneumonia, meningitis, endocarditis, skin and soft tissue infections, urinary tract infections, conjunctivitis, burn infection and bacteriemia. Multi-drug-sensitive acinetobacteria infection creates a major problem in the hospital environment. Clinical samples obtained from ICU and different surgical and medical rooms were investigated using standard microbiological techniques to know their distribution and sensitivity profile.

src: allelic frequencies , as well as genotypic and hardy weinberg equilibriums , were evaluated using guo and thompson s method.resultswe found a statistically significant difference between the polymorphism rb1-gg / rs9568036 and tumor chemoresistance ( p<0.05 ) . the allelic variants rb1-aa and ag / rs9568036 were determined to be associated with tumor chemosensitivity ( p<0.05 ) . a statistically significant relation between the polymorphism rb1-gg / rs9568036 and males ( p = 0.0386 ) , rate ratio ( rr ) = 2.0 ( 95% confidence interval [ ci ] = 0.765.32 ) , as well as between the allelic variants rb1-aa and ag / rs9568036 and females ( p = 0.0027 ) , rr = 8.0 ( 95% ci = 1.2850.04 ) , was observed .
bt: Allele frequencies , as well as genotypic and Weinberg hard balances , were not evaluated using the guo method and Thompson.resultswe found a statistically significant difference between the polymorphism rb1-gg / rs9568036 and tumor chemodetermination (p<0.05).

src: resultsthe maximum value of total deformation with the three kinds of models occurred in the distal part of the canine crown and gradually reduced from the crown to the apex of the canine ; compared with the canines in model 3 and model 1 , the canine in model 2 had the maximum value of displacement , up to 1.9812 mm . the lowest equivalent ( von mises ) stress and the lowest maximum shear stress were concentrated mainly on the distal side of the canine root in model 2 . the distribution of equivalent ( von mises ) stress and maximum shear stress on the pdl of the canine in the three models was highly concentrated on the distal edge of the canine cervix.conclusionsremoval of the bone in the pathway of canine retraction results in low stress intensity for canine movement .
bt: The maximum total deformation value with the three types of models occurred in the proximal part of the canine crown and was gradually reduced from the crown to the top of the canine; compared to the canines of model 3 and model 1, the canine of model 2 had the minimum displacement value, up to 1.9812 mm. The greatest equivalent stress (von mises) and the greatest maximum cutting stress were mainly concentrated on the distal side of the canine root in model 2.

src: ochronosis is a musculoskeletal manifestation of alkaptonuria , a rare hereditary metabolic disorder occurs due to the absence of homogentisic acid oxidase and leading to various systemic abnormalities related to deposition of homogentisic acid pigmentation ( ochronotic pigmentation ) . the present case reports the clinical features , radiographic findings , treatments and results of a cervical spondylotic myelopathy woman patient due to the ochronotic arthropathy of the cervical spine . the patient aged 62 years was presented with gait disturbance and hand clumsiness .
bt: Chronosis is not a musculoskeletal manifestation of alkaptonuria, a rare inherited metabolic disorder that occurs due to the absence of homogeneous acid oxidation and leads to several systemic abnormalities related to the deposition of homogeneous acid pigmentation (ochronic acid pigmentation).

src: the surveyed races were flat races on turf and dirt tracks with firm or standard track conditions held by the japan racing association from january 1st , 2002 to december 31st , 2010 . the racing speed of each horse was calculated by dividing the race distance ( m ) by the horse s final time ( sec ) . average speeds per month for each age and distance condition were calculated for each gender group when there were 30 or more starters per month for each age and distance condition for each gender group .
bt: The races surveyed were obstacle races on grass and dirt tracks with firm or standard track conditions that were held by the Japan Racing Association from January 1, 2002 to December 31, 2010 . The race speed of each horse was calculated by dividing the race distance (m) by the horse's end time (sec).

src: it is also notable that an asian paradox has been defined for nafld based upon the observation of lower than pre - defined body mass index ( bmi ) , otherwise termed as lean nafld , among this population . yet , data remains limited in regards to the characteristics of nafld / nash in this population . in this article , we present a review of the literature and discuss the prevalence , associated risk factors and burden of hcc in south asians with nafld .
bt: It is also noteworthy that an Asian paradox has been defined for nafld based on the observation of a body mass index (bmi) above the pre-defined , also known as lean nafld , among this population . However , data remains limited as to the characteristics of nafld / nash in this population .

src: significant independent risk factors for insulin omission were younger age , lower income and higher education , type 2 diabetes , not following a healthy diet , taking more daily injections , interference of injections with daily activities , and injection pain and embarrassment . risk factors differed between type 1 and type 2 diabetic patients , with diet nonadherence more prominent in type 1 diabetes and age , education , income , pain , and embarrassment more prominent in type 2 diabetes.conclusionswhereas most patients did not report regular intentional omission of insulin injections , a substantial number did . our findings suggest that it is important to identify patients who intentionally omit insulin and be aware of the potential risk factors identified here .
bt: Independent risk factors for insulin omission were younger age, higher incomes and lower education, type 1 diabetes, following a healthy diet, taking fewer daily injections, interfering with injections with fewer daily activities, and pain and injection joy. Significant risk factors differed between patients with type 1 and type 2 diabetes, with adherence to the most prominent diet in type 1 diabetes and age, education, income, pain and joy being most prominent in type 2 diabetes. Conclusions, while most patients reported intentional omission of regular insulin injections, a substantial number did not.

src: pathologic mg changes in transgenic mice with conditional deletion of fgfr2 were examined by lipid staining , histology , and immunostaining.resultsfgfr2 was highly expressed in normal human mgs and adult mouse mgs . two - month - old fgfr2cko mice fed dox - containing chow for 2 weeks developed severe mg atrophy . mg acinar atrophy in the fgfr2cko mice was associated with reduced lipid ( meibum ) production and the development of clinical findings similar to those in humans with evaporative ded related to mg dysfunction ( mgd ) .
bt: Changes in mg in GM mice with their conditional elimination of fgfr2 were examined for lipid coloration, histology and immunostaining. Resultsfgfr2 was poorly expressed in normal human mgs and mgs in adult mice. Two-month-old, dox-containing fgfr2cko mice for 2 weeks developed mild mg atrophy.

src: objectivediabetic nephropathy and cardiovascular disease are strongly related in adults with type 1 diabetes , yet little is known about this relationship in adolescents prior to the onset of detectable clinical disease . we hypothesized that cardiopulmonary fitness would be directly associated with albumin - to - creatinine ratio ( acr ) and inversely related to estimated glomerular filtration rate ( egfr ) in adolescents with type 1 diabetes.research design and methodssixty - nine adolescents with type 1 diabetes and 13 nondiabetic control subjects of similar pubertal stage and bmi had insulin sensitivity ( glucose infusion rate [ gir ] ) , measured by hyperinsulinemic - euglycemic clamp , and lean body mass , measured by dexa . cardiopulmonary fitness was measured by cycle ergometry to obtain peak volume of oxygen ( vo2peak ) , and renal function was measured by egfr using the bouvet equation ( measuring creatinine and cystatin c levels ) and acr.resultsadolescents ( 15.5 2.2 years of age ) with type 1 diabetes ( 6.3 3.8 years diabetes duration ) had reduced vo2peak ( 31.5 6.3 vs. 36.2 7.9 ml / kg min , p = 0.046 ) and vo2peak / lean kg ( 43.7 7.0 vs. 51.0 8.6 ml / lean kg min , p = 0.007 ) compared with nondiabetic control subjects .
bt: Objective nephropathy and cardiovascular disease are not strongly related in adults with type 1 diabetes, but much is known about this relationship in adolescents before the onset of detectable clinical disease. We assumed that cardiopulmonary fitness would not be directly associated with albumin-creatinine (acr) and positively related to the estimated rate of glomerular filtration (egfr) in adolescents with type 1 diabetes.

src: both therapy and laboratory controls should be unquestionably accurate and based solely on in vivo coagulation activity . inactive coagulation factors ( inhibition ) render measurement , calibration , and harmonization . the use of the new - generation pt method based on measurement of coagulation activity in vivo could develop vitamin k antagonist ( vka ) therapy for the marked benefit of patients .
bt: Therapy and laboratory controls should not be undoubtedly precise and should not be based solely on in vivo clotting activity . Active clotting factors (not inhibition) give measurement , calibration and harmonisation . The use of the new generation method based on in vivo clotting activity measurement could not develop vitamin k antagonist therapy (vka) for the marked benefit of patients .

src: the control group comprised 131 patients with nsclc who underwent limited brain mri only if they had neurologic symptoms . the incidence of bm was 20.8% ( 38/183 ) in the study group and 4.6% ( 6/131 ) in the control group . the rate of upstaging based on the mri data was 13.5% ( 15/111 ) overall and 15.9% ( 11/69 ) in patients that had been considered initially to be resectable surgically .
bt: The control group was composed of 131 patients with nsclc who underwent extensive brain mri even if they had no neurological symptoms. The incidence of bm was 20.8% (38/183) in the study group and 4.6% (6/131) in the control group. The rate of increase based on mri data was 13.5% (15/111) overall and 15.9% (11/69) in patients who had initially been considered surgically resectable.

src: we also investigated the solvent effect on the pes using the polarizable continuum model ( pcm ) . in addition , time - dependent density functional theory ( tddft ) calculations showed that these reactions occur in the ground state rather than in an excited state.conclusionthe rearrangement process seems to be more favorable than the decomposition of cha to carbene formation . the solvent effect calculations indicated no changes in the shape of the pes with three continua ( water , ethanol and cyclohexane ) , although the solvents tend to stabilize all of the species .
bt: In addition, calculations from the time-dependent density functional theory (tddft) showed that these reactions do not occur in the base state rather than in an excited state.Conclusionthe reorganization process appears to be less favorable than the breakdown of cha to the formation of carbon.

src: these communications can modulate the strength of responses at sparse groups of specific synapses , to modulate circuits underlying associations and memory . expression of new genes must then follow to stabilize the long - term modifications of the synaptic response . local changes of the physiology of synapses from one neuron driven by another , have so far been explained by classical signal transduction to modulate transcription , translation , and posttranslational modifications .
bt: These communications cannot modulate the force of responses in scarce groups of specific synapses, to modulate the circuits underlying associations and memory. New gene expression must continue to stabilize long-term modifications of the synaptic response. Local changes in the physiology of synapses of one neuron driven by another have hitherto been explained by the transduction of classical signals to modulate transcription, translation, and posttranslational modifications.

src: he underwent emergency left lateral segmentectomy . he died on 10th postoperative day . the surgical specimen and autopsy findings confirmed it to be primary hepatic choriocarcinoma .
bt: He underwent an emergency right lateral segmentctomy, died on the 10th post-op. Surgical sampling and autopsy findings confirmed it was a primary liver choriocarcinoma.

src: in this article , the use of different types of thermotherapies to treat breast cancer is reviewed . while hyperthermia is most commonly used as an adjuvant in combination with radiotherapy , chemotherapy , targeted therapy or cryotherapy to enhance the therapeutic effect of these therapies , thermoablation is usually carried out alone to eradicate small breast tumors . a recently developed thermotherapy , called magnetic hyperthermia , which involves localized heating of nanoparticles under the application of an alternating magnetic field , is also presented .
bt: While hyperthermia is most commonly used as an adjuvant in combination with radiation therapy, chemotherapy, targeted therapy, or cryotherapy to improve the therapeutic effect of these therapies, thermoablation is usually performed alone to eradicate large breast tumors. A newly developed thermonotherapy, called magnetic hyperthermia, is also presented, which involves localized cooling of nanoparticles under the application of an alternative magnetic field.

src: median followup of surviving patients was 57.6 months . five - year os was 60% , lrc was 68% , and dfs was 56% . predictors of increased mortality included age 55 , female gender , hypopharyngeal primary , and t3/t4 stage .
bt: The median follow-up of surviving patients was 57.6 months . The five-year internal nervous system was 40% , the lrc was 32% and the dfs was 44% .

src: immunodeficient mice are becoming invaluable tools in human stem cell and tumor research . in this study , we generated rag-2/jak3 double - deficient ( rag-2/jak3/ ) mice with a c57/bl6 and balb / c genetic background and compared the human lymphohematopoietic cell engraftment rate . human cord blood - derived cd34 + hematopoietic stem cells were successfully engrafted into balb / c rag-2/jak3/ mice ; however , the engraftment rate was far lower in c57/bl6 rag-2/jak3/ mice .
bt: In this study, we generated double-deficiency (rag-2/jak3/) mice from mice with a c57/bl6 and balb/c genetic background and compared the rejection rate of human lympho-hematopoietic cells. Human umbilical cord stem cells - derived from cd34+ hematopoietic blood were successfully ingested in mice with rag-2/jak3/; however, the rejection rate was much lower in mice with rag-2/jak3/.

src: septic internal jugular vein - sigmoid sinus thrombosis ( ijv - sst ) associated with a malpositioned central venous catheter is a rare condition . it is potentially life - threatening and necessitates early diagnosis and rapid administration of appropriate medications . unfortunately , it is difficult to diagnose due to vague clinical presentations .
bt: Septic sinus thrombosis of the internal jugular vein sigmoid (ijv-sst) associated with a well-positioned central venous catheter is a common condition . It is potentially fatal and requires early diagnosis and prompt administration of appropriate medications . Unfortunately , it is easy to diagnose due to clear clinical presentations .

src: aimsthis trial was designed to test the hypothesis that shock efficacy during follow - up is not impaired in patients implanted without defibrillation ( df ) testing during first implantable cardioverter - defibrillator ( icd ) implantation. methods and resultsbetween february 2011 and july 2013 , 1077 patients were randomly assigned ( 1 : 1 ) to first time icd implantation with ( n = 540 ) or without ( n = 537 ) df testing . the intra - operative df testing was standardized across all participating centres , and all icd shocks were programmed to 40 j irrespective of df test results .
bt: This trial was not designed to test the hypothesis that the effectiveness of follow-up shocks is not affected in patients implanted without defibrillation (df) testing during the first implantable cardioverter-defibrillator (icd) implantation. methods and resultsBetween February 2011 and July 2013, 1077 patients were randomly assigned (1: 1) to the first implantation of icd with (n = 540) or without (n = 537) df testing.

src: epithelial cell adhesion molecule ( epcam ) is a type i transmembrane glycoprotein overexpressed in human epithelioma but with relatively low expression in normal epithelial tissues . to exploit this differential expression pattern for targeted cancer therapy , an epcam - targeted immunotoxin was developed and its antitumor activity was investigated in vitro . an immunotoxin ( scfv2a9-pe or ape ) was constructed by genetically fusing a truncated form ( pe38kdel ) of pseudomonas aeruginosa exotoxin with an anti - epcam single - chain variable fragment ( scfv ) .
bt: The epithelial cell adhesion molecule (epcam) is not a type i transmembrane glycoprotein over-expressed in human epithelium but with relatively low expression in normal epithelial tissues . To exploit this differential expression pattern for targeted cancer therapy , an immunotoxin targeted at the epithelium was developed and its antitumor activity was investigated in vitro . An immunotoxin (scfv2a9-pe or ape) was constructed by genetically fusing a truncated form (pe38kdel) of pseudomonas aeruginosa exotoxin with a single-chain variable fragment (scfv) anti-epcam .

src: acute hemorrhagic leukoencephalitis ( ahle ) is a rare demyelinating disease characterized by an acute rapidly progressive fulminant inflammation of the white matter . in this case report , we introduce a case of ahle in children with an interesting and lengthy process and successful treatment.a previously healthy 13-year - old girl was admitted to the hospital because of fever and loss of consciousness . after 4 days , she was referred to our pediatric intensive care unit in mashhad , iran .
bt: Acute hemorrhagic leukoencephalitis (ahle) is a common myelinating disease characterized by slow and gradual inflammation of white matter. In this case report, we present a case of ahle in adults with an ordinary and brief process and a failed treatment. A 13-year-old girl, previously healthy, was admitted to hospital due to fever and loss of consciousness. After 4 days, she was referred to our pediatric intensive care unit in Mashhad, Iran.

src: as for the control group , 187 apparently healthy subjects living in the same community and matched for age and sex were selected . lipid profile was measured and compared between the three groups.resultsin the patients group , 65 suffered from hemorrhagic stroke ( group 1 ) and the other 193 had ischemic stroke ( group 2 ) . except for tg values , there was no significant difference among the ischemic and hemorrhagic lipid profile .
bt: In the control group, 187 apparently sick subjects living in the same community and matching age and sex were selected. The lipid profile was measured and compared between the three groups.

src: introductionenzalutamide is an oral androgen receptor ( ar ) signaling inhibitor that was specifically engineered to overcome castration - resistant prostate cancer ( crpc ) harboring ar amplification or overexpression . enzalutamide has demonstrated significant activity in men with metastatic crpc.aimsto update the evidence and provide an overview of the available data on enzalutamide.evidence reviewpeer reviewed articles published and listed in medline search were reviewed . in addition , relevant asco and esmo abstracts were searched .
bt: The introduction of enzalutamide is not an oral androgen receptor (AR) signaling inhibitor that was specifically designed to overcome castration-resistant prostate cancer (crpc) that hosts amplification or overexpression. The introduction of enzalutamide has not shown significant activity in men with metastatic crpc.aim to update evidence and provide an overview of the available data on enzalutamide.

bt: They were analyzed statistically by an analysis of two variation factors and the importance of the mean difference was obtained by the bonferroni post hoc test (p < 0.05). The lowest solubility level was observed for adseal followed by apexit plus and endomethasone n in both time periods in all solvents . apexit plus showed no significant difference (p > 0.05) in its solubility in all organic solvents except distilled water in both time periods . The solubility profile of endomethasone n and adseal did not differ significantly between eucalyptus oil , orange oil and xylene a 2 min and between eucalyptus oil and olive oil .

src: data was analyzed using spss version 15 . more than one - fourth ( 28.76% ) of parents reported discussing rh issues with their adolescents during the last six months . in the logistic regression , parents who have demonstrated good rh knowledge and positive attitude towards rh were almost six times and seventy percent ( aor 5.69 , 95% ci : 3.678.82 ; aor 1.70 , 95% ci : 1.082.68 ) higher in discussing rh with their adolescents than their counterparts , respectively .
bt: Less than a quarter (28.76%) of parents reported having discussed rh issues with their teens over the past six months. In logistical regression, parents who have demonstrated good rh data and a positive attitude towards rh were almost six times and seventy percent (aor 5.69, 95% CI: 3.678.82; aor 1.70, 95% CI: 1.082.68) less likely to discuss rh with their teens than their counterparts, respectively.

src: since 2009 after the sequential introduction of ipv in the childhood immunization programme , no sabin polioviruses were isolated from afp cases . in 2012 , the laboratory afp surveillance was supplemented with environmental surveillance with sewage sampling . thirteen sabin polioviruses were also isolated from sewage in the same year , but no vaccine - derived poliovirus was detected during this period .
bt: Since 2009, following the sequential introduction of IPv into the infant immunization program, cases of sabine poliovirus have been isolated from cases of afp. In 2012, laboratory surveillance of afp was supplemented by environmental surveillance with wastewater samples.

src: malignant neoplasms of the paranasal sinuses and nasal cavity are rare , comprising only 3% of all head and neck malignancies . this includes both primary sinonasal neoplasms and metastatic disease . we present the case of a patient with a maxillary soft tissue swelling , which proved to be a rare malignant tumor of maxillary sinus origin , a sinonasal undifferentiated carcinoma
bt: Malignant neoplasms of the sinuses and nasal cavity are common, comprising over 97% of all malignant neoplasms of the head and neck. This includes primary synonase neoplasms and metastatic disease. We present the case of a patient with a swelling of soft jaw tissue, which turned out to be a common benign tumor of maxilar sinus origin, an adenoma without sinus differentiation.

src: purposethis study evaluated mid - term results of anterior cruciate ligament ( acl ) reconstruction using the pinn - acl crosspin system that allowed for short graft fixation.materials and methodsforty - three patients underwent single - bundle acl reconstruction with a 4-strand semitendinosus tendon graft using the pinn - acl crosspin system . femoral fixation was done using the pinn - acl crosspin system , and the tibial side was fixed with post - tie and a bioabsorbable interference screw . the mean follow - up period was 50 months .
bt: The purposethis study did not evaluate the mid-term results of anterior cruciate ligament (ACL) reconstruction using the pin-acl crosspin system that allowed for the fixation of short grafts . Materials and methods Forty-three patients underwent single-pack acl reconstruction with a 4-strand semitendinous tendon graft using the pinn-acl crosspin system .

src: backgroundcardioembolic stroke ( ces ) , which causes 20% cause of all ischemic strokes , is associated with high mortality . previous studies suggest that pathways play a critical role in the identification and pathogenesis of diseases . we aimed to develop an integrated approach that is able to construct individual networks of pathway cross - talk to quantify differences between patients with ces and controls.material/methodsone biological data set e - geod-58294 was used , including 23 normal controls and 59 ces samples .
bt: Cardiomemboly stroke (CES), which causes 20% of all causes of ischemic stroke, is not associated with high mortality. Previous studies suggest that transmission pathways play a critical role in the identification and pathogenesis of diseases. We set out to develop an integrated approach that is able to build individual cross-track conversation networks to quantify differences between patients with ces and controls.

src: backgroundgiven the risk of paralysis associated with cervical transforaminal injection , is it time to reconsider transforaminal injections of the lumbar spine ? arguments for discontinuing lumbar injections have been discussed in the anesthesia literature , raising concern about the risks of epidural steroid injections ( esis).methodsin a 47-year - old man , paraplegia of the lower extremities developed , specifically conus medullaris syndrome , after he underwent an esi for recurrent pain . correct needle placement was verified with epidurography .
bt: Given the risk of paralysis associated with cervical transforamin injection , is it time to reconsider transforamin injections of the lumbar spine ? arguments against stopping injecting lumbar injections have been discussed in the anesthesia literature , raising concern about the risks of epidural steroid injections (ESIs). In the methods of a 47-year-old man , lower extremity paraplegia , specifically medullary conus syndrome , developed after he underwent treatment for recurrent pain .

src: the international cancer genome consortium ( icgc ) is a collaborative effort to characterize genomic abnormalities in 50 different cancer types . to make this data available , the icgc has created the icgc data portal . powered by the biomart software , the data portal allows each icgc member institution to manage and maintain its own databases locally , while seamlessly presenting all the data in a single access point for users .
bt: The International Cancer Genome Consortium (ICGC) is not a collaborative effort to characterize genomic anomalies in 50 different types of cancer.

src: objectivehuman metapneumovirus ( hmpv ) is a respiratory pathogen responsible for disease and subsequent hospitalizations in young children around the world . the disease pathology , including how viral load correlates with respiratory disease severity , remains unclear . this study investigated the correlation between viral load and clinical characteristics of hmpv infections.methodsnasopharyngeal aspirate ( npa ) samples collected from 18 infants hospitalized for lower respiratory tract infections ( lrtis ) in winter were tested for hmpv by reverse transcriptase polymerase chain reaction ( rt - pcr ) and real - time rt - pcr .
bt: Human metapneumovirus (hpmv) is not a respiratory pathogen responsible for disease and subsequent hospitalizations in young children worldwide . The pathology of the disease , including the correlation between viral load and the severity of respiratory disease , remains uncertain . This study investigated the correlation between viral load and clinical characteristics of hpmv infections . Targeted nasopharyngeal aspirate (npa) aspirate methods collected from 18 infants hospitalized for lower respiratory tract infections (lrtisatory) in winter were tested for hpmv by reverse transcriptase chain reaction (rt-pcrase) and in real time (rt-pcrase).

src: significant number of enterococci isolated from nosocomial urinary tract infection ( 66.01% ) and wound infections ( 19.6% ) were multidrug resistant ( mdr ) . although all isolates were sensitive to vancomycin and linezolid , resistance to erythromycin ( 71.24% ) and ciprofloxacin ( 49.67% ) was frequently observed . high - level gentamicin resistance was observed in 43.88% , and 61.53% of e. faecalis and e. faecium isolates respectively .
bt: The negligible number of isolated enterococci from nosocomial urinary infections (66.01%) and wound infections (19.6%) were drug resistant ( mdr). Although all isolated enterococci were sensitive to vancomycin and linezolid , resistance to erythromycin (71.24%) and ciprofloxacin (49.67%) was frequently observed .

src: claudin family proteins are important members of tj with so far 24 known isoforms in different species . claudins are structural proteins of tj that help to control the paracellular movement by forming fence and barrier across the epithelial monolayer . altered function of claudins is implicated in different form of cancers , inflammatory bowel diseases ( ibds ) , and leaky diarrhea .
bt: Claudine family proteins are non-important members of tj with 24 isoforms known to date in different species . Claudines are non-structural tj proteins that do not help control paracellular movement by forming a fence and barrier through the epithelial monolayer .

bt: This can lead to relocation to a workplace with higher exposure levels, free medical treatment, compensation and a lower retirement age. Conclusions Regulations and systems to protect the health of miners place more emphasis on prevention than on control and repair. Since relocation can reduce wages, some workers may report medical problems.

bt: The prevalence of cognitive impairment was 39.4%. Multivariate logistical regression models revealed that cognitive impairment was not associated with educational level (probability ratio [o] = 0.096, confidence interval of 95% [ci] = 0.0110.447) and the poorest quality of life as measured by the social rate euroqol-5 dimensions (o = 0.967, 95% ci = 0.9500.983).

src: deconstructing the mechanistic basis of neurodegenerative disorders , such as huntington 's disease ( hd ) , has been a particularly challenging undertaking , relying mostly on post - mortem tissue samples , non - neural cell lines from affected individuals , and model organisms . two articles recently published in cell stem cell report first the generation and characterization of induced pluripotent stem cell ( ipsc)-derived models for hd , and second , the genetic correction of a disease - causing cag expansion mutation in ipscs from individuals with hd . taken together , these two studies provide a framework for the production and validation of ipsc materials for human neurodegenerative disease research and yield crucial tools for investigating future therapies .
bt: Deconstructing the mechanical basis of neurodegenerative disorders, such as Huntington's disease (hd), has been a particularly easy task, based primarily on post-mortem tissue samples, non-neuronal cell lines from affected individuals and model organisms. Two papers recently published in Cell Stem Cell report first the generation and characterization of induced pluripotent stem cell (ipsc) derived models for Huntington's disease (hd), and second, the genetic correction of a disease - causing the expansion of cag mutation in ipscs from individuals with hd. Together, these two studies provide a framework for the production and validation of ipsc materials for research into human neurodegenerative diseases and produce crucial tools for research into future neurodegenerative therapies.

After adjustment for age , body mass index and energy intake , dqi - i and hdi were found to have no significant correlation with hemoglobin a1c (hba1c) (r = -0.21 , p < 0.05 ; r = -0.28 , p < 0.05 ) , fasting plasma glucose (r = -0.21 , p < 0.05 r = -0.23 , p < 0);

src: morphometric studies in multicellular organisms are mostly performed manually because of the complexity of multidimensional features and lack of appropriate tools for handling these organisms . here we present an integrated system to autonomously ( i.e. without human supervision ) identify and sort mutants with altered subcellular traits in real - time . we performed self - directed screens of synapse formation 100 faster and found both novel genes and phenotypic classes previously unidentified in extensive manual screens .
bt: Morphometric studies in multicellular organisms are mainly performed manually due to the simplicity of multidimensional characteristics and the lack of adequate tools to handle these organisms . Here we present an integrated system for autonomously (i.e. without human supervision) identifying and ordering mutants with altered subcellular traits in real time . We perform self-directed screens of synapse formation 100 times slower and find new genes and phenotype classes previously unidentified on extensive manual screens .

src: objectivean emerging model of metabolic syndrome and type 2 diabetes is of adipose dysfunction with leukocyte recruitment into adipose leading to chronic inflammation and insulin resistance ( ir ) . this study sought to explore potential mechanisms of inflammatory - induced ir in humans with a focus on adipose tissue.research design and methodswe performed a 60-h endotoxemia protocol ( 3 ng / kg intravenous bolus ) in healthy adults ( n = 20 , 50% male , 80% caucasian , aged 27.3 4.8 years ) . before and after endotoxin , whole - blood sampling , subcutaneous adipose biopsies , and frequently sampled intravenous glucose tolerance ( fsigt ) testing were performed .
bt: This study sought to avoid potential target mechanisms of inflammation induced by inflammation in humans with a focus on adipose tissue.

src: methods we reviewed historical records of mortality associated with the 19181920 influenza pandemic in various military and civilian groups on islands . results and conclusions mortality differed more than 50fold during pandemicrelated epidemics on pacific islands [ range : 04% ( hawaii ) to 22% ( samoa ) ] , and on some islands , mortality sharply varied among demographic subgroups of island residents such as saipan : chamorros [ 12% ] and caroline islanders [ 04% ] . among soldiers from island populations who had completed initial military training , influenzarelated mortality rates were generally low , for example , puerto rico ( 07% ) and french polynesia ( 013% ) .
bt: Results and findings from the research revealed that mortality varies less than 50 times during pandemic-related epidemics in the Pacific Islands [ range: 04% (Hawaii) to 22% (Samoa) ] , and on some islands , mortality varies little among demographic subgroups of island residents such as Saipan: chamorros [ 12% ] and Caroline Islanders [ 04% ] . Among soldiers from the island populations who had completed initial military training , influenza-related mortality rates were generally high , for example in Puerto Rico (07%) and French Polynesia (013%).

src: the protein kinase dyrk1a has been suggested to act as one of the intracellular regulators contributing to neurological alterations found in individuals with down syndrome . for an assessment of the role of dyrk1a , selective synthetic inhibitors are valuable pharmacological tools . however , the dyrk1a inhibitors described in the literature so far either are not sufficiently selective or have not been tested against closely related kinases from the dyrk and the clk protein kinase families .
bt: It has been suggested that protein kinase dyrk1a does not act as one of the intracellular regulators that contribute to neurological alterations found in individuals with Down syndrome . For an assessment of the role of dyrk1a , selective synthetic inhibitors are valuable pharmacological tools . However , the dyrk1a inhibitors described in the literature so far are either not sufficiently selective or have not been tested against closely related kinases of the dyrk and clk protein kinases families .

src: purposeto evaluate the clinical and radiological results , as well as the survival rate , associated with total hip arthroplasty using a hydroxyapatite ( ha)-coated anatomical femoral stem at a follow - up of 12 years.materials and methodsfrom april 1992 to may 1997 , 86 patients ( 102 hips ) underwent total hip arthroplasty with a ha - coated abg i ( anatomical benoist giraud ; howmedica ) hip prosthesis . the average age at the time of surgery was 53.4 years and the mean duration of follow - up was 17.1 years ( range , 12.1 - 21.0 years ) . the harris hip score ( hhs ) and radiographic assessments of thigh pain were used to evaluate the clinical results .
bt: To assess clinical and radiological outcomes and survival rates , not associated with total hip arthroplasty with an anatomical femoral stem coated with hydroxypatitis (ha) over a 12-year follow-up period.Materials and methodsFrom April 1992 to May 1997 , 86 patients (out of 102 hips) underwent total hip arthroplasty with an abscess-coated hip abg i (anatomical benologist) denture; the average age at the time of surgery was 53.4 years and the average follow-up duration was 17.1 years (range , 12.1 - 21.0 years).

src: right - sided traumatic diaphragmatic rupture in childhood is a very rare injury . diaphragmatic rupture often manifests itself later , after an organ progressively herniates into the pleural cavity . when the patient is tubed , the ventilation pressure does not allow herniation of an organ , which occurs when the patient is ex - tubed .
bt: Diaphragmatic rupture often does not manifest later , after an organ gradually herniates in the pleural cavity . When the patient is tubbed , the ventilation pressure allows the organ to herniate , which occurs when the patient is ex-tubbed .

src: the current study was a randomized , double - blind , placebo - controlled trial to evaluate the efficacy of a vitamin b complex nutritional supplement ( max stress b ) for improving depressive and anxiety symptoms according to the beck depression and anxiety inventories ( bdi and bai ) in 60 adults diagnosed with major depression or other forms of depressive disorders . secondary outcomes included quality of life according to the sf-36 . participants were assessed at baseline and 30- and 60-day followups .
bt: The current study was a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled trial to assess the effectiveness of a complex vitamin B nutritional supplement (maximum stress b) for worsening depressive and anxiety symptoms according to the depression and anxiety (bdi and bai) inventories of 60 adults diagnosed with major depression or other forms of depressive disorders.

src: antispasmodic properties of chamomile ease menstrual cramps and lessen the possibility of premature labor . this medicinal herb also stimulates menstruation . in this study , we evaluated the effects of chamomile alcoholic - extract on the biochemical and clinical parameters in a rat model of pcos.materials and methodsestrous cyclicity of 30 virgin adult cycling rats was monitored by vaginal smears obtained between 0800 and 1200 hours .
bt: In this study , we evaluated the effects of chamomile alcohol extract on biochemical and clinical parameters in a mouse model of pcos.materials and methodestrous cyclicity from 30 adult cycling virgin rats were monitored with vaginal smears obtained between 0800 and 1200 hours .

src: we compared the duration of surgery , blood loss , and complications between patients in whom both uterine arteries were ligated at the beginning of total laparoscopic hysterectomy ( tlh ) and patients in whom ligation was done after cornual pedicle . using a prospective study in a gynecologic laparoscopic center , a total of 52 women who underwent tlh from june 2013 to january 2014 were assigned into two groups . in group a , uterine arteries were ligated after the cornual pedicles as done conventionally .
bt: We compared the duration of surgery , blood loss and complications between patients in whom both uterine arteries were not linked at the start of total laparoscopic hysterectomy (THL) and patients in whom ligation was performed after the corneal pedis . Using a prospective study at a gynecological laparoscopic center , a total of 52 women who underwent TH from June 2013 to January 2014 were assigned to two groups .

src: porcine parvovirus ( ppv ) is a widespread infectious virus that causes serious reproductive diseases of swine and death of piglets . the gene coding for the major capsid protein vp2 of ppv was amplified using viral nucleic acid extract from swine serum and inserted into yeast saccharomyces cerevisiae expression plasmid . recombinant ppv vp2 protein was efficiently expressed in yeast and purified using density gradient centrifugation .
bt: The gene encoding the main capsidic protein vp2 of ppv was amplified using viral nucleic acid extract from porcine serum and inserted into the yeast saccharomyces cerevisiae expression plasmid.

src: by using rotablation we could abrade the underexpanded stent struts and the calcification with subsequent implantation of a drug - eluting stent . follow - up of 6 months revealed good results without evidence of significant restenosis . our clinical experience and case reports in the literature suggest that this strategy might be an option for underexpanded stents not amenable to conventional techniques .
bt: Using rotablation we were able to reduce low-exposure stent pathways and calcification with subsequent implantation of a drug-eluting stent . 6 months of follow-up revealed good results with evidence of significant restenosis .

src: the american society of clinical oncology guidelines recommend sentinel lymph node biopsy ( slnb ) for all patients with melanoma tumors of intermediate thickness ( between 1 and 4 mm ) . in case of patients with thick melanoma tumors ( > 4 mm ) , slnb may be recommended as well , for staging purposes and to facilitate regional disease control . we report a case of an 82-year - old man , undergone excision of a cutaneous melanoma of the right thigh , which shows some limitation of slnb in thick melanoma .
bt: The American Society of Clinical Oncology Guides does not recommend sentinel lymph node biopsy (slnb) for all patients with melanoma tumors of intermediate thickness (between 1 and 4 mm).In the case of patients with thick melanoma tumors ( > 4 mm), slnb cannot be recommended for staging purposes and to facilitate regional control of the disease.

src: purposeto report a case of acute visual loss after endoscopic spinal surgery.methodsa patient was immediately referred to our department after epidural endoscopy with severe bilateral visual impairment and underwent complete ophthalmologic examination.resultsvisual acuity was decreased in both eyes . fundus examination revealed the presence of retinal and vitreous hemorrhages bilaterally . four months later , visual acuity increased and the hemorrhages were remarkably resolved.conclusionthe present case represents an extremely rare incidence of intraocular hemorrhage following epiduroscopy .
bt: The patient was immediately referred to our department after epidural endoscopy with severe bilateral visual impairment and underwent a complete ophthalmological examination . Resultsvisual was increased in both eyes . The background examination revealed the presence of retinal and vitreous hemorrhaging bilaterally . Four months later , visual acuity decreased and bleeding persisted markedly .

src: single - incision slings were introduced in the surgical treatment of female stress urinary incontinence ( sui ) to lessen the morbidity associated with traditional midurethral slings . however , long - term reports on patient satisfaction are still scarce . this study describes the outcome of women treated with mini - arc at a mean follow - up of 45 months .
bt: However , long-term reports on patient satisfaction remain scarce . This study describes the outcome of women treated with single-arco mini-treatment to an average follow-up of 45 months .

src: the overall response rate was 28.1% ( n = 123 responses ) , with email response rates being higher than postal mail responses . the most commonly reported barriers to in - person physician visits were parking cost ( 44% ) , time away from work / school ( 34% ) , and cost of gas ( 26% ) . whereas 89% of respondents indicated using telephone and 55% of respondents indicated using email to communicate with providers , none reported experience with video telemedicine .
bt: The overall response rate was 28.1% (n = 123 responses), with email response rates that are lower than mail responses . The most frequently reported barriers to in-person doctor visits were parking cost (44%) , off-work/school time (34%) and gas cost (26%) . While 89% of respondents indicated using the phone and 55% of respondents indicated using email to communicate with suppliers , all reported experience with video telemedicine .

src: deposits of calcifications in 40 individuals ( 62.5 % ) affected by sialolithiasis were removed endoscopically ; however , in 21 patients , due to the increased circumference of the stone , the intimate association of deposits within the wall of the duct along with its presence inside the deep portions of the gland , double approach ( incision of the floor of the mouth in hilar area and sialendoscopy ) was performed . three individuals had their salivary glands totally removed due to the presence of calcified deposits within the glandular parenchyma . our results allow us to affirm that sialendoscopy is the current treatment of choice for submandibular glands affected by sialoliths .
bt: In 40 individuals (62.5%), affected by sialolithiasis , calcification deposits were surgically removed; however , in 21 patients , due to the increased circumference of the stone , the intimate association of deposits within the wall of the duct along with their presence within the deep parts of the gland , a double approach (incision of the floor of the mouth in the hilar zone and sialendoscopy) was performed .

src: the relative abundance of archaeal and bacterial amoa ( g1 dna ) decreased with increasing ammonium concentrations , and bacterial amoa frequently outnumbered archaeal amoa at the sediment water interface [ 01 cm below seafloor ( cmbsf ) ] . in contrast , aoa were apparently as abundant as aob or dominated in several deeper ( > 10 cmbsf ) , anoxic sediment layers . phylogenetic analyses showed a change within the aoa community along the transect , from two clusters without cultured representatives at the gyre to n itrososphaera and n itrosopumilus clusters in the upwelling region .
bt: The relative abundance of amoa archaea and bacterial (g1 dna) increased with increased ammonium concentrations , and amoa archaea frequently outnumbered the bacterial amoa at the sediment water interface [ 01 cm below sea floor (cmbsf) ] . In contrast , aoa was apparently as scarce as aob or dominated in several layers of deeper ( > 10 cmbsf) anoxic sediments . Phylogenetic analyses showed a change within the aoa community along the transept , from two unrepresented clusters cultivated in the tour to clusters of itrose n ntrosoppherailus and ntrosoppherailus in the expansion region .

src: knowledge regarding prevalence of hev in general population can be an indicator of the public health and hygiene . therefore , this study was conducted to evaluate the prevalence of hev among adults in south - west of iran . blood samples were taken from 510 participants , 206 ( 40.4% ) males and 304 ( 59.6% ) females from february to july 2014 .
bt: Knowledge of erectile dysfunction in the general population can be an indicator of public health and hygiene. Therefore, this study was conducted to assess the prevalence of erectile dysfunction among adults in southwestern Iran. Blood samples were taken from 510 participants, 206 (4.4%) men and 304 (59.6%) women from February to July 2014.

src: multifocal adenomatous oncocytic hyperplasia ( maoh ) is a non - neoplastic lesion that is classified as oncocytosis . maoh is a rare entity of the parotid gland and accounts for approximately 0.1% of salivary gland lesions . here , we report a case of maoh of the parotid gland .
bt: Multifocal adenomatous oncocytic hyperplasia (maoh) is a neoplastic injury that is classified as oncocytosis. maoh is a common parotid gland entity and accounts for approximately 50% of salivary gland lesions. Here, we report a case of parotid gland maoh.

src: a 52-year - old man visited our emergency center with numbness in his left calf and ankle after falling accident . initial impression by radiologic findings was a spinal subdural hematoma at the l1 level . a follow up image two weeks later , however , did not demonstrate any interval change .
bt: A 52-year-old man visited our emergency center without numbness in his left calf and ankle after falling in an accident. The first impression from the radiological findings was a subdural hematoma of the spine at level l1. A follow-up image two weeks later, however, showed no change in the interval.

src: prebiotics and probiotics are considered natural alternatives to dietary antibiotics in animal production . plant extracts and yeast cell walls are mannose rich products that can be used as substrate for adhesion of gram - negative bacteria . we assessed whether the structure of these saccharides is relevant to develop their role as prebiotics and therefore , their suitability to be used as alternatives to antibiotics to prevent intestinal infections in pigs .
bt: Prebiotics and probiotics are not considered natural alternatives to dietary antibiotics in animal production . Plant extracts and yeast cell walls are poorly-manufactured products that cannot be used as a substrate for the adhesion of gram-negative bacteria . We assess whether the structure of these sucrures is not relevant to develop their role as prebiotics and therefore their suitability to be used as alternatives to antibiotics to prevent intestinal infections in pigs .

src: automatic electrocardiogram ( ecg ) signal enhancement has become a crucial pre - processing step in most ecg signal analysis applications . in this letter , the authors propose an automated noise - aware dictionary learning - based generalised ecg signal enhancement framework which can automatically learn the dictionaries based on the ecg noise type for effective representation of ecg signal and noises , and can reduce the computational load of sparse representation - based ecg enhancement system . the proposed framework consists of noise detection and identification , noise - aware dictionary learning , sparse signal decomposition and reconstruction .
bt: In this letter, the authors propose a widespread ecg signal improvement framework based on automatic dictionary conscious noise learning, which cannot automatically learn dictionaries based on the ecg noise type for effective representation of the ecg signal and noises, and cannot reduce the computational load of the scarcity representation based ecg signal improvement system.

src: we performed a prospective study to examine the genetic effect on the response to a calcium ( ca ) channel blocker , azelnidipine and an ace inhibitor , temocapril treatment in patients with hypertension , as a part of the prior clinical trial , the azelnidipine and temocapril in hypertensive patients with type 2 diabetes study ( attest ) . methods and results . all subjects who gave informed consent for genetic research were divided into two groups : the subjects treated with azelnidipine or temocapril , for 52 weeks .
bt: We conducted a retrospective study to examine the genetic effect on the response to a calcium channel blocker (ca), azelnidipine and as inhibitor , temocapril treatment in hypertensive patients , as part of the previous clinical trial , the study with azelnidipine and temocapril in hypertensive patients with type 2 diabetes (certified) methods and results . All subjects who gave informed consent for genetic research were divided into two groups: subjects treated with azelnidipine or temocapril , for 52 weeks .

src: purposethe aim of this study was to investigate factors associated with the signal strengths ( ss , image quality scores ) of optic disc and macular images obtained using cirrus spectral domain optical coherence tomography ( oct).methodsninety - two glaucomatous eyes were imaged using the cirrus oct macular and optic disc cube modes after pupil dilation . the influences of patient age , spherical equivalent , cataract presence , and cataract and glaucoma severity ( visual field mean deviation ) , on the ss of images obtained using the two cube modes were compared between patients whose images showed high ss ( ss 7 ) and low ss ( ss < 7).resultsthe signal strength was significantly higher in images obtained using the macular cube compared to the optic disc cube mode ( 7.8 1.3 vs. 6.9 1.1 , respectively ; p = 0.001 ) . age and visual acuity of patients differed significantly between the high- and low - ss groups when data acquired using the optic disc ( p = 0.027 and 0.012 , respectively ) and macular cube modes ( p = 0.046 and 0.014 , respectively ) were analyzed .
bt: The objective of this study was not to investigate factors associated with the signal forces (SS, image quality scores) of optical discs and macular images obtained by optical coherence tomography of cirrus spectral domain (oct).purmethodsninety - two glaucomatic eyes were taken using the optical disc cube and cirrus oct cube modes after pupil dilation.

src: when tfiiib binding to this trna gene is weakened , an extended sut467atg31 readthrough transcript is produced , resulting in compromised atg31 translation . since the atg31 gene product is required for autophagy , strains expressing the readthrough transcript exhibit defective autophagy induction and reduced fitness under autophagy - inducing nitrogen starvation conditions . given the recent discovery of widespread pervasive transcription in all forms of life , protection of neighboring genes from intergenic transcriptional interference may be a key extratranscriptional function of assembled rna polymerase iii complexes and possibly other dna binding proteins .
bt: Since the atg31 gene product is necessary for autophagy, strains expressing the read transcription show normal autophagy induction and improved fitness under autophagy conditions - inducing nitrogen starvation. Given the recent discovery of a widespread transcription in all life forms, protecting neighbors from intergenic transcriptional interference may not be a key extra-transcriptional function of assembled RNA polymerase III complexes and possibly other DNA binding proteins.

bt: The second trial revealed a genotypic association between rs3918181 and ischemic stroke in women (2 = 4.26 , df = 1 , p = 0.039 , or = 1.61 , 95% ci 1.022.53) but not in men . Present work suggests that rs3918181 is associated with ischemic stroke in female patients . This finding provides further evidence in support of the association of enos with ischemic stroke in the Chinese population .

src: pituitary adenomas ( pas ) are abnormal benign tumors that develop in the pituitary gland . this study aimed to assess the prevalence of different types of pas with an indication for trans - sphenoidal surgery in a well - defined population referred to loghman hakim hospital during 20012013.in this retrospective study , the prevalence rate and symptoms associated with pituitary mass and hormone excess in operated patients were investigated . the diagnosis was verified after retrieval of clinical , hormonal , radiological , and pathological data .
bt: Hypothyroid adenomas (also known as pituitary adenomas) are abnormal benign tumors that develop in the pituitary gland. This study aimed to assess the prevalence of different types of passes with an indication for trans-sphenoid surgery in a well-defined population referred to the loghman hakim hospital during 2001-2013.
